Sated Threshadon.name: Sated Threshadon
Sated Threshadon.flavor: Bet you can't eat just one murloc!

Kingsbane.text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck. It keeps any enchantments.
Kingsbane.name: Kingsbane
Kingsbane.flavor: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

Grievous Bite.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and $1 damage to adjacent ones.
Grievous Bite.name: Grievous Bite
Grievous Bite.flavor: Ooh.  I'll have a bite of this, and of this, and of this...

Cult Master.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, draw a card.
Cult Master.name: Cult Master
Cult Master.flavor: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

Volcanic Lumberer.text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Volcanic Lumberer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Volcanic Lumberer.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Volcanic Lumberer.name: Volcanic Lumberer
Volcanic Lumberer.flavor: The roots, the roots, the roots is on fire!

Unstable Ghoul.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Unstable Ghoul.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Unstable Ghoul.name: Unstable Ghoul
Unstable Ghoul.flavor: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.

Corrupted Healbot.text: Deathrattle: Restore 8 Health to the enemy hero.
Corrupted Healbot.name: Corrupted Healbot
Corrupted Healbot.flavor: Not so much "corrupted" as "has terrible aim".

Bring It On!.text: Gain 10 Armor. Reduce the Cost of minions in your opponent's hand by (2).
Bring It On!.name: Bring It On!
Bring It On!.flavor: Brrr, it's cold in here. Let's hope she doesn't have an Auctioneer!

Harrison Jones.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
Harrison Jones.name: Harrison Jones
Harrison Jones.flavor: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

Blowgill Sniper.name: Blowgill Sniper
Blowgill Sniper.flavor: Imagine how much further his darts would go if he had lungs instead of gills!

Azure Drake.name: Azure Drake
Azure Drake.flavor: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

Devolve.text: Transform all enemy minions into random ones that cost (1) less.
Devolve.name: Devolve
Devolve.flavor: Ragnaros looked down. He looked like some kind of War Golem. "WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME," he yelled. But all that came out was a deep grinding sound. He began to cry.

Shifting Shade.text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck  and add it to your hand.
Shifting Shade.name: Shifting Shade
Shifting Shade.flavor: Yeah, it's cooler in the shade, but you're also more likely to get JACKED.

Righteous Protector.name: Righteous Protector
Righteous Protector.flavor: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

Feign Death.name: Feign Death
Feign Death.flavor: The hardest part about doing a "Feign Death" convincingly is learning how to make the right smell. It takes a lot of commitment.

Mind Vision.text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
Mind Vision.name: Mind Vision
Mind Vision.flavor: I see what you did there.

Archmage Antonidas.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to your hand.
Archmage Antonidas.name: Archmage Antonidas
Archmage Antonidas.flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

Kun the Forgotten King.text: Choose One - Gain 10 Armor; or Refresh your Mana Crystals.
Kun the Forgotten King.name: Kun the Forgotten King
Kun the Forgotten King.flavor: Aya siphons a bit of Kun's soul to animate each golem in her Jade army. To his credit, he's being a great sport about it.

Darnassus Aspirant.text: Battlecry: Gain an empty Mana Crystal. Deathrattle: Lose a Mana Crystal.
Darnassus Aspirant.name: Darnassus Aspirant
Darnassus Aspirant.flavor: She loves mana crystals, she hates mana crystals.   So fickle!

Shaku, the Collector.text: [x]Stealth. Whenever this attacks, add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Shaku, the Collector.name: Shaku, the Collector
Shaku, the Collector.flavor: Aya even staged an intervention once, but Shaku still insists that he is not a hoarder.

Brawl.text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
Brawl.name: Brawl
Brawl.flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

Meteor.text: Deal $15 damage to a minion and $3 damage to adjacent ones.
Meteor.name: Meteor
Meteor.flavor: When you absolutely, positively have to kill all the dinosaurs.

Icehowl.name: Icehowl
Icehowl.flavor: This massive yeti just closes his eyes and charges at the nearest target.  The nearest Target is a couple blocks away and has sick deals on skateboards.

Chillblade Champion.name: Chillblade Champion
Chillblade Champion.flavor: It slices, it dices, it vaporizes! The Chillblade will make a Champion out of even the lowliest gnome.

Barnes.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of a random minion in your deck.
Barnes.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Barnes.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Barnes.name: Barnes
Barnes.flavor: He used to play every part, until Moroes confiscated his Orb of Deception.

Runeforge Haunter.text: During your turn, your weapon doesn't lose Durability.
Runeforge Haunter.name: Runeforge Haunter
Runeforge Haunter.flavor: Don't worry, he'll keep an eye on that for you.

Vicious Fledgling.text: After this minion attacks a hero, Adapt.
Vicious Fledgling.name: Vicious Fledgling
Vicious Fledgling.flavor: A youngster who is truly hungry for self-improvement.

Shaky Zipgunner.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
Shaky Zipgunner.name: Shaky Zipgunner
Shaky Zipgunner.flavor: The Grimy Goons can get you any weapon you want but if you want it to not explode you gotta pay extra.

Shifter Zerus.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random minion.
Shifter Zerus.name: Shifter Zerus
Shifter Zerus.flavor: It's like being able to play with THREE angry chickens!

Ice Breaker.text: Destroy any Frozen minion damaged by this.
Ice Breaker.name: Ice Breaker
Ice Breaker.flavor: A great way to end a conversation.

Unwilling Sacrifice.text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
Unwilling Sacrifice.name: Unwilling Sacrifice
Unwilling Sacrifice.flavor: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

Fire Fly.text: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
Fire Fly.name: Fire Fly
Fire Fly.flavor: Archnemeses: small children with glass jars.

Mark of Y'Shaarj.text:
Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's a Beast, draw
a card.
Mark of Y'Shaarj.name: Mark of Y'Shaarj
Mark of Y'Shaarj.flavor: Y'Shaarj had three sons: Mark, Theodore, and Chris.

Beckoner of Evil.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
Beckoner of Evil.howToEarn: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
Beckoner of Evil.name: Beckoner of Evil

Edwin VanCleef.text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each other card you've played this turn.
Edwin VanCleef.name: Edwin VanCleef
Edwin VanCleef.flavor: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

Holy Wrath.text: Draw a card and deal damage equal to its Cost.
Holy Wrath.name: Holy Wrath

Darkshire Alchemist.name: Darkshire Alchemist
Darkshire Alchemist.flavor: The secret ingredient: liquified funnel cake.

Jade Spirit.name: Jade Spirit
Jade Spirit.flavor: "He's so cute!  I just want to squeeze him, then use him for Jade Golem parts!" - Aya Blackpaw

Grimestreet Enforcer.text: At the end of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
Grimestreet Enforcer.name: Grimestreet Enforcer
Grimestreet Enforcer.flavor: "Sir, you don't have a permit to park your mount here."

Plated Beetle.name: Plated Beetle
Plated Beetle.flavor: "Ok, your party has defeated the beetle." "I put it on my head." "What?" "I put it on my head. Like a hat."

Kobold Monk.text: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Kobold Monk.name: Kobold Monk

Purify.text: Silence a friendly minion. Draw a card.
Purify.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Purify.name: Purify
Purify.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Purify.flavor: Even better than a hot shower with vigorous scrubbing!

Raptor Hatchling.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a 4/3 Raptor into your deck.
Raptor Hatchling.name: Raptor Hatchling
Raptor Hatchling.flavor: They’re just baby teeth. Lots and lots of baby teeth.

Grimestreet Outfitter.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
Grimestreet Outfitter.name: Grimestreet Outfitter
Grimestreet Outfitter.flavor: If you bargain hard, he'll throw in the hat.

Elite Tauren Chieftain.text: Battlecry: Give both players the power to ROCK! (with a Power Chord card)
Elite Tauren Chieftain.name: Elite Tauren Chieftain
Elite Tauren Chieftain.flavor: He's looking for a drummer.  The current candidates are: Novice Engineer, Sen'jin Shieldmasta', and Ragnaros the Firelord.

Screwjank Clunker.name: Screwjank Clunker
Screwjank Clunker.flavor: If it breaks, just kick it a couple of times while yelling "Durn thing!"

Kezan Mystic.text: Battlecry: Take control of a random enemy Secret.
Kezan Mystic.name: Kezan Mystic
Kezan Mystic.flavor: They pretend to be wise and enlightened, but they mostly just hate to be left out of a secret.

Mind Control.text: Take control of an enemy minion.
Mind Control.name: Mind Control
Mind Control.flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

Onyxia.text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
Onyxia.name: Onyxia
Onyxia.flavor: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

Sludge Belcher.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Sludge Belcher.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Sludge Belcher.name: Sludge Belcher
Sludge Belcher.flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.

Quartermaster.name: Quartermaster
Quartermaster.flavor: His specialty? Dividing things into four pieces.

Steward of Darkshire.text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.
Steward of Darkshire.name: Steward of Darkshire
Steward of Darkshire.flavor: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.

Igneous Elemental.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/2 Elementals to your hand.
Igneous Elemental.name: Igneous Elemental
Igneous Elemental.flavor: We wanted to name him "Ingenious Elemental", but he just wasn't that bright.

Argent Lance.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.
Argent Lance.name: Argent Lance
Argent Lance.flavor: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.

Kooky Chemist.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
Kooky Chemist.name: Kooky Chemist

Blessing of Wisdom.text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
Blessing of Wisdom.name: Blessing of Wisdom
Blessing of Wisdom.flavor: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

Strongshell Scavenger.name: Strongshell Scavenger
Strongshell Scavenger.flavor: It isn't "grave robbing" when there's no grave. It's just scavenging…

Ragnaros, Lightlord.text: At the end of your turn, restore 8 Health to a damaged friendly character.
Ragnaros, Lightlord.name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
Ragnaros, Lightlord.flavor: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

Fiery Bat.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Fiery Bat.name: Fiery Bat

Manic Soulcaster.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.
Manic Soulcaster.name: Manic Soulcaster
Manic Soulcaster.flavor: When casting a tournament, you really have to put your soul into it!

Bolvar, Fireblood.text: Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
Bolvar, Fireblood.name: Bolvar, Fireblood

Fungal Enchanter.text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
Fungal Enchanter.name: Fungal Enchanter

Flametongue Totem.name: Flametongue Totem
Flametongue Totem.flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

Bloodlust.text: Give your minions +3 Attack this turn.
Bloodlust.name: Bloodlust

Nightblade.name: Nightblade
Nightblade.flavor: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

Mass Dispel.text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
Mass Dispel.name: Mass Dispel
Mass Dispel.flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

Sea Reaver.text: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.
Sea Reaver.name: Sea Reaver
Sea Reaver.flavor: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.

Ancient Shieldbearer.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain 10 Armor.
Ancient Shieldbearer.name: Ancient Shieldbearer
Ancient Shieldbearer.flavor: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!

Dragonhawk Rider.name: Dragonhawk Rider
Dragonhawk Rider.flavor: Check it out.  You can do barrel rolls on this thing.

Void Ripper.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of all other minions.
Void Ripper.name: Void Ripper
Void Ripper.flavor: You had to put the portable hole inside the bag of holding, didn't you?!

Midnight Drake.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other card in your hand.
Midnight Drake.name: Midnight Drake

Gadgetzan Jouster.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain +1/+1.
Gadgetzan Jouster.name: Gadgetzan Jouster
Gadgetzan Jouster.flavor: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.

Glaivezooka.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +1 Attack.
Glaivezooka.name: Glaivezooka
Glaivezooka.flavor: For the times when a regular bazooka just isn't enough.

Shifting Scroll.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random Mage spell.
Shifting Scroll.name: Shifting Scroll
Shifting Scroll.flavor: Next turn, this is going to be AMAZING.

Wobbling Runts.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Wobbling Runts.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Wobbling Runts.name: Wobbling Runts
Wobbling Runts.flavor: The fourth one fell off in a tragic accident.  They don't talk about it.

Hammer of Wrath.name: Hammer of Wrath
Hammer of Wrath.flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

Tree of Life.text: Restore all characters to full Health.
Tree of Life.name: Tree of Life

Gnomish Inventor.name: Gnomish Inventor
Gnomish Inventor.flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

Reno Jackson.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, fully heal your hero.
Reno Jackson.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Reno Jackson.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Reno Jackson.name: Reno Jackson
Reno Jackson.flavor: Reno is a four-time winner of the 'Best Accessorized Explorer' award.

Snipe.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $4 damage to it.
Snipe.name: Snipe
Snipe.flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

To My Side!.text:
[x]Summon an Animal
Companion, or 2 if your
deck has no minions.
To My Side!.name: To My Side!
To My Side!.flavor: I hunt alone.  Well, me and Misha.  And Huffer.  And Leokk.

Tuskarr Fisherman.name: Tuskarr Fisherman
Tuskarr Fisherman.flavor: If you bring him 500 fish, he'll give you this sweet Kalu'ak Fishing Pole.

Corpse Raiser.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
Corpse Raiser.name: Corpse Raiser
Corpse Raiser.flavor: He was just minding his business, farming corpses, when you meddling adventurers came along.

Charged Hammer.name: Charged Hammer
Charged Hammer.flavor: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

Imp Master.text:
[x]At the end of your turn, deal
1 damage to this minion
 and summon a 1/1 Imp.
Imp Master.name: Imp Master
Imp Master.flavor: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.

Slam.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
Slam.name: Slam
Slam.flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

Dire Wolf Alpha.name: Dire Wolf Alpha
Dire Wolf Alpha.flavor: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

Bloodfury Potion.text:
[x]Give a minion +3 Attack.
If it's a Demon, also
give it +3 Health.
Bloodfury Potion.name: Bloodfury Potion
Bloodfury Potion.flavor: You know what really makes my blood boil? The skyrocketing price of Bloodfury potions!

Forbidden Shaping.text: Spend all your Mana. Summon a random minion that costs that much.
Forbidden Shaping.name: Forbidden Shaping
Forbidden Shaping.flavor: But the minion arrives covered in goo.

Greater Healing Potion.text: Restore #12 Health to a friendly character.
Greater Healing Potion.name: Greater Healing Potion

Book Wyrm.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Book Wyrm.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack.
Book Wyrm.name: Book Wyrm
Book Wyrm.flavor: His favorites are classic tragedies like "The Hobbit" and "Grendel".
Book Wyrm.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Blood-Queen Lana'thel.text: [x]Lifesteal Has +1 Attack for each card you've discarded this game.
Blood-Queen Lana'thel.name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
Blood-Queen Lana'thel.flavor: As a young blood-princess she learned the proper way for a lady to curtsy, how to address fellow members of royalty, and how to bite them.

Cult Sorcerer.text: [x]Spell Damage +1 After you cast a spell, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Cult Sorcerer.name: Cult Sorcerer
Cult Sorcerer.flavor: No matter how many times we tell her not to, she keeps feeding C'Thun scraps under the table.

Furnacefire Colossus.text: Battlecry: Discard all weapons from your hand and gain their stats.
Furnacefire Colossus.name: Furnacefire Colossus
Furnacefire Colossus.flavor: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

Fight Promoter.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a minion with 6 or more  Health, draw two cards.
Fight Promoter.name: Fight Promoter
Fight Promoter.flavor: "Yeah, I can get you Knuckles.  No, no, he's been clean for *weeks*."

Grand Crusader.text: Battlecry: Add a random Paladin card to your hand.
Grand Crusader.name: Grand Crusader
Grand Crusader.flavor: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness.  Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.

Breath of Sindragosa.text: Deal $2 damage to a random enemy minion and Freeze it.
Breath of Sindragosa.name: Breath of Sindragosa
Breath of Sindragosa.flavor: Is it cold in here or is it just Sindragosa?

Southsea Squidface.name: Southsea Squidface
Southsea Squidface.flavor: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.

Nozdormu.text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.
Nozdormu.name: Nozdormu
Nozdormu.flavor: Time to write some flavor text.

Frozen Clone.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, add two copies of it to your hand.
Frozen Clone.name: Frozen Clone
Frozen Clone.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

Sylvanas Windrunner.text: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
Sylvanas Windrunner.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
Sylvanas Windrunner.flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

Recruiter.text: Inspire: Add a 2/2 Squire to your hand.
Recruiter.name: Recruiter
Recruiter.flavor: Join the Argent Crusade!  We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!

Celestial Dreamer.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a minion with 5 or more Attack, gain +2/+2.
Celestial Dreamer.name: Celestial Dreamer
Celestial Dreamer.flavor: If you think her job is easy, YOU try falling asleep on cue.

Dragoncaller Alanna.text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
Dragoncaller Alanna.name: Dragoncaller Alanna
Dragoncaller Alanna.flavor: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

Grand Archivist.text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell from your deck (targets chosen randomly).
Grand Archivist.name: Grand Archivist

Spellslinger.text: Battlecry: Add a random spell to each player's hand.
Spellslinger.name: Spellslinger
Spellslinger.flavor: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?

Flamecannon.text: Deal $4 damage to a random enemy minion.
Flamecannon.name: Flamecannon
Flamecannon.flavor: Calling something a flamecannon really doesn't do much to distinguish it from other goblin devices.

Orgrimmar Aspirant.name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
Orgrimmar Aspirant.flavor: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

Explosive Sheep.name: Explosive Sheep
Explosive Sheep.flavor: How is this supposed to work? Your enemies think, "Hey! Cute sheep!" and run over to cuddle it?

Scarlet Purifier.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions with Deathrattle.
Scarlet Purifier.name: Scarlet Purifier
Scarlet Purifier.flavor: The Scarlet Crusade is doing market research to find out if the "Mauve Crusade" would be better received.

Argent Commander.name: Argent Commander
Argent Commander.flavor: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

Convert.text: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand.
Convert.name: Convert

Lesser Diamond Spellstone.text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. @(Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
Lesser Diamond Spellstone.name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
Lesser Diamond Spellstone.flavor:
A diamond, white, this stone the eighth
A precious jewel for those of faith
A whispered prayer restores the lost
But none among them know the cost.
Lesser Diamond Spellstone.collectionText: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. (Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)

Gnomeregan Infantry.name: Gnomeregan Infantry
Gnomeregan Infantry.flavor: The gnomes are valiant and ready to return to their irradiated, poorly ventilated homeland!

Leeching Poison.name: Leeching Poison
Leeching Poison.flavor: No actual leeches were harmed in the creation of this card.

Shadow Sensei.name: Shadow Sensei
Shadow Sensei.flavor: He used to be Aya's tutor, but she fired him for bugging her too much.

Sonya Shadowdancer.text: After a friendly minion dies, add a 1/1 copy of it to your hand. It costs (1).
Sonya Shadowdancer.name: Sonya Shadowdancer
Sonya Shadowdancer.flavor: Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like a 1/1 is watching.

Cave Hydra.text:
Also damages the minions next to whomever
this attacks.
Cave Hydra.name: Cave Hydra
Cave Hydra.flavor: Can be upgraded into a Cave Lurker.

Bear Trap.text: Secret: After your hero is attacked, summon a 3/3 Bear with Taunt.
Bear Trap.name: Bear Trap
Bear Trap.flavor: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.

Worgen Greaser.name: Worgen Greaser
Worgen Greaser.flavor: Hair products are 79% of his monthly budget.

Pompous Thespian.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Pompous Thespian.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Pompous Thespian.name: Pompous Thespian
Pompous Thespian.flavor: Alas poor Annoy-o-Tron! A fellow of infinite jest, of most excellent fancy!

Yogg-Saron, Hope's End.text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell for each spell you've cast this game (targets chosen randomly).
Yogg-Saron, Hope's End.name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
Yogg-Saron, Hope's End.flavor: I spell your doom... Y-O-U-R D-O-O-M!

Holy Fire.text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
Holy Fire.name: Holy Fire

Cloaked Huntress.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Cloaked Huntress.name: Cloaked Huntress
Cloaked Huntress.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Cloaked Huntress.flavor: She's practically GIVING your secrets away!

Goblin Sapper.text: Has +4 Attack while your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand.
Goblin Sapper.name: Goblin Sapper
Goblin Sapper.flavor: He’s not such a binge exploder anymore. These days, he only explodes socially.

Prince Keleseth.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 2-Cost cards, give all minions in your deck +1/+1.
Prince Keleseth.name: Prince Keleseth
Prince Keleseth.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to buff his brothers.

The Last Kaleidosaur.text: Quest: Cast 6 spells on your minions. Reward: Galvadon.
The Last Kaleidosaur.name: The Last Kaleidosaur
The Last Kaleidosaur.flavor: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

Saboteur.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's Hero Power costs (5) more next turn.
Saboteur.name: Saboteur
Saboteur.flavor: Listen all y'all it's a saboteur!

Wind-up Burglebot.text: Whenever this attacks a minion and survives, draw a card.
Wind-up Burglebot.name: Wind-up Burglebot
Wind-up Burglebot.flavor: Don't blame the bot for his crimes...  Blame whoever keeps winding him up!

Hellfire.name: Hellfire
Hellfire.flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

Ancient Shade.text: Battlecry: Shuffle an 'Ancient Curse' into your deck that deals 7 damage to you when drawn.
Ancient Shade.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Ancient Shade.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Ancient Shade.name: Ancient Shade
Ancient Shade.flavor: Warning: Do not expose to direct sunlight.

Archmage.name: Archmage
Archmage.flavor: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

Corpsetaker.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain Taunt if your deck has a Taunt minion. Repeat for Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Windfury.
Corpsetaker.name: Corpsetaker
Corpsetaker.flavor: Her extensive collection of corpses includes one of nearly every type.  She'd love for you to join it.

Bestial Wrath.text: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
Bestial Wrath.name: Bestial Wrath
Bestial Wrath.flavor: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

Cobalt Scalebane.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
Cobalt Scalebane.name: Cobalt Scalebane
Cobalt Scalebane.flavor: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

Gentle Megasaur.name: Gentle Megasaur
Gentle Megasaur.flavor: "Low, low rents! Must enjoy a nomadic lifestyle. Quasi-sentient, bipedal, amphibious humanoids ONLY!"

Klaxxi Amber-Weaver.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain +5 Health.
Klaxxi Amber-Weaver.name: Klaxxi Amber-Weaver
Klaxxi Amber-Weaver.flavor: Amberweaving is a specialty course at the local trade school.

Twilight Whelp.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
Twilight Whelp.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Twilight Whelp.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Twilight Whelp.name: Twilight Whelp
Twilight Whelp.flavor: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.

Scourgelord Garrosh.text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3 Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.
Scourgelord Garrosh.name: Scourgelord Garrosh
Scourgelord Garrosh.flavor: "You dare to challenge me? Come! Draw your last breath - and then, you are mine."

Stonesplinter Trogg.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +1 Attack.
Stonesplinter Trogg.name: Stonesplinter Trogg
Stonesplinter Trogg.flavor: The only thing worse than smelling troggs is listening to their poetry.

Captain's Parrot.text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate from your deck.
Captain's Parrot.howToEarnGolden: Unlocked when you have all the Golden Pirates from the Expert Set.
Captain's Parrot.howToEarn: Unlocked when you have all the Pirates from the Classic Set.
Captain's Parrot.name: Captain's Parrot
Captain's Parrot.flavor: Pirates and Parrots go together like Virmen and Carrots.

Upgraded Repair Bot.name: Upgraded Repair Bot
Upgraded Repair Bot.flavor: It's the same as the previous generation but they slapped the word "upgraded" on it to sell it for double.

Sneed's Old Shredder.name: Sneed's Old Shredder
Sneed's Old Shredder.flavor: When Sneed was defeated in the Deadmines, his shredder was sold at auction to an anonymous buyer. (Probably Hogger.)

Cavern Shinyfinder.text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon from your deck.
Cavern Shinyfinder.name: Cavern Shinyfinder
Cavern Shinyfinder.flavor: They call her the candled vandal.

Nat Pagle.text: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
Nat Pagle.name: Nat Pagle
Nat Pagle.flavor: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman!  He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

Shadow Word: Death.text: Destroy a minion with 5 or more Attack.
Shadow Word: Death.name: Shadow Word: Death
Shadow Word: Death.flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

Maelstrom Portal.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Maelstrom Portal.text:
Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Summon a random
1-Cost minion.
Maelstrom Portal.name: Maelstrom Portal
Maelstrom Portal.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Maelstrom Portal.flavor: They bill this as a popular resort attraction, but they try and get your money up front.

Snake Trap.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.
Snake Trap.name: Snake Trap
Snake Trap.flavor: Why did it have to be snakes?

Thoughtsteal.text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
Thoughtsteal.name: Thoughtsteal
Thoughtsteal.flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

Frost Shock.text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
Frost Shock.name: Frost Shock

Dark Pact.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Restore #8 Health to your hero.
Dark Pact.name: Dark Pact
Dark Pact.flavor: "Don't worry about the fine print. Just sign here."

Doomerang.text: Throw your weapon at a minion. It deals its damage, then returns to your hand.
Doomerang.name: Doomerang
Doomerang.flavor: Guaranteed to return your weapon directly to your hand! (Wear gloves. Thick ones.)

Bog Creeper.name: Bog Creeper
Bog Creeper.flavor: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

Sewer Crawler.name: Sewer Crawler
Sewer Crawler.flavor: His clothing is "ratty" in more ways than one.

Prince Malchezaar.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Prince Malchezaar.text: [x]When the game starts, add 5 extra Legendary minions to your deck.
Prince Malchezaar.name: Prince Malchezaar
Prince Malchezaar.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Prince Malchezaar.flavor: He was super excited to acquire Gorehowl at a garage sale!  Then super disappointed to find out it was a foam reproduction.

Curse of Rafaam.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Curse of Rafaam.text:
Give your opponent a 'Cursed!' card.
While they hold it, they take 2 damage on their turn.
Curse of Rafaam.name: Curse of Rafaam
Curse of Rafaam.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Curse of Rafaam.flavor: This is what happens when Rafaam stubs his toe unexpectedly.

Twilight Elder.text: At the end of your turn, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Twilight Elder.name: Twilight Elder
Twilight Elder.flavor: Just doesn't understand those Twilight Youngsters any more - with their comic books and their rock music.

Small-Time Buccaneer.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a weapon equipped.
Small-Time Buccaneer.name: Small-Time Buccaneer
Small-Time Buccaneer.flavor: "Oh, I'm not serious about it.  I only pirate on the weekends."

Stormwind Champion.name: Stormwind Champion
Stormwind Champion.flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

Goblin Auto-Barber.name: Goblin Auto-Barber
Goblin Auto-Barber.flavor: This guy is excellent at adjusting your haircut and/or height.

Moat Lurker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Moat Lurker.name: Moat Lurker
Moat Lurker.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Moat Lurker.flavor: He really enjoys lurking and gets a lot of job satisfaction out of it.

Vanish.text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.
Vanish.name: Vanish

Bash.name: Bash
Bash.flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

Assassin's Blade.name: Assassin's Blade
Assassin's Blade.flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

Drakkari Enchanter.text: Your end of turn effects trigger twice.
Drakkari Enchanter.name: Drakkari Enchanter
Drakkari Enchanter.flavor: Drakkari sorceresses have the irritating habit of repeating themselves at the end of every sentence. Every sentence.

Pit Fighter.name: Pit Fighter
Pit Fighter.flavor: What did the pits ever do to you?

Cornered Sentry.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Raptors for your opponent.
Cornered Sentry.name: Cornered Sentry
Cornered Sentry.flavor: The Draenei are seriously considering cancelling "Bring Your Murderous Pet to Work Day."

Water Elemental.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
Water Elemental.name: Water Elemental
Water Elemental.flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

Madder Bomber.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split between all other characters.
Madder Bomber.name: Madder Bomber

Argent Watchman.text: Can't attack. Inspire: Can attack as normal this turn.
Argent Watchman.name: Argent Watchman
Argent Watchman.flavor: Who argent watches the Argent Watchman?

Flanking Strike.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
Flanking Strike.name: Flanking Strike
Flanking Strike.flavor: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

Sudden Genesis.text: Summon copies of your damaged minions.
Sudden Genesis.name: Sudden Genesis
Sudden Genesis.flavor: Being hurt can make you another person.

Lesser Mithril Spellstone.text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
Lesser Mithril Spellstone.name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
Lesser Mithril Spellstone.flavor:
To dwarves of stone the demon called
With promises of might, enthralled
In grasping greed they found their doom
Forever bound in mithril tombs.

Unstable Evolution.text:
Transform a friendly minion into
one that costs (1) more. Repeatable this turn.
Unstable Evolution.name: Unstable Evolution

Hooded Acolyte.text: Whenever a character is healed, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Hooded Acolyte.name: Hooded Acolyte
Hooded Acolyte.flavor: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

Wilfred Fizzlebang.text: Cards you draw from your Hero Power cost (0).
Wilfred Fizzlebang.name: Wilfred Fizzlebang
Wilfred Fizzlebang.flavor:
He can summon anything, even a FEARSOME DOOMGUARD*.
*He's pretty sure this is going to work out.

Metaltooth Leaper.name: Metaltooth Leaper
Metaltooth Leaper.flavor: Don't leave them out in the rain. In Un'Goro Crater there is a whole colony of rust-tooth leapers.

Cabal Shadow Priest.text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
Cabal Shadow Priest.name: Cabal Shadow Priest
Cabal Shadow Priest.targetingArrowText: Steal a minion that has 2 or less Attack.
Cabal Shadow Priest.flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

Steam Surger.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, add a 'Flame Geyser' to your hand.
Steam Surger.name: Steam Surger
Steam Surger.flavor: Explorers nicknamed him the Teapot Elemental.

Freezing Potion.name: Freezing Potion
Freezing Potion.flavor: This is delicious! Oh no. BRAIN FREEEEEEEZE!

Lilian Voss.text: Battlecry: Replace spells in your hand with random spells (from your opponent's class).
Lilian Voss.name: Lilian Voss
Lilian Voss.flavor: She doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And she absolutely will not stop... ever, until all necromancers are dead.

Silence.name: Silence
Silence.flavor: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

Tomb Spider.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Tomb Spider.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Tomb Spider.name: Tomb Spider
Tomb Spider.flavor: Less serious than its cousin, the Grave Spider.

Spiteful Smith.name: Spiteful Smith
Spiteful Smith.flavor: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

Anima Golem.text: At the end of each turn, destroy this minion if it's your only one.
Anima Golem.name: Anima Golem
Anima Golem.flavor: The Dark Animus is evil and mysterious and huge and unable to write sentences that utilize proper grammar.

DOOM!.text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
DOOM!.name: DOOM!
DOOM!.flavor: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

The Voraxx.text:
[x]After you cast a spell on
this minion, summon a
1/1 Plant and cast
another copy on it.
The Voraxx.name: The Voraxx
The Voraxx.flavor: I am the Voraxx.  I speak for the weeds.

Chittering Tunneler.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Deal damage to your hero equal to its Cost.
Chittering Tunneler.name: Chittering Tunneler
Chittering Tunneler.flavor: Ear to the ground, he carefully interpreted the chittering noises: “You wanna cast a spell? I wanna cast a spell!”

Unstable Portal.text: Add a random minion to your hand. It costs (3) less.
Unstable Portal.name: Unstable Portal
Unstable Portal.flavor: The denizens of Azeroth have no idea how much work goes into stabilizing portals.  We spend like 30% of GDP on portal upkeep.

Headcrack.text: Deal $2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
Headcrack.name: Headcrack
Headcrack.flavor: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

Fiery War Axe.name: Fiery War Axe
Fiery War Axe.flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

Fossilized Devilsaur.text: Battlecry: If you control a Beast, gain Taunt.
Fossilized Devilsaur.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Fossilized Devilsaur.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Fossilized Devilsaur.name: Fossilized Devilsaur
Fossilized Devilsaur.flavor: This was the only job he could get after the dinosaur theme park debacle.

Jeweled Macaw.text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
Jeweled Macaw.name: Jeweled Macaw
Jeweled Macaw.flavor: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

Rin, the First Disciple.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
Rin, the First Disciple.name: Rin, the First Disciple
Rin, the First Disciple.flavor: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

Fel Cannon.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a non-Mech minion.
Fel Cannon.name: Fel Cannon
Fel Cannon.flavor: The box says, "New and improved, with 200% more fel!"

Saronite Chain Gang.text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
Saronite Chain Gang.name: Saronite Chain Gang

Aluneth.text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
Aluneth.name: Aluneth
Aluneth.flavor: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

Animated Armor.text: Your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.
Animated Armor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Animated Armor.name: Animated Armor
Animated Armor.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Animated Armor.flavor: Try putting it on.  Wait, let me get my camera.

Emperor Cobra.name: Emperor Cobra
Emperor Cobra.flavor: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you're going to visit, wear bug spray.  And plate armor.

Wrathguard.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
Wrathguard.name: Wrathguard
Wrathguard.flavor: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.

Spirit Echo.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Return  this to your hand."
Spirit Echo.name: Spirit Echo
Spirit Echo.flavor: I guess you can say they’re… “soul survivors.”

Ship's Cannon.text: After you summon a Pirate, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Ship's Cannon.name: Ship's Cannon
Ship's Cannon.flavor: If you hear someone yell, "Cannonball!" you're about to get wet. Or crushed.

Argent Squire.name: Argent Squire
Argent Squire.flavor: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

N'Zoth, the Corruptor.text: Battlecry: Summon your Deathrattle minions that died this game.
N'Zoth, the Corruptor.name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor
N'Zoth, the Corruptor.flavor: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.

Cat Trick.text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a 4/2 Panther with Stealth.
Cat Trick.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Cat Trick.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Cat Trick.name: Cat Trick
Cat Trick.flavor: "I know some new tricks, a lot of good tricks. I will show them to you. Medivh will not mind at all if I do."

Nat, the Darkfisher.text: At the start of your opponent's turn, they have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
Nat, the Darkfisher.name: Nat, the Darkfisher
Nat, the Darkfisher.flavor: You can take away his humanity, but you will never take away his fishing pole.

Lesser Ruby Spellstone.text: Add 1 random Mage spell to your hand. @(Play 2 Elementals to upgrade.)
Lesser Ruby Spellstone.name: Lesser Ruby Spellstone
Lesser Ruby Spellstone.flavor:
The final stone undid its master
Spun into wards by nameless caster
Azari wailed a savage roar
Now sealed in nether, evermore.
Lesser Ruby Spellstone.collectionText: Add 1 random Mage spell to your hand. (Play 2 Elementals to upgrade.)

Baron Geddon.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
Baron Geddon.name: Baron Geddon
Baron Geddon.flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

Pit Snake.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Pit Snake.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Pit Snake.name: Pit Snake
Pit Snake.flavor: It could be worse.  It could be a Snake Pit.

Pilfered Power.text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal for each friendly minion.
Pilfered Power.name: Pilfered Power
Pilfered Power.flavor: The Hozen don't get paid much, but at least they get to keep any excess mana.

Hyldnir Frostrider.name: Hyldnir Frostrider
Hyldnir Frostrider.flavor: Don't be fooled, that polar bear's the one in charge.

Doomcaller.text: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is). If it's dead, shuffle it into your deck.
Doomcaller.name: Doomcaller
Doomcaller.flavor: "Hello, is Doom there? No? Can I leave a message?"

Doomed Apprentice.name: Doomed Apprentice
Doomed Apprentice.flavor: Jaina was never good at keeping up apprentices.

The Caverns Below.text: [x]Quest: Play five minions with the same name. Reward: Crystal Core.
The Caverns Below.name: The Caverns Below
The Caverns Below.flavor: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

Bouncing Blade.text: Deal $1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.
Bouncing Blade.name: Bouncing Blade
Bouncing Blade.flavor: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

Flare.text: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.
Flare.name: Flare
Flare.flavor: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!

Roll the Bones.text: Draw a card. If it has Deathrattle, cast this again.
Roll the Bones.name: Roll the Bones

Eydis Darkbane.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
Eydis Darkbane.name: Eydis Darkbane

Drain Soul.name: Drain Soul
Drain Soul.flavor: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

Jade Behemoth.name: Jade Behemoth
Jade Behemoth.flavor: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

Bane of Doom.text: Deal $2 damage to a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
Bane of Doom.name: Bane of Doom
Bane of Doom.flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

Selfless Hero.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
Selfless Hero.name: Selfless Hero
Selfless Hero.flavor: "Don't worry about me… I'll just be here... under these tentacles."

Grotesque Dragonhawk.name: Grotesque Dragonhawk
Grotesque Dragonhawk.flavor: They say that "grotesque is in the eye of the beholder," but that's just because they've never seen a Grotesque Dragonhawk. Yikes!

Grim Patron.text: After this minion survives damage, summon another Grim Patron.
Grim Patron.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Grim Patron.name: Grim Patron
Grim Patron.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Grim Patron.flavor: If you love getting your face punched, come to the Grim Guzzler!

Greater Arcane Missiles.text: Shoot three missiles at random enemies that deal $3 damage each.
Greater Arcane Missiles.name: Greater Arcane Missiles
Greater Arcane Missiles.flavor: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

Shadow Essence.text: Summon a 5/5 copy of a random minion in your deck.
Shadow Essence.name: Shadow Essence
Shadow Essence.flavor: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

Keeper of the Grove.text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.
Keeper of the Grove.name: Keeper of the Grove
Keeper of the Grove.flavor: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

Tortollan Forager.text: Battlecry: Add a random minion with 5 or more Attack to your hand.
Tortollan Forager.name: Tortollan Forager
Tortollan Forager.flavor: In the Tortollan tongue, Un’goro is known as the “Land of the Lost and Found.”

Dirty Rat.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Your opponent summons a random minion from their hand.
Dirty Rat.name: Dirty Rat
Dirty Rat.flavor: It's not his fault…  Someone keeps stealing his soap!

Demonwrath.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Demonwrath.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to all
minions except Demons.
Demonwrath.name: Demonwrath
Demonwrath.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Demonwrath.flavor: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.

Tauren Warrior.name: Tauren Warrior
Tauren Warrior.flavor: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

Twilight Drake.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
Twilight Drake.name: Twilight Drake
Twilight Drake.flavor: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.

Fandral Staghelm.text: Your Choose One cards and powers have both effects combined.
Fandral Staghelm.name: Fandral Staghelm
Fandral Staghelm.flavor: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Tree…" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.

Anyfin Can Happen.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Anyfin Can Happen.text: Summon 7 Murlocs that died this game.
Anyfin Can Happen.name: Anyfin Can Happen
Anyfin Can Happen.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Anyfin Can Happen.flavor: Theme song by Ellie Goldfin and Blagghghlrlrl Harris.

Stablemaster.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast Immune this turn.
Stablemaster.name: Stablemaster
Stablemaster.flavor: Takes way better care of her pets than her brother, Unstablemaster.

Thing from Below.text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
Thing from Below.name: Thing from Below
Thing from Below.flavor: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

Devilsaur Egg.name: Devilsaur Egg
Devilsaur Egg.flavor: A key ingredient in all discerning Funnel Cake recipes.

Ancient Harbinger.text: At the start of your turn, put a 10-Cost minion from your deck into your hand.
Ancient Harbinger.name: Ancient Harbinger
Ancient Harbinger.flavor: "honey, can u run down to the store and pick up some 10 cost minions? thx"

Priest of the Feast.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, restore 3 Health to
your hero.
Priest of the Feast.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Priest of the Feast.name: Priest of the Feast
Priest of the Feast.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Priest of the Feast.flavor: Now that's a world champion cheesecake!

Floating Watcher.text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.
Floating Watcher.name: Floating Watcher
Floating Watcher.flavor: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.

Arcanologist.name: Arcanologist
Arcanologist.flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

Eternal Servitude.text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
Eternal Servitude.name: Eternal Servitude
Eternal Servitude.flavor: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

Puddlestomper.name: Puddlestomper
Puddlestomper.flavor: He pays homage to Morgl, the great murloc oracle! (Who doesn't??)

Webspinner.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Beast card to your hand.
Webspinner.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Webspinner.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Webspinner.name: Webspinner
Webspinner.flavor: Spider cocoons are like little piñatas!

Foe Reaper 4000.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever it attacks.
Foe Reaper 4000.name: Foe Reaper 4000
Foe Reaper 4000.flavor: Foe reaping is really not so different from harvest reaping, at the end of the day.

Fungalmancer.name: Fungalmancer
Fungalmancer.flavor: Fungalmancy is the easy major for those who can't cut it at Waxmancy.

Animal Companion.name: Animal Companion
Animal Companion.flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

Quick Shot.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Quick Shot.text:
Deal $3 damage.
If your hand is empty, draw a card.
Quick Shot.name: Quick Shot
Quick Shot.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Arcane Nullifier X-21.text: Taunt Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Arcane Nullifier X-21.name: Arcane Nullifier X-21
Arcane Nullifier X-21.flavor: There was some hard talk between gnome magi and engineers about inventing this mech.

Auctionmaster Beardo.text: After you cast a spell, refresh your Hero Power.
Auctionmaster Beardo.name: Auctionmaster Beardo
Auctionmaster Beardo.flavor: Gadgetzan has always run an under-the-table auction house, and business has been PRETTY good for Beardo since the population explosion.  And since the explosion that destroyed the competing auction houses in the city.

Nesting Roc.text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, gain Taunt.
Nesting Roc.name: Nesting Roc
Nesting Roc.flavor: Roc eggs are great in omelettes, sandwiches, and as bait to turn poachers into bird food.

Ornery Direhorn.name: Ornery Direhorn
Ornery Direhorn.flavor: "It's an herbivore.  How dangerous can it be?"  - Famous last words

Gadgetzan Auctioneer.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
Gadgetzan Auctioneer.name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
Gadgetzan Auctioneer.flavor: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

Unearthed Raptor.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle.
Unearthed Raptor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Unearthed Raptor.name: Unearthed Raptor
Unearthed Raptor.flavor: Still hunting for the ones who earthed him.
Unearthed Raptor.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Jade Chieftain.name: Jade Chieftain
Jade Chieftain.flavor: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

Burgle.text: Add 2 random class cards to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Burgle.name: Burgle

Phantom Freebooter.text: Battlecry: Gain stats equal to your weapon's.
Phantom Freebooter.name: Phantom Freebooter
Phantom Freebooter.flavor: There's no such thing as a free boot.

Blood Razor.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
Blood Razor.name: Blood Razor
Blood Razor.flavor: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

Stoneskin Basilisk.name: Stoneskin Basilisk
Stoneskin Basilisk.flavor: He got that way from looking into a mirror.

Obsidian Destroyer.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
Obsidian Destroyer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Obsidian Destroyer.name: Obsidian Destroyer
Obsidian Destroyer.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Obsidian Destroyer.flavor: No obsidian is safe around the Obsidian Destroyer!

Hoarding Dragon.name: Hoarding Dragon
Hoarding Dragon.flavor: Keeps his two cents to himself.

Kor'kron Elite.name: Kor'kron Elite
Kor'kron Elite.flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

Wildwalker.name: Wildwalker
Wildwalker.flavor: She was born to be something.  She is just not quite sure what yet...

Jinyu Waterspeaker.name: Jinyu Waterspeaker
Jinyu Waterspeaker.flavor: Waterspeakers can tell the future! So the Jade Lotus employs them to speculate on the Auction House.

Mini-Mage.name: Mini-Mage
Mini-Mage.flavor: He is sometimes found hiding in the treasure chest in the Gurubashi Arena.

Lightspawn.text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
Lightspawn.name: Lightspawn
Lightspawn.flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

Youthful Brewmaster.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
Youthful Brewmaster.name: Youthful Brewmaster
Youthful Brewmaster.targetingArrowText: Return a minion to your hand.
Youthful Brewmaster.flavor: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews.   Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

Lyra the Sunshard.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a random Priest spell to your hand.
Lyra the Sunshard.name: Lyra the Sunshard
Lyra the Sunshard.flavor: Arise, fair sun, and kill my envious foes. They don't have a legendary as beautiful as you.

Dark Arakkoa.name: Dark Arakkoa
Dark Arakkoa.flavor: There's a whole gradient of Arakkoa! This one is on the darker side.

Chillwind Yeti.name: Chillwind Yeti
Chillwind Yeti.flavor: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

Tentacle of N'Zoth.name: Tentacle of N'Zoth
Tentacle of N'Zoth.flavor: Because EVERYDAY is the Day of the Tentacle of N'zoth.

Mayor Noggenfogger.name: Mayor Noggenfogger
Mayor Noggenfogger.flavor: This flavor text was randomly generated.  If it happens to form words and make sense, that is purely by chance.

Brrrloc.name: Brrrloc
Brrrloc.flavor: He may be frozen fish, but he fights fresh!

Branching Paths.text: [x]Choose Twice - Draw a card; Give your minions +1 Attack; Gain 6 Armor.
Branching Paths.name: Branching Paths
Branching Paths.flavor:
Three paths diverged in a darkened hall, and I –
I took the one less traveled by,
And got eaten by a slime.

Squirming Tentacle.name: Squirming Tentacle
Squirming Tentacle.flavor: Yeah, I think we can agree that killing the squirming tentacle first is a good idea.

Acolyte of Agony.name: Acolyte of Agony
Acolyte of Agony.flavor: It takes many years of practiced study in order to fully master agony.

Silithid Swarmer.text: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.
Silithid Swarmer.name: Silithid Swarmer
Silithid Swarmer.flavor: If your hero doesn't attack, it's just "Silithid Loner".

Entomb.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Entomb.text:
Choose an enemy minion.
Shuffle it into your deck.
Entomb.name: Entomb
Entomb.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Entomb.flavor: It's perfectly safe as long as you remember to put in air holes.

Summoning Stone.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
Summoning Stone.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Summoning Stone.name: Summoning Stone
Summoning Stone.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Summoning Stone.flavor: Sometimes it feels like it's always the same slackers that are waiting for a summon.

Darkbomb.name: Darkbomb
Darkbomb.flavor: If you're looking to make an "Emo" deck, this card is perfect!

Exploding Bloatbat.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
Exploding Bloatbat.name: Exploding Bloatbat
Exploding Bloatbat.flavor: We've all been there after a night of one-too-many funnel cakes.

Evil Heckler.name: Evil Heckler
Evil Heckler.flavor: To be honest, heckling is not the most effective form of evil.

King Krush.name: King Krush
King Krush.flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

Arathi Weaponsmith.name: Arathi Weaponsmith
Arathi Weaponsmith.flavor: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

Arcane Explosion.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
Arcane Explosion.name: Arcane Explosion
Arcane Explosion.flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

Bloodbloom.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
Bloodbloom.name: Bloodbloom
Bloodbloom.flavor: Help save mana.  Donate blood today!

Siege Engine.text: Whenever you gain Armor, give this minion +1 Attack.
Siege Engine.name: Siege Engine

Shrinkmeister.text: Battlecry: Give a minion -2 Attack this turn.
Shrinkmeister.name: Shrinkmeister
Shrinkmeister.flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

Mana Geode.text: Whenever this minion is healed, summon a 2/2 Crystal.
Mana Geode.name: Mana Geode
Mana Geode.flavor: Gadgetzan, where even the pet rocks have pet rocks.

Truesilver Champion.text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.
Truesilver Champion.name: Truesilver Champion
Truesilver Champion.flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

Hobart Grapplehammer.text: Battlecry: Give all weapons in your hand and deck +1 Attack.
Hobart Grapplehammer.name: Hobart Grapplehammer
Hobart Grapplehammer.flavor: Grapplehammer is the horrible mind behind the Automatic Piranha Launcher (banned in 7 districts)!

Temporus.text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
Temporus.name: Temporus
Temporus.flavor: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

Ethereal Conjurer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Ethereal Conjurer.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Ethereal Conjurer.name: Ethereal Conjurer
Ethereal Conjurer.flavor: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.

Night Howler.text:
Whenever this minion takes
damage, gain +2 Attack.
Night Howler.name: Night Howler
Night Howler.flavor: Honestly, he howls during the day, too.

Leeroy Jenkins.text: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
Leeroy Jenkins.name: Leeroy Jenkins
Leeroy Jenkins.flavor: At least he has Angry Chicken.

Mogor's Champion.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Mogor's Champion.name: Mogor's Champion
Mogor's Champion.flavor: This champion has learned from the best.  Except for his target selection.

Gazlowe.text: Whenever you cast a 1-mana spell, add a random Mech to your hand.
Gazlowe.name: Gazlowe
Gazlowe.flavor: Gazlowe was voted "Most Likely to Explode" in high school.

Blastcrystal Potion.text: Destroy a minion and one of your Mana Crystals.
Blastcrystal Potion.name: Blastcrystal Potion
Blastcrystal Potion.flavor: There's a fine line between "potion" and "grenade". Wait. Actually, there's not.

Cyclopian Horror.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each enemy minion.
Cyclopian Horror.name: Cyclopian Horror
Cyclopian Horror.flavor: What are the qualifications for being a 'Horror?'  Just how horrible do you have to be?

Shadow Strike.text: Deal $5 damage to an undamaged character.
Shadow Strike.name: Shadow Strike
Shadow Strike.flavor: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.

Ancestor's Call.text: Put a random minion from each player's hand into the battlefield.
Ancestor's Call.name: Ancestor's Call

Cold Blood.text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
Cold Blood.name: Cold Blood
Cold Blood.flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

Corruption.text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
Corruption.name: Corruption
Corruption.flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOM!  Corrupted!

Vaporize.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
Vaporize.name: Vaporize
Vaporize.flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

Void Terror.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy both adjacent minions and gain their Attack and Health.
Void Terror.name: Void Terror
Void Terror.flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

Captured Jormungar.name: Captured Jormungar
Captured Jormungar.flavor: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!

Anub'arak.text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand and summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
Anub'arak.name: Anub'arak
Anub'arak.flavor: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.

Tournament Medic.name: Tournament Medic
Tournament Medic.flavor: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.

Knuckles.text:
After this attacks a
minion, it also hits the enemy hero.
Knuckles.name: Knuckles
Knuckles.flavor: When confronted with accusations of performance-enhancing bananas, Knuckles replied, "I get my fruit from trees I knock down with my bare hands like everyone else."

Frostwolf Grunt.name: Frostwolf Grunt
Frostwolf Grunt.flavor: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It's more than just a job.

Deathstalker Rexxar.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
Deathstalker Rexxar.name: Deathstalker Rexxar
Deathstalker Rexxar.flavor: "You were too slow, old friend. The hunt began long ago. And now... it will never end."

Shadowcaster.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a 1/1 copy to your hand that costs (1).
Shadowcaster.name: Shadowcaster
Shadowcaster.flavor: I mean, it's not creepy if you ASK before you steal their shadow to make a small replica of them to keep on your shelf.

Pint-Size Potion.text:
[x]Give all enemy minions
-3 Attack this turn only.
Pint-Size Potion.name: Pint-Size Potion
Pint-Size Potion.flavor: I hope you didn't disenchant your Shadow Word: Horror!

Master Swordsmith.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
Master Swordsmith.name: Master Swordsmith
Master Swordsmith.flavor: He's currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can't be done.

Power Overwhelming.text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
Power Overwhelming.name: Power Overwhelming
Power Overwhelming.flavor: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.

Corrosive Sludge.name: Corrosive Sludge
Corrosive Sludge.flavor: The result of centuries of terrible sanitation.

Mana Wyrm.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
Mana Wyrm.name: Mana Wyrm
Mana Wyrm.flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

Voodoo Hexxer.text: Taunt Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
Voodoo Hexxer.name: Voodoo Hexxer
Voodoo Hexxer.flavor: The Silver Hand recruits shuddered in terror when they saw the dreaded totem of the Hexxer: A tiny little snowman, impaled with pins.

Coliseum Manager.text: Inspire: Return this minion to your hand.
Coliseum Manager.name: Coliseum Manager
Coliseum Manager.flavor: Meets monthly with the gladiators to discuss career goals.

Stone Sentinel.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 2/3 Elementals with Taunt.
Stone Sentinel.name: Stone Sentinel
Stone Sentinel.flavor: He and his friends just want to rock out.

Stormwind Knight.name: Stormwind Knight
Stormwind Knight.flavor: They're still embarrassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

Dancing Swords.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Dancing Swords.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Dancing Swords.name: Dancing Swords
Dancing Swords.flavor: They like to dance to reggae.

Sabretooth Stalker.name: Sabretooth Stalker
Sabretooth Stalker.flavor: It's gotten a bit long in the tooth.

Servant of Yogg-Saron.text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell that costs (5) or less (targets chosen randomly).
Servant of Yogg-Saron.name: Servant of Yogg-Saron
Servant of Yogg-Saron.flavor: Yogg-Saron always likes to complain about how he has too many servants and there are too many mouths to feed.

Desperate Stand.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Return this to life with 1 Health."
Desperate Stand.name: Desperate Stand
Desperate Stand.flavor: They're grateful for the help, but most minions would prefer not dying in the first place.

Shrieking Shroom.text:
At the end of your turn, summon a random
1-Cost minion.
Shrieking Shroom.name: Shrieking Shroom
Shrieking Shroom.flavor: Auditioning for the next Fungal Idol.

Flame Lance.name: Flame Lance
Flame Lance.flavor: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

Boulderfist Ogre.name: Boulderfist Ogre
Boulderfist Ogre.flavor: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

Moonglade Portal.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Moonglade Portal.text:
Restore #6 Health. Summon a random
6-Cost minion.
Moonglade Portal.name: Moonglade Portal
Moonglade Portal.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Moonglade Portal.flavor: Ain't no party like a Moonglade party ‘cause a Moonglade party got bears.

Dust Devil.name: Dust Devil
Dust Devil.flavor: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

Alexstrasza's Champion.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Charge.
Alexstrasza's Champion.name: Alexstrasza's Champion
Alexstrasza's Champion.flavor: "Put more spikes on her.  No, more spikes.  What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand?  MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza

Hot Spring Guardian.name: Hot Spring Guardian
Hot Spring Guardian.flavor: NONE SHALL PASS until at least an hour after eating.

Ultrasaur.name: Ultrasaur
Ultrasaur.flavor: Evolved the really long neck to spy on its neighbors.

Lightwarden.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
Lightwarden.name: Lightwarden
Lightwarden.flavor: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

Zola the Gorgon.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
Zola the Gorgon.name: Zola the Gorgon
Zola the Gorgon.flavor: Her name seems a bit cheesy.

Poisoned Blade.text: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.
Poisoned Blade.name: Poisoned Blade
Poisoned Blade.flavor: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

Stormcrack.name: Stormcrack
Stormcrack.flavor: WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE PURPLE BALL OF LIGHTNING

Warbot.name: Warbot
Warbot.flavor: Mass production of warbots was halted when it was discovered that they were accidentally being produced at "sample size."

Silent Knight.name: Silent Knight
Silent Knight.flavor: He used to be a librarian.  Old habits die hard.

Wild Growth.name: Wild Growth
Wild Growth.flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

C'Thun's Chosen.text: [x]Divine Shield Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
C'Thun's Chosen.name: C'Thun's Chosen
C'Thun's Chosen.flavor: He gave her a promise ring and everything.

Arch-Thief Rafaam.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Arch-Thief Rafaam.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Arch-Thief Rafaam.name: Arch-Thief Rafaam
Arch-Thief Rafaam.flavor: He's very good at retrieving artifacts.  From other people's museums.

Wretched Tiller.text: Whenever this minion attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Wretched Tiller.name: Wretched Tiller
Wretched Tiller.flavor: If you ever tried to plow permafrost, you’d be wretched, too.

Silverback Patriarch.name: Silverback Patriarch
Silverback Patriarch.flavor: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

Sabotage.text: Destroy a random enemy minion. Combo: And your opponent's weapon.
Sabotage.name: Sabotage
Sabotage.flavor: Rogues can't stand it. They know you planned it! They are going to set you straight!

Earth Shock.text: Silence a minion, then deal $1 damage to it.
Earth Shock.name: Earth Shock
Earth Shock.flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

Spirit Claws.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Spirit Claws.name: Spirit Claws
Spirit Claws.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Spirit Claws.flavor: They'll be MUCH easier to use once they add the spiritthumb.

Cruel Dinomancer.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random minion you discarded this game.
Cruel Dinomancer.name: Cruel Dinomancer
Cruel Dinomancer.flavor: As that old saying goes: "you don't get into dinomancing to make friends."

Bonemare.name: Bonemare
Bonemare.flavor: Attacks her job with unbridled enthusiasm.

Counterspell.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

Hallazeal the Ascended.text: Whenever your spells deal damage, restore that much Health to your hero.
Hallazeal the Ascended.name: Hallazeal the Ascended

Gnomeferatu.text: Battlecry: Remove the top card of your opponent's deck.
Gnomeferatu.name: Gnomeferatu

Healing Rain.text: Restore #12 Health randomly split among all friendly characters.
Healing Rain.name: Healing Rain

Howling Commander.text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine Shield minion from your deck.
Howling Commander.name: Howling Commander
Howling Commander.flavor: Enlistment in her battalion comes with several pairs of earplugs.

Powershot.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
Powershot.name: Powershot

Deathlord.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Your opponent puts a minion from their deck into the battlefield.
Deathlord.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Deathlord.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Deathlord.name: Deathlord

Stampede.text: Each time you play a Beast this turn, add a random Beast to your hand.
Stampede.name: Stampede
Stampede.flavor: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

Webweave.name: Webweave
Webweave.flavor: O, what a tangled web we weave, hoping spiders dodge the cleave.

Crowd Favorite.text: Whenever you play a card with Battlecry, gain +1/+1.
Crowd Favorite.name: Crowd Favorite

Spellbender.text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
Spellbender.name: Spellbender
Spellbender.flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

Kabal Lackey.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
Kabal Lackey.name: Kabal Lackey
Kabal Lackey.flavor: I'll tell you one thing he doesn't lack: GUMPTION.

Primal Fusion.text: Give a minion +1/+1 for each of your Totems.
Primal Fusion.name: Primal Fusion
Primal Fusion.flavor: Golce and Dabbana have a new line of Earth Totems available at vendors everywhere this holiday season.

Elemental Destruction.name: Elemental Destruction
Elemental Destruction.flavor: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

Sneaky Devil.name: Sneaky Devil
Sneaky Devil.flavor: The result of a tragic accident involving a Defias Thug, a Wand of Polymorph, and a bundle of Fel Lotus.

Dragon's Fury.text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all minions.
Dragon's Fury.name: Dragon's Fury
Dragon's Fury.flavor: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

Vol'jin.name: Vol'jin
Vol'jin.flavor: Vol'jin is a shadow hunter, which is like a shadow priest except more voodoo.

Shadow Bolt.name: Shadow Bolt
Shadow Bolt.flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

Oaken Summons.text: Gain 6 Armor. Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
Oaken Summons.name: Oaken Summons
Oaken Summons.flavor: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

Ebon Dragonsmith.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random weapon in your hand by (2).
Ebon Dragonsmith.name: Ebon Dragonsmith
Ebon Dragonsmith.flavor: Having a furnace-mouth is really handy for a blacksmith.

Possessed Lackey.name: Possessed Lackey
Possessed Lackey.flavor: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

Twilight's Call.text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
Twilight's Call.name: Twilight's Call
Twilight's Call.flavor: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

Blackwing Corruptor.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
Blackwing Corruptor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackwing Corruptor.name: Blackwing Corruptor
Blackwing Corruptor.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackwing Corruptor.flavor: He got his name when he gave Blackwing some comic books and rock & roll records.

Skulking Geist.text: Battlecry: Destroy all 1-Cost spells in both hands and decks.
Skulking Geist.name: Skulking Geist
Skulking Geist.flavor: It's as though a million Jade Idols cried out, and were suddenly silenced.

Bloodsail Raider.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
Bloodsail Raider.name: Bloodsail Raider
Bloodsail Raider.flavor: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

Grimscale Chum.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a random Murloc in your hand +1/+1.
Grimscale Chum.name: Grimscale Chum
Grimscale Chum.flavor: Listen, see?  We'll take 'em to the docks, see?  And throw 'em in the sea, see?

Hadronox.text: Deathrattle: Summon your Taunt minions that died this game.
Hadronox.name: Hadronox
Hadronox.flavor: The viziers of Azjol-Nerub released Hadronox as a last-ditch effort to hold back the Lich King. They did so by VERY carefully scooping him up in a LARGE newspaper and releasing him.

Blazecaller.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 5 damage.
Blazecaller.name: Blazecaller
Blazecaller.flavor: For when a flamecaller just won't do.

Fencing Coach.text: Battlecry: The next time you use your Hero Power, it costs (2) less.
Fencing Coach.name: Fencing Coach
Fencing Coach.flavor: Good fencers make good neighbors, right?

Ethereal Peddler.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding any non-Rogue class cards,  reduce their Cost by (2).
Ethereal Peddler.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Ethereal Peddler.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Ethereal Peddler.name: Ethereal Peddler
Ethereal Peddler.flavor: Yeah, sure. That Ragnaros "fell off the back of a truck".

Primalfin Totem.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Murloc.
Primalfin Totem.name: Primalfin Totem
Primalfin Totem.flavor: Emits a sound only murlocs can hear, which is good because it’s REALLY annoying.

Flying Machine.name: Flying Machine
Flying Machine.flavor: To operate, this contraption needs a hula doll on the dashboard. Otherwise it's just a “falling machine.”

Bite.text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn. Gain 4 Armor.
Bite.name: Bite

Noble Sacrifice.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
Noble Sacrifice.name: Noble Sacrifice

Eternal Sentinel.name: Eternal Sentinel
Eternal Sentinel.flavor: Just try to avoid eye contact.

Ogre Warmaul.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Ogre Warmaul.name: Ogre Warmaul
Ogre Warmaul.flavor: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

Faceless Summoner.name: Faceless Summoner
Faceless Summoner.flavor: They never get the recognition they deserve.

Devour Mind.text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
Devour Mind.name: Devour Mind
Devour Mind.flavor: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

Shieldbearer.name: Shieldbearer
Shieldbearer.flavor: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.

Mukla's Champion.name: Mukla's Champion
Mukla's Champion.flavor: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.

Explosive Shot.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion and $2 damage to adjacent ones.
