Explosive Shot.name: Explosive Shot
Explosive Shot.flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

Injured Kvaldir.name: Injured Kvaldir
Injured Kvaldir.flavor: Don't worry.  With a little skin cream he's going to clear right up.

Moorabi.text: Whenever another minion is Frozen, add a copy of it to your hand.
Moorabi.name: Moorabi
Moorabi.flavor: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

Lava Shock.text: Deal $2 damage. Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
Lava Shock.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Lava Shock.name: Lava Shock
Lava Shock.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Lava Shock.flavor: Chocolate lava cake is shockingly delicious.

The Boogeymonster.text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain +2/+2.
The Boogeymonster.name: The Boogeymonster
The Boogeymonster.flavor: Has 20 years of training in classical ballet, but ALLLLLL he ever gets asked to do is boogie.

Arcanosmith.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Arcanosmith.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Arcanosmith.name: Arcanosmith
Arcanosmith.flavor: He’s really just a Blacksmith, but he thought the fancy title would bring in more business.

Fan of Knives.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card.
Fan of Knives.name: Fan of Knives
Fan of Knives.flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

Living Mana.text: Transform your Mana Crystals into 2/2 minions. Recover the mana when they die.
Living Mana.name: Living Mana
Living Mana.flavor: If you truly love your mana, set it free.

Magnataur Alpha.text:
Also damages the minions next to whomever
he attacks.
Magnataur Alpha.name: Magnataur Alpha
Magnataur Alpha.flavor: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

Thistle Tea.text: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
Thistle Tea.name: Thistle Tea
Thistle Tea.flavor: Aren't Thistles prickly?  Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

Anub'ar Ambusher.text: Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand.
Anub'ar Ambusher.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Anub'ar Ambusher.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Anub'ar Ambusher.name: Anub'ar Ambusher
Anub'ar Ambusher.flavor: Originally he was called "Anub'ar Guy who bounces a guy back to your hand", but it lacked a certain zing.

Level Up!.text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and Taunt.
Level Up!.name: Level Up!

Iron Juggernaut.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Mine into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 10 damage.
Iron Juggernaut.name: Iron Juggernaut
Iron Juggernaut.flavor: The Iron Juggernaut guards Orgrimmar and has just earned the "Employee of the Month" award!

Embrace Darkness.text:
[x]Choose an enemy minion.
At the start of your turn,
gain control of it.
Embrace Darkness.name: Embrace Darkness
Embrace Darkness.flavor: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

Mulch.text:
Destroy a minion.
Add a random minion to your opponent's hand.
Mulch.name: Mulch
Mulch.flavor: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.

Lost Tallstrider.name: Lost Tallstrider
Lost Tallstrider.flavor: The message, "If found, please return to Mulgore," is tattooed on his rear.

Druid of the Swarm.text: Choose One - Transform into a 1/2 with Poisonous; or a 1/5 with Taunt.
Druid of the Swarm.name: Druid of the Swarm
Druid of the Swarm.flavor: The Druid awoke from troubling dreams to find herself transformed into a giant spider.

Mekgineer Thermaplugg.text: Whenever an enemy minion dies, summon a Leper Gnome.
Mekgineer Thermaplugg.name: Mekgineer Thermaplugg
Mekgineer Thermaplugg.flavor: He was obsessed with explosives until he discovered knitting. Now he yells, “SWEATERS! MORE SWEATERS!”

Secretkeeper.name: Secretkeeper
Secretkeeper.flavor: She promises not to tell anyone about that thing you did last night with that one person.

Frost Nova.name: Frost Nova
Frost Nova.flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

Temple Enforcer.name: Temple Enforcer
Temple Enforcer.flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

Kill Command.text:
Deal $3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal
$5 damage instead.
Kill Command.name: Kill Command

Spawn of Shadows.name: Spawn of Shadows
Spawn of Shadows.flavor: What did you expect to happen?  He's a Spawn.  Of Shadows.

A Light in the Darkness.name: A Light in the Darkness
A Light in the Darkness.flavor: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark?  If you turn on a light while it’s dark, doesn’t that mean it’s no longer dark?

Aviana.name: Aviana
Aviana.flavor: Call her "Tweety".  She'll find it real funny.  I PROMISE.

Verdant Longneck.name: Verdant Longneck
Verdant Longneck.flavor: Always sticking its neck into other people’s business.

Maiden of the Lake.name: Maiden of the Lake
Maiden of the Lake.flavor: Not a good basis for a system of government.

Captain Greenskin.name: Captain Greenskin
Captain Greenskin.flavor: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

Cobalt Guardian.text: Whenever you summon a Mech, gain Divine Shield.
Cobalt Guardian.name: Cobalt Guardian
Cobalt Guardian.flavor: Guardians used to be built out of Adamantium, but production got moved to Gadgetzan and Cobalt was cheap.

Dreadscale.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.
Dreadscale.name: Dreadscale
Dreadscale.flavor: Let's be clear about this:  ACIDMAW is the sidekick.

Enchanted Raven.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
Enchanted Raven.name: Enchanted Raven
Enchanted Raven.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
Enchanted Raven.flavor: Once upon a midnight restive, Medivh pondered, feeling festive!

Ironbeak Owl.name: Ironbeak Owl
Ironbeak Owl.flavor: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

Tol'vir Warden.text: Battlecry: Draw two 1-Cost minions from your deck.
Tol'vir Warden.name: Tol'vir Warden
Tol'vir Warden.flavor: Ferocious in combat… and even more terrifying in pet battles.

Shadow Visions.text: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
Shadow Visions.name: Shadow Visions
Shadow Visions.flavor: This one’s a bird. And here’s a bunny!

Silverware Golem.text: If you discard this minion, summon it.
Silverware Golem.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Silverware Golem.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Silverware Golem.name: Silverware Golem
Silverware Golem.flavor: From the secret research labs of the Swiss Army.

Dread Infernal.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
Dread Infernal.name: Dread Infernal
Dread Infernal.flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

Sunborne Val'kyr.name: Sunborne Val'kyr
Sunborne Val'kyr.flavor: Bring valor to Odyn's halls, Champion!

Potion of Polymorph.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, transform it into a 1/1 Sheep.
Potion of Polymorph.name: Potion of Polymorph

Flamewaker.text: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Flamewaker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Flamewaker.name: Flamewaker
Flamewaker.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Flamewaker.flavor: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they don’t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.

Crystalweaver.name: Crystalweaver
Crystalweaver.flavor: The trick is soaking the crystals in warm milk to soften them up.

Luckydo Buccaneer.text: Battlecry: If your weapon has at least 3 Attack, gain +4/+4.
Luckydo Buccaneer.name: Luckydo Buccaneer
Luckydo Buccaneer.flavor: You can't just leave a Luckydo somewhere.  You gotta keep 'em with you!  Especially in Gadgetzan!

Southsea Captain.name: Southsea Captain
Southsea Captain.flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.

Deathspeaker.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Immune this turn.
Deathspeaker.name: Deathspeaker
Deathspeaker.flavor: It helps to speak really, really loud.

Happy Ghoul.text: Costs (0) if your hero was healed this turn.
Happy Ghoul.name: Happy Ghoul

Seeping Oozeling.text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle of a random minion in your deck.
Seeping Oozeling.name: Seeping Oozeling
Seeping Oozeling.flavor: Uh, you might want to get that looked at.

Ice Block.text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
Ice Block.name: Ice Block
Ice Block.flavor: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

Voodoo Doctor.name: Voodoo Doctor
Voodoo Doctor.flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

Savage Combatant.text: Inspire: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
Savage Combatant.name: Savage Combatant
Savage Combatant.flavor: Maybe if you whistle a tune it will soothe him.  Yeah...  Try that.

Nerubian Egg.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Nerubian Egg.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Nerubian Egg.name: Nerubian Egg
Nerubian Egg.flavor: Eggs are a good source of protein and Nerubians.

Volcano.text: Deal $15 damage randomly split among all minions. Overload: (2)
Volcano.name: Volcano
Volcano.flavor: Many young shaman summon a volcano as their first school project.

Kathrena Winterwisp.name: Kathrena Winterwisp
Kathrena Winterwisp.flavor: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

Twilight Darkmender.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, restore 10 Health to your hero.
Twilight Darkmender.name: Twilight Darkmender
Twilight Darkmender.flavor: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.

Fearsome Doomguard.name: Fearsome Doomguard
Fearsome Doomguard.flavor: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

Mana Bind.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
Mana Bind.name: Mana Bind

White Eyes.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle 'The Storm Guardian' into your deck.
White Eyes.name: White Eyes

King Mukla.name: King Mukla
King Mukla.flavor: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

Bilefin Tidehunter.name: Bilefin Tidehunter
Bilefin Tidehunter.flavor: Bile actually makes for surprisingly sturdy fins.

Glacial Mysteries.text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
Glacial Mysteries.name: Glacial Mysteries
Glacial Mysteries.flavor: The secret is in the frosting.

Sword of Justice.text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.
Sword of Justice.name: Sword of Justice
Sword of Justice.flavor: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

Burly Rockjaw Trogg.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +2 Attack.
Burly Rockjaw Trogg.name: Burly Rockjaw Trogg
Burly Rockjaw Trogg.flavor: He's burly because he does CrossFit.

Grimestreet Smuggler.text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
Grimestreet Smuggler.name: Grimestreet Smuggler
Grimestreet Smuggler.flavor: She's got anything you want.  Need the latest derpinger?  No problem!

Illuminator.text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.
Illuminator.name: Illuminator
Illuminator.flavor: "LUMOS!" is not what they yell. What do you think this is, Hogwarts?

Master of Disguise.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.
Master of Disguise.name: Master of Disguise
Master of Disguise.flavor: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

Crushing Hand.name: Crushing Hand
Crushing Hand.flavor: Shamans always have the firmest handshakes.

Grave Shambler.text: Whenever your weapon is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
Grave Shambler.name: Grave Shambler
Grave Shambler.flavor: I think one of the necromancers got a little carried away.

Murmuring Elemental.text: Battlecry: Your next Battlecry this turn triggers twice.
Murmuring Elemental.name: Murmuring Elemental

Coldlight Oracle.name: Coldlight Oracle
Coldlight Oracle.flavor: They can see the future.   In that future both players draw more cards.   Spoooky.

Drygulch Jailor.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 Silver Hand Recruits to your hand.
Drygulch Jailor.name: Drygulch Jailor

Uther of the Ebon Blade.name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
Uther of the Ebon Blade.flavor: "Step forward. Confess! Once I was a mere servant of the Light. Now I alone stand in judgement."

Shield Block.name: Shield Block
Shield Block.flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

Cursed Blade.text: Double all damage dealt to your hero.
Cursed Blade.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Cursed Blade.name: Cursed Blade
Cursed Blade.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Cursed Blade.flavor: The Curse is that you have to listen to "MMMBop" on repeat.

Kodorider.name: Kodorider
Kodorider.flavor: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.

Arcane Anomaly.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, give this minion
+1 Health.
Arcane Anomaly.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Arcane Anomaly.name: Arcane Anomaly
Arcane Anomaly.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Arcane Anomaly.flavor: He used to get work as a Spatial Anomaly, but he got tired of having his polarity reversed.

Crushing Walls.text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.
Crushing Walls.name: Crushing Walls

Unidentified Maul.text: Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
Unidentified Maul.name: Unidentified Maul
Unidentified Maul.flavor: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

Power of the Wild.text: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
Power of the Wild.name: Power of the Wild
Power of the Wild.flavor: Never look a panther in the eye.  Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'?  Well, it's one of those.

Northshire Cleric.text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
Northshire Cleric.name: Northshire Cleric
Northshire Cleric.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

Spawn of N'Zoth.name: Spawn of N'Zoth
Spawn of N'Zoth.flavor: Who's a cute widdle N'Zoth? You are! Yes you are! Yes you're the cutest widdle N'Zoth in the whole world!!!

Feral Rage.text: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.
Feral Rage.name: Feral Rage
Feral Rage.flavor: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

Stranglethorn Tiger.name: Stranglethorn Tiger
Stranglethorn Tiger.flavor: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

Call to Arms.name: Call to Arms
Call to Arms.flavor: More personal than a text to arms.

Grove Tender.text: Choose One - Give each player a Mana Crystal; or Each player draws a card.
Grove Tender.name: Grove Tender
Grove Tender.flavor: Likes: Hiking and the great outdoors. Dislikes: Goblin shredders and sandals. (Can’t find any that fit!).

Molten Giant.text: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
Molten Giant.name: Molten Giant
Molten Giant.flavor: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

Deadscale Knight.name: Deadscale Knight
Deadscale Knight.flavor: His favorite spell is Chum Explosion.

Chromaggus.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Chromaggus.text: Whenever you draw a card, put another copy into your hand.
Chromaggus.name: Chromaggus
Chromaggus.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Chromaggus.flavor: Left head and right head can never agree about what to eat for dinner, so they always end up just eating ramen again.

Druid of the Fang.text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, transform this minion into a 7/7.
Druid of the Fang.name: Druid of the Fang
Druid of the Fang.flavor: The Druids of the Fang live in the Wailing Caverns. They wear cool snake shirts and tell snake jokes and say "bro" a lot.

Nexus-Champion Saraad.text: Inspire: Add a random spell to your hand.
Nexus-Champion Saraad.name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
Nexus-Champion Saraad.flavor: The ethereals have their own jousting tournament, and Saraad is the reigning champion.  Also he won the ethereal hot dog eating contest.

Free From Amber.text: Discover a minion that costs (8) or more. Summon it.
Free From Amber.name: Free From Amber

Kel'Thuzad.text: At the end of each turn, summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
Kel'Thuzad.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Kel'Thuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad
Kel'Thuzad.howToEarn: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Kel'Thuzad.flavor: Kel'Thuzad could not resist the call of the Lich King. Even when it's just a robo-call extolling the Lich King's virtues.

Skelemancer.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon an 8/8 Skeleton.
Skelemancer.name: Skelemancer
Skelemancer.flavor: What do you mean there's no such thing as "Skelemancy?" But "Dinomancy" is ok?

Rattling Rascal.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Skeleton. Deathrattle: Summon one for your opponent.
Rattling Rascal.name: Rattling Rascal

Ancestral Healing.text: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt.
Ancestral Healing.name: Ancestral Healing
Ancestral Healing.flavor: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

Finja, the Flying Star.text: [x]Stealth Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, summon 2  Murlocs from your deck.
Finja, the Flying Star.name: Finja, the Flying Star
Finja, the Flying Star.flavor: The last true master of Finjitsu.

Piloted Sky Golem.name: Piloted Sky Golem
Piloted Sky Golem.flavor: The pinnacle of goblin engineering. Includes an espresso machine and foot massager.

Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound.text: At the end of your turn, put a minion from your deck into the battlefield.
Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound.name: Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound
Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound.flavor: When he's working out, he binds all that rage back into a ponytail.

Dalaran Aspirant.name: Dalaran Aspirant
Dalaran Aspirant.flavor: Is he aspiring or inspiring?  Make up your mind!

Gadgetzan Socialite.name: Gadgetzan Socialite
Gadgetzan Socialite.flavor: Comment on her height, and she'll go from flapper to kneecapper in seconds flat.

Pit Lord.name: Pit Lord
Pit Lord.flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

Kabal Trafficker.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
add a random Demon
to your hand.
Kabal Trafficker.name: Kabal Trafficker
Kabal Trafficker.flavor: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

Crackling Razormaw.name: Crackling Razormaw
Crackling Razormaw.flavor: Wasn't clever enough to go AROUND the electric fence.

Ice Rager.name: Ice Rager
Ice Rager.flavor: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.

Jeweled Scarab.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Jeweled Scarab.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Jeweled Scarab.name: Jeweled Scarab
Jeweled Scarab.flavor: It's amazing what you can do with super glue!

Necrotic Geist.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Necrotic Geist.name: Necrotic Geist
Necrotic Geist.flavor: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

Jeeves.text: At the end of each player's turn, that player draws until they have 3 cards.
Jeeves.name: Jeeves
Jeeves.flavor: This robot is a lean, mean, butlerin' machine.

Tar Lord.text: Taunt Has +4 Attack during your opponent’s turn.
Tar Lord.name: Tar Lord
Tar Lord.flavor: Tar Lord, man... legendary monster? Aw, forget it.

Troggzor the Earthinator.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a Burly Rockjaw Trogg.
Troggzor the Earthinator.name: Troggzor the Earthinator
Troggzor the Earthinator.flavor: He keeps earthinating the countryside despite attempts to stop him.

The Beast.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
The Beast.name: The Beast
The Beast.flavor: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

Wolfrider.name: Wolfrider
Wolfrider.flavor: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

Bladed Cultist.name: Bladed Cultist
Bladed Cultist.flavor: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.

Gather Your Party.name: Gather Your Party
Gather Your Party.flavor: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional!  Who’s with me?

Power Word: Tentacles.name: Power Word: Tentacles
Power Word: Tentacles.flavor: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of… tentacles?

Bloodmage Thalnos.name: Bloodmage Thalnos
Bloodmage Thalnos.flavor: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

Echoing Ooze.text: Battlecry: Summon an exact copy of this minion at the end of the turn.
Echoing Ooze.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Echoing Ooze.howToEarn: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Echoing Ooze.name: Echoing Ooze

Stonehill Defender.name: Stonehill Defender
Stonehill Defender.flavor: Briefly tried stand-up comedy under the name "Stonehill Offender", but turtles are just too thin-skinned.

Embrace the Shadow.text: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
Embrace the Shadow.name: Embrace the Shadow
Embrace the Shadow.flavor: For when your Auchenai Soulpriests call in sick.

Vryghoul.text: [x]Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Vryghoul.name: Vryghoul
Vryghoul.flavor: It's pronounced VERY GHOUL. Don't let anyone tell you different.

Lightfused Stegodon.name: Lightfused Stegodon
Lightfused Stegodon.flavor: “Come now, Johnston. I think those horns are quite fetching on you.”

Darkshire Councilman.text:
[x]After you summon a minion,
 gain +1 Attack.
Darkshire Councilman.name: Darkshire Councilman

Annoy-o-Tron.name: Annoy-o-Tron
Annoy-o-Tron.flavor: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

Haunted Creeper.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Haunted Creeper.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Haunted Creeper.name: Haunted Creeper

Flesheating Ghoul.text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
Flesheating Ghoul.name: Flesheating Ghoul
Flesheating Ghoul.flavor: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name.  It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

Mind Blast.text: Deal $5 damage to the enemy hero.
Mind Blast.name: Mind Blast
Mind Blast.flavor: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

Spiked Hogrider.text: Battlecry: If an enemy minion has Taunt, gain Charge.
Spiked Hogrider.name: Spiked Hogrider
Spiked Hogrider.flavor: Did you know the Hogchoppers compete every year at the Mirage Raceway?  They do.  It's a real group.

Ozruk.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Gain +5 Health for each Elemental you played last turn.
Ozruk.name: Ozruk
Ozruk.flavor: Between you and me, Ozruk is a bit obsessed with his body.

Warhorse Trainer.text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.
Warhorse Trainer.name: Warhorse Trainer
Warhorse Trainer.flavor: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.

Dragonhatcher.text: At the end of your turn, Recruit a Dragon.
Dragonhatcher.name: Dragonhatcher
Dragonhatcher.flavor: Which came first?  The dragon or the dragonhatcher?

Mark of the Wild.text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+2. (+2 Attack/+2 Health)
Mark of the Wild.name: Mark of the Wild
Mark of the Wild.flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

Dart Trap.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Dart Trap.text: Secret: After an opposing Hero Power is used, deal $5 damage to a random enemy.
Dart Trap.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Dart Trap.name: Dart Trap
Dart Trap.flavor: Five years of tap-dancing lessons are FINALLY going to pay off!

Deathaxe Punisher.text: Battlecry: Give a random Lifesteal minion in your hand +2/+2.
Deathaxe Punisher.name: Deathaxe Punisher

King's Defender.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.
King's Defender.name: King's Defender
King's Defender.flavor: "King's Attacker" is a shield.  Funny, huh?

Bloodreaver Gul'dan.text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly Demons that died this game.
Bloodreaver Gul'dan.name: Bloodreaver Gul'dan
Bloodreaver Gul'dan.flavor: "Still you refuse to bend your knee? None can escape death, you old fool. And in death… all will serve me…"

Blood Knight.text: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
Blood Knight.name: Blood Knight
Blood Knight.flavor: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

Dark Conviction.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
Dark Conviction.name: Dark Conviction
Dark Conviction.flavor: In his court, Uther is judge, jury, AND executioner…

Hex.text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
Hex.name: Hex
Hex.flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

Starfire.name: Starfire
Starfire.flavor: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

Cobra Shot.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and the enemy hero.
Cobra Shot.name: Cobra Shot
Cobra Shot.flavor: "Cobra Shot" hurts way, way, way more than "Cobra Cuddle."

Tundra Rhino.name: Tundra Rhino
Tundra Rhino.flavor: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos.  Or am I mistaken?

Unlicensed Apothecary.text: After you summon a minion, deal 5 damage to your hero.
Unlicensed Apothecary.name: Unlicensed Apothecary
Unlicensed Apothecary.flavor: Get the ingredients wrong on ONE healing potion and they take your license. What a world!

Twisted Worgen.name: Twisted Worgen
Twisted Worgen.flavor: Sometimes the Old Gods' corruptions gives you power untold, sometimes you get +1 Attack. We can’t all be winners in the Eldritch lottery.

Professor Putricide.text: After you play a Secret, put a random Hunter Secret into the battlefield.
Professor Putricide.name: Professor Putricide
Professor Putricide.flavor: Among his more notable inventions: A tentacle-groomer, a plague that would wipe out all life on Azeroth, and a fidget spinner.

Seal of Light.text: Restore #4 Health to your hero and gain +2 Attack this turn.
Seal of Light.name: Seal of Light
Seal of Light.flavor: The walrus of Light restores EIGHT Health.

Spirit Lash.name: Spirit Lash
Spirit Lash.flavor: We've got spirit, yes we do! We've got spirit, stolen from you!

Woecleaver.text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
Woecleaver.name: Woecleaver
Woecleaver.flavor: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!

Blade Flurry.text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.
Blade Flurry.name: Blade Flurry
Blade Flurry.flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

Thunder Lizard.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, Adapt.
Thunder Lizard.name: Thunder Lizard

Astral Tiger.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this minion into your deck.
Astral Tiger.name: Astral Tiger
Astral Tiger.flavor: Astral kitty litter is surprisingly hard to find.

Wild Pyromancer.text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
Wild Pyromancer.name: Wild Pyromancer
Wild Pyromancer.flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

Twig of the World Tree.name: Twig of the World Tree
Twig of the World Tree.flavor: For druids who want to branch out.

Oasis Snapjaw.name: Oasis Snapjaw
Oasis Snapjaw.flavor: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

Ice Walker.text: Your Hero Power also Freezes the target.
Ice Walker.name: Ice Walker
Ice Walker.flavor: Ice Walker you say? He doesn't have feet!

Arcanite Reaper.name: Arcanite Reaper
Arcanite Reaper.flavor: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

Holy Champion.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
Holy Champion.name: Holy Champion
Holy Champion.flavor: She really likes seeing people get better.  That's why she hurts them in the first place.

Faceless Shambler.text: Taunt Battlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Attack and Health.
Faceless Shambler.name: Faceless Shambler
Faceless Shambler.flavor: "What is that thing?!" "I'm not sure, but it seems to be sort of Ysera shaped."

Hemet Nesingwary.name: Hemet Nesingwary
Hemet Nesingwary.flavor: It's hard to make a living as a hunter in a world where beasts instantly reappear minutes after you kill them.

Divine Favor.text: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
Divine Favor.name: Divine Favor
Divine Favor.flavor: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

Questing Adventurer.text: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
Questing Adventurer.name: Questing Adventurer
Questing Adventurer.flavor: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

Astral Communion.text: Gain 10 Mana Crystals. Discard your hand.
Astral Communion.name: Astral Communion
Astral Communion.flavor: Hey!  Moon!  Can I have some mana crystals?

Hobgoblin.text: Whenever you play a 1-Attack minion, give it +2/+2.
Hobgoblin.name: Hobgoblin
Hobgoblin.flavor: Hobgoblins are meeting next week to discuss union benefits.  First on the list: dental plan.

Frigid Snobold.name: Frigid Snobold
Frigid Snobold.flavor: Ironically, the natural enemy of the snobold is THE CANDLE.

Force-Tank MAX.name: Force-Tank MAX
Force-Tank MAX.flavor: There is a factory in Tanaris for crafting force-tanks, but it only ever made two, because of cost overruns.

Nerubian Prophet.text:
At the start of your turn, reduce this card's
Cost by (1).
Nerubian Prophet.name: Nerubian Prophet

Piloted Shredder.name: Piloted Shredder
Piloted Shredder.flavor: Once upon a time, only goblins piloted shredders. These days, everyone from Doomsayer to Lorewalker Cho seems to ride one.

Rotface.text: [x]After this minion survives damage, summon a random Legendary minion.
Rotface.name: Rotface
Rotface.flavor: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

Chillmaw.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
Chillmaw.name: Chillmaw
Chillmaw.flavor: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

Sunfury Protector.name: Sunfury Protector
Sunfury Protector.flavor: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

Cogmaster's Wrench.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
Cogmaster's Wrench.name: Cogmaster's Wrench
Cogmaster's Wrench.flavor: For tightening cogs and smashin' troggs!

Fallen Hero.text: Your Hero Power deals 1 extra damage.
Fallen Hero.name: Fallen Hero

Felguard.text: Taunt Battlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
Felguard.name: Felguard
Felguard.flavor: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

Obsidian Statue.text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Obsidian Statue.name: Obsidian Statue
Obsidian Statue.flavor: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

Axe Flinger.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Axe Flinger.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Axe Flinger.name: Axe Flinger
Axe Flinger.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Axe Flinger.flavor: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".

Ogre Magi.name: Ogre Magi
Ogre Magi.flavor: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

Spreading Plague.text: Summon a 1/5 Scarab with Taunt. If your opponent has more minions, cast this again.
Spreading Plague.name: Spreading Plague
Spreading Plague.flavor: In the past, plagues were spread by mice or fleas. These days they're spread by elves.

Argent Protector.name: Argent Protector
Argent Protector.flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

Doomsayer.text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
Doomsayer.name: Doomsayer
Doomsayer.flavor: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

Eldritch Horror.name: Eldritch Horror
Eldritch Horror.flavor: Often wonders what path his life might have taken if he wasn't named, you know, "Eldritch Horror".

Huge Toad.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Huge Toad.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Huge Toad.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Huge Toad.name: Huge Toad

Piranha Launcher.text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
summon a 1/1 Piranha.
Piranha Launcher.name: Piranha Launcher
Piranha Launcher.flavor: A great improvement over the guppy launcher.

Holy Smite.name: Holy Smite
Holy Smite.flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

Lightning Storm.text: Deal $2-$3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (2)
Lightning Storm.name: Lightning Storm
Lightning Storm.flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

Lesser Onyx Spellstone.text: Destroy 1 random enemy minion. @(Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
Lesser Onyx Spellstone.name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
Lesser Onyx Spellstone.flavor:
The trolls of old embraced the gift
A jewel of black for daggers swift
No party lasts who finds the stone
Those wielding it soon stand alone.
Lesser Onyx Spellstone.collectionText: Destroy 1 random enemy minion. (Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)

Alexstrasza.text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
Alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza
Alexstrasza.flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

Unleash the Hounds.text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
Unleash the Hounds.name: Unleash the Hounds
Unleash the Hounds.flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

Gorillabot A-3.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Gorillabot A-3.text: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, Discover a Mech.
Gorillabot A-3.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Gorillabot A-3.name: Gorillabot A-3
Gorillabot A-3.flavor: A-1 and A-2 went nuts, when they should have gone bolts.

Kabal Chemist.text: Battlecry: Add a random Potion to your hand.
Kabal Chemist.name: Kabal Chemist
Kabal Chemist.flavor: Sure you could have that Polymorph potion, but wouldn't you rather have this mystery potion?  It could be anything.  Even a Polymorph potion!

Adaptation.name: Adaptation
Adaptation.flavor: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

Resurrect.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Resurrect.text: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
Resurrect.name: Resurrect
Resurrect.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Resurrect.flavor: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"

Elise Starseeker.text: Battlecry: Shuffle the 'Map to the Golden Monkey' into your deck.
Elise Starseeker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Elise Starseeker.name: Elise Starseeker
Elise Starseeker.flavor: A large part of her job entails not mixing up the Map to the Golden Monkey with the Map to Monkey Island.
Elise Starseeker.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Giant Sand Worm.text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
Giant Sand Worm.name: Giant Sand Worm
Giant Sand Worm.flavor: Banned from every all-you-can-eat buffet on Azeroth.

Snowfury Giant.text: Costs (1) less for each Mana Crystal you've Overloaded this game.
Snowfury Giant.name: Snowfury Giant
Snowfury Giant.flavor: This minion goes all the way to 11!

Elven Minstrel.name: Elven Minstrel
Elven Minstrel.flavor: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

Dunemaul Shaman.text: Windfury, Overload: (1) 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Dunemaul Shaman.name: Dunemaul Shaman
Dunemaul Shaman.flavor: He just closes his eyes and goes for it. Raarararrrarar!

Harvest Golem.name: Harvest Golem
Harvest Golem.flavor: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

Blingtron 3000.text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon for each player.
Blingtron 3000.name: Blingtron 3000
Blingtron 3000.flavor: PREPARE PARTY SERVOS FOR IMMEDIATE DEPLOYMENT.

Battle Rage.text: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
Battle Rage.name: Battle Rage
Battle Rage.flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

Ravaging Ghoul.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
Ravaging Ghoul.name: Ravaging Ghoul
Ravaging Ghoul.flavor: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

Amani Berserker.name: Amani Berserker
Amani Berserker.flavor: If an Amani berserker asks "Joo lookin' at me?!", the correct response is "Nah, mon".

Wailing Soul.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Wailing Soul.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Wailing Soul.name: Wailing Soul
Wailing Soul.flavor: This soul just wails on you. Dang, soul, let up already.

Potion of Heroism.text: Give a minion Divine Shield. Draw a card.
Potion of Heroism.name: Potion of Heroism

Malkorok.name: Malkorok
Malkorok.flavor: Garrosh's best buddy. It's true. Look it up.

Counterfeit Coin.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
Counterfeit Coin.name: Counterfeit Coin
Counterfeit Coin.flavor: There is something funny about this coin… can't quite put my finger on it…

Protect the King!.text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Pawn with Taunt.
Protect the King!.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Protect the King!.name: Protect the King!
Protect the King!.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Protect the King!.flavor: Form ranks! Everyone into the King's Tuskarr Defense!

Sudden Betrayal.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, instead it attacks one of its neighbors.
Sudden Betrayal.name: Sudden Betrayal
Sudden Betrayal.flavor: You thought he was your bro-bold, but turns out he's your foe-bold.

Spellweaver.name: Spellweaver
Spellweaver.flavor: Spells offer twice the moisture wicking of cotton.

Validated Doomsayer.text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 7.
Validated Doomsayer.name: Validated Doomsayer
Validated Doomsayer.flavor: Really feels good about himself and is in a much better place now. But… he sure does miss piloting those shredders.

Dragonkin Sorcerer.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain +1/+1.
Dragonkin Sorcerer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dragonkin Sorcerer.name: Dragonkin Sorcerer
Dragonkin Sorcerer.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dragonkin Sorcerer.flavor: Dragonkin Sorcerers be all "I'm a wizard" and everyone else be all "daaaaang".

Equality.text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
Equality.name: Equality
Equality.flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

Brann Bronzebeard.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Brann Bronzebeard.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Brann Bronzebeard.name: Brann Bronzebeard
Brann Bronzebeard.flavor: Contains 75% more fiber than his brother Magni!

Recombobulator.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random minion with the same Cost.
Recombobulator.name: Recombobulator
Recombobulator.flavor: For when you didn’t combobulate quite right the first time around.

Bolvar Fordragon.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1 Attack.
Bolvar Fordragon.name: Bolvar Fordragon
Bolvar Fordragon.flavor: Spoiler alert: Bolvar gets melted and then sits on an ice throne and everyone forgets about him.

Primalfin Champion.text: Deathrattle: Return any spells you cast on this minion to your hand.
Primalfin Champion.name: Primalfin Champion
Primalfin Champion.flavor: Sure, he'll return your stuff.  OVER HIS DEAD BODY!

Buccaneer.text: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
Buccaneer.name: Buccaneer
Buccaneer.flavor: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

Blizzard.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
Blizzard.name: Blizzard
Blizzard.flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

Getaway Kodo.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.
Getaway Kodo.name: Getaway Kodo

Garrison Commander.text: You can use your Hero Power twice a turn.
Garrison Commander.name: Garrison Commander
Garrison Commander.flavor: He'll never admit it, but he pushes you hard because he really cares about you.

Dark Bargain.text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
Dark Bargain.name: Dark Bargain
Dark Bargain.flavor: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

Coldwraith.text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, draw a card.
Coldwraith.name: Coldwraith

River Crocolisk.name: River Crocolisk
River Crocolisk.flavor: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

Antique Healbot.name: Antique Healbot
Antique Healbot.flavor: They don't make 'em like they used to! (Because of explosions, mostly.)

Novice Engineer.name: Novice Engineer
Novice Engineer.flavor: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

Rhok'delar.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no minions, fill your hand with Hunter spells.
Rhok'delar.name: Rhok'delar

Explorer's Hat.text: Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add an Explorer's Hat to your hand."
Explorer's Hat.howToEarnGolden: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.
Explorer's Hat.name: Explorer's Hat
Explorer's Hat.howToEarn: Unlocked by starting the League of Explorers adventure.
Explorer's Hat.flavor: Harrison Jones was disappointed that he didn't get to be part of the League of Explorers, but his hat did.

Direhorn Hatchling.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle a 6/9 Direhorn with Taunt into your deck.
Direhorn Hatchling.name: Direhorn Hatchling
Direhorn Hatchling.flavor: His mom could beat up your mom.

Binding Heal.text: Restore #5 Health to a minion and your hero.
Binding Heal.name: Binding Heal
Binding Heal.flavor: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

Small-Time Recruits.name: Small-Time Recruits
Small-Time Recruits.flavor: Now we know why they wear tiny watches.

Krul the Unshackled.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon all  Demons from your hand.
Krul the Unshackled.name: Krul the Unshackled
Krul the Unshackled.flavor: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

Candleshot.name: Candleshot
Candleshot.flavor: Once called Cahn’delar, Shortbow of the Ancient Whisker.

Druid of the Saber.name: Druid of the Saber
Druid of the Saber.flavor: That's saberTEETH, not like curved pirate blades.  That's a different kind of druid.  Druid of the Curved Pirate Blades.

Boneguard Lieutenant.name: Boneguard Lieutenant
Boneguard Lieutenant.flavor: Underneath all that impressive armor, he's just skin and bones.  Okay, maybe just bones.

Feral Spirit.name: Feral Spirit
Feral Spirit.flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

Fjola Lightbane.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain Divine Shield.
Fjola Lightbane.name: Fjola Lightbane

Shallow Gravedigger.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Deathrattle minion to your hand.
Shallow Gravedigger.name: Shallow Gravedigger
Shallow Gravedigger.flavor: It's hard to put them six feet under when you're three feet tall.

Mind Control Tech.text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent has 4 or more minions, take control of one at random.
Mind Control Tech.name: Mind Control Tech
Mind Control Tech.flavor: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that's not saying much.

Call of the Wild.name: Call of the Wild
Call of the Wild.flavor: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.

North Sea Kraken.name: North Sea Kraken
North Sea Kraken.flavor: You have no idea how tired this guy is of being released.

Benevolent Djinn.text: At the end of your turn, restore 3 Health to your hero.
Benevolent Djinn.name: Benevolent Djinn
Benevolent Djinn.flavor: Wish #1: funnel cakes. Wish #2: funnel cakes. Wish #3: FUNNEL CAKES.

Arcane Shot.name: Arcane Shot
Arcane Shot.flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

Genzo, the Shark.text: Whenever this attacks, both players draw until they have 3 cards.
Genzo, the Shark.name: Genzo, the Shark
Genzo, the Shark.flavor: Infamous in the seedy underground card rooms of Gadgetzan, he got his nickname winning the coveted Shark Plushie in the city's first Hearthstone tournament.

Avenging Wrath.text: Deal $8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Avenging Wrath.name: Avenging Wrath
Avenging Wrath.flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

Inner Fire.text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
Inner Fire.name: Inner Fire
Inner Fire.flavor: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

Potion of Madness.text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 2 or less Attack until end of turn.
Potion of Madness.name: Potion of Madness
Potion of Madness.flavor: You'd be insane NOT to drink it!

Street Trickster.name: Street Trickster
Street Trickster.flavor: His first trick: making your wallet disappear!

Master Jouster.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
Master Jouster.name: Master Jouster
Master Jouster.flavor: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

Unidentified Elixir.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
Unidentified Elixir.name: Unidentified Elixir
Unidentified Elixir.flavor: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

Arcane Intellect.name: Arcane Intellect
Arcane Intellect.flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

Forbidden Ancient.text: Battlecry: Spend all your Mana. Gain +1/+1 for each mana spent.
Forbidden Ancient.name: Forbidden Ancient
Forbidden Ancient.flavor: This Ancient was banned from the local tavern after tucking a 'Dr. Boom' up its sleeve.

Flame Geyser.text:
Deal $2 damage.
Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
Flame Geyser.name: Flame Geyser

Alarm-o-Bot.text:
[x]At the start of your turn,
swap this minion with a
   random one in your hand.
Alarm-o-Bot.name: Alarm-o-Bot

Grumble, Worldshaker.text: Battlecry: Return your other minions to your hand. They cost (1).
Grumble, Worldshaker.name: Grumble, Worldshaker
Grumble, Worldshaker.flavor: The grumbling grew to a mighty rumbling, and out of the caverns the kobolds came tumbling.

Call in the Finishers.name: Call in the Finishers
Call in the Finishers.flavor: When you really need a job done… but you don't really care if it gets done right.

Deck of Wonders.text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
Deck of Wonders.name: Deck of Wonders
Deck of Wonders.flavor: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

Eater of Secrets.text: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets. Gain +1/+1 for each.
Eater of Secrets.name: Eater of Secrets
Eater of Secrets.flavor: You don't want to be around after it has eaten an explosive trap.  You thought Sludge Belcher was bad...

Fel Reaver.text: Whenever your opponent plays a card, remove the top 3 cards of your deck.
Fel Reaver.name: Fel Reaver

The Darkness.text: [x]Starts dormant. Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Candles into the enemy deck. When drawn, this awakens.
The Darkness.name: The Darkness
The Darkness.flavor: I would rather light a single candle than curse the darkness. But I'm willing to do both.

The Runespear.text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell and cast it with random targets.
The Runespear.name: The Runespear
The Runespear.flavor: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

Ancient of War.name: Ancient of War
Ancient of War.flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

Rockbiter Weapon.text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
Rockbiter Weapon.name: Rockbiter Weapon
Rockbiter Weapon.flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

Windshear Stormcaller.text: Battlecry: If you control all 4 basic Totems, summon Al'Akir the Windlord.
Windshear Stormcaller.name: Windshear Stormcaller
Windshear Stormcaller.flavor: Don't ever doubt Al'Akir's love for basic totems.

Divine Spirit.name: Divine Spirit
Divine Spirit.flavor: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

Faceless Behemoth.name: Faceless Behemoth
Faceless Behemoth.flavor: Rejected names: Forty-Foot Faceless, Big ol' No-face, Huge Creature Sans Face, Teddy.

Explosive Trap.text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.
Explosive Trap.name: Explosive Trap
Explosive Trap.flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

Hidden Cache.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
Hidden Cache.name: Hidden Cache
Hidden Cache.flavor: There is an urban legend that the first Toxic Sewer Ooze was born because a rookie Goon stashed an open container of milk in a Hidden Cache.

Bloodworm.name: Bloodworm
Bloodworm.flavor: Queen Lana'thel insists on one of these, fried, every morning for breakfast.

Madam Goya.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Swap it with a minion in your deck.
Madam Goya.name: Madam Goya
Madam Goya.flavor: She has set up her Black Market here in Gadgetzan for one purpose, to make a KILLING when Beanie Babies make their inevitable comeback.

Injured Blademaster.name: Injured Blademaster
Injured Blademaster.flavor: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

Swipe.text: Deal $4 damage to an enemy and $1 damage to all other enemies.
Swipe.name: Swipe
Swipe.flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

Everyfin is Awesome.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Everyfin is Awesome.text:
Give your minions +2/+2.
Costs (1) less for each Murloc you control.
Everyfin is Awesome.name: Everyfin is Awesome
Everyfin is Awesome.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Everyfin is Awesome.flavor: Everyfin is cool when you're part of a murloc team!

Doomguard.name: Doomguard
Doomguard.flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

Arcane Tyrant.text: Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
Arcane Tyrant.name: Arcane Tyrant
Arcane Tyrant.flavor: Tyrant is such a strong word.

Cult Apothecary.text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, restore 2 Health to your hero.
Cult Apothecary.name: Cult Apothecary

Polymorph.text:
Transform a minion
into a 1/1 Sheep.
Polymorph.name: Polymorph
Polymorph.flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

Public Defender.name: Public Defender
Public Defender.flavor: Happy to defend any public offender!

Mortal Strike.text: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.
Mortal Strike.name: Mortal Strike
Mortal Strike.flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

Mindgames.text:
Put a copy of
a random minion from
your opponent's deck into the battlefield.
Mindgames.name: Mindgames
Mindgames.flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

Bloodsail Cultist.text: Battlecry: If you control another Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.
Bloodsail Cultist.name: Bloodsail Cultist
Bloodsail Cultist.flavor: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.

Volcanosaur.name: Volcanosaur
Volcanosaur.flavor: Always fun to say out loud "VOL-CA-NO-SAUUUR!"

Plague Scientist.name: Plague Scientist
Plague Scientist.flavor: The excruciating pain means it's working!

Raza the Chained.text: [x] Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, your Hero Power costs (1) this game.
Raza the Chained.name: Raza the Chained
Raza the Chained.flavor: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

Ivory Knight.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
Ivory Knight.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Ivory Knight.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Ivory Knight.name: Ivory Knight

Ironforge Portal.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Ironforge Portal.text:
Gain 4 Armor.
Summon a random
4-Cost minion.
Ironforge Portal.name: Ironforge Portal
Ironforge Portal.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Ironforge Portal.flavor: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!

Swashburglar.text: Battlecry: Add a random class card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Swashburglar.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Swashburglar.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Swashburglar.name: Swashburglar

Open the Waygate.text: [x]Quest: Cast 6 spells that didn't start in your deck. Reward: Time Warp.
Open the Waygate.name: Open the Waygate
Open the Waygate.flavor: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

Infested Tauren.name: Infested Tauren
Infested Tauren.flavor: The Overmind and the Old Gods are surprisingly similar.

Pyros.text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand as a 6/6 that costs (6).
Pyros.name: Pyros
Pyros.flavor: If you strike her down, she shall become more powerful than you can possibly… well, she'll become a 6/6 anyways.

Ancient of Lore.text: Choose One - Draw a card; or Restore 5 Health.
Ancient of Lore.name: Ancient of Lore
Ancient of Lore.flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

Hozen Healer.text: Battlecry: Restore a minion to full Health.
Hozen Healer.name: Hozen Healer
Hozen Healer.flavor: He didn't go to school for healing, but we keep losing all the good healers to Ratchet, so I guess we'll take him.

Eadric the Pure.text: Battlecry: Change all enemy minions' Attack to 1.
Eadric the Pure.name: Eadric the Pure
Eadric the Pure.flavor: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.

Defender of Argus.name: Defender of Argus
Defender of Argus.flavor: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

Stitched Tracker.text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck.
Stitched Tracker.name: Stitched Tracker
Stitched Tracker.flavor: He's just exercising his right to bear arms.

Cursed Disciple.name: Cursed Disciple
Cursed Disciple.flavor: Politer than his brother, the cursing disciple, but far more evil.

Imp Gang Boss.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
Imp Gang Boss.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Imp Gang Boss.name: Imp Gang Boss
Imp Gang Boss.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Imp Gang Boss.flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.

Dragonling Mechanic.name: Dragonling Mechanic
Dragonling Mechanic.flavor: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

Blade of C'Thun.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Add its Attack and Health to your C'Thun's (wherever it is).
Blade of C'Thun.name: Blade of C'Thun
Blade of C'Thun.flavor: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.

Dark Peddler.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Dark Peddler.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Dark Peddler.name: Dark Peddler
Dark Peddler.flavor: I'm offering you a bargain here!  This amazing vacuum cleaner for your soul!

Animated Berserker.text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
Animated Berserker.name: Animated Berserker
Animated Berserker.flavor: He'd be a lot easier to animate if he would just stand still.

Salty Dog.name: Salty Dog
Salty Dog.flavor: He's recently recovered from being a "scurvy dog."

Forlorn Stalker.text: Battlecry: Give all Deathrattle minions in your hand +1/+1.
Forlorn Stalker.name: Forlorn Stalker
Forlorn Stalker.flavor: He's going to leave the dying up to you, if that's cool.

Zombie Chow.text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
Zombie Chow.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Zombie Chow.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Zombie Chow.name: Zombie Chow

Betrayal.text: Force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it.
Betrayal.name: Betrayal
Betrayal.flavor: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

Wandering Monster.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, summon a 3-Cost minion as the new target.
Wandering Monster.name: Wandering Monster
Wandering Monster.flavor: Not all who wander are lost. This one is lost though, for sure.

Volcanic Potion.name: Volcanic Potion
Volcanic Potion.flavor: The secret ingredient in Kazakus's award-winning chili recipe.

Demonfuse.text: Give a Demon +3/+3. Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
Demonfuse.name: Demonfuse
Demonfuse.flavor: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.

Conceal.text: Give your minions Stealth until your next turn.
Conceal.name: Conceal
Conceal.flavor: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

Jungle Panther.name: Jungle Panther
Jungle Panther.flavor: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

Death's Bite.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Death's Bite.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Death's Bite.name: Death's Bite
Death's Bite.flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord

Eaglehorn Bow.text: [x]Whenever a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +1 Durability.
Eaglehorn Bow.name: Eaglehorn Bow
Eaglehorn Bow.flavor: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

SI:7 Agent.name: SI:7 Agent
SI:7 Agent.flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

Justicar Trueheart.text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
Justicar Trueheart.name: Justicar Trueheart
Justicar Trueheart.flavor: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

Cataclysm.text: Destroy all minions. Discard your hand.
Cataclysm.name: Cataclysm
Cataclysm.flavor: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

Frostbolt.text: Deal $3 damage to a character and Freeze it.
Frostbolt.flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.
Frostbolt.name: Frostbolt

Southsea Deckhand.text: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
Southsea Deckhand.name: Southsea Deckhand
Southsea Deckhand.flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

Shieldmaiden.name: Shieldmaiden
Shieldmaiden.flavor: She has three shieldbearers in her party to supply her with back ups when she gets low on durability.

Molten Reflection.text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
Molten Reflection.name: Molten Reflection

Razorpetal Lasher.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a Razorpetal to your hand that deals 1 damage.
Razorpetal Lasher.name: Razorpetal Lasher
Razorpetal Lasher.flavor: The reason why there are no zombies in Un'goro.

Druid of the Flame.text: Choose One - Transform into a 5/2 minion; or a 2/5 minion.
Druid of the Flame.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Druid of the Flame.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Druid of the Flame.name: Druid of the Flame
Druid of the Flame.flavor: Druids who fought too long in Northrend were easily seduced by Ragnaros; a mug of hot chocolate was generally all it took.

Frothing Berserker.text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
Frothing Berserker.name: Frothing Berserker
Frothing Berserker.flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

Maexxna.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Maexxna.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Maexxna.name: Maexxna
Maexxna.flavor: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".

Crush.text: Destroy a minion. If you have a damaged minion, this costs (4) less.
Crush.name: Crush
Crush.flavor: Using this card on your enemies is one of the best things in life, according to some barbarians.

Acolyte of Pain.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a card.
Acolyte of Pain.name: Acolyte of Pain
Acolyte of Pain.flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

Target Dummy.name: Target Dummy
Target Dummy.flavor: The engineering equivalent of a "Kick Me" sticker.

Enhance-o Mechano.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions Windfury, Taunt, or Divine Shield (at random).
Enhance-o Mechano.name: Enhance-o Mechano

Dark Cultist.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3 Health.
Dark Cultist.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Dark Cultist.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Dark Cultist.name: Dark Cultist
Dark Cultist.flavor: The Cult of the Damned has found it's best not to mention their name when recruiting new cultists.

Frostwolf Warlord.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
Frostwolf Warlord.name: Frostwolf Warlord
Frostwolf Warlord.flavor: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley.  Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

Primalfin Lookout.text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, Discover a Murloc.
Primalfin Lookout.name: Primalfin Lookout
Primalfin Lookout.flavor: Lookout is a self-appointed title that's mostly an excuse to beat things up.

Imp-losion.text: Deal $2-$4 damage to a minion. Summon a 1/1 Imp for each damage dealt.
Imp-losion.name: Imp-losion
Imp-losion.flavor: The shrapnel is waaaaay worse than the explosion.

Seal of Champions.text: Give a minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
Seal of Champions.name: Seal of Champions

Jade Swarmer.name: Jade Swarmer
Jade Swarmer.flavor: He's so good at swarming, he can swarm all by himself!

Shield Slam.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
Shield Slam.name: Shield Slam
Shield Slam.flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

Weasel Tunneler.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this minion into your opponent's deck.
Weasel Tunneler.name: Weasel Tunneler
Weasel Tunneler.flavor: He's the reason the First Bank of Gadgetzan has steel floors.

Summoning Portal.text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
Summoning Portal.name: Summoning Portal
Summoning Portal.flavor: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

Mark of Nature.text: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
Mark of Nature.name: Mark of Nature
Mark of Nature.flavor: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

Kazakus.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates,  create a custom spell.
Kazakus.name: Kazakus
Kazakus.flavor: The mysterious leader of the Kabal is NOT a dragon, and does NOT deal in illegal potions.  Any public statements to the contrary will be met with litigation and Dragonfire Potions.

Force of Nature.name: Force of Nature
Force of Nature.flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

Despicable Dreadlord.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
Despicable Dreadlord.name: Despicable Dreadlord

Earthen Scales.text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
Earthen Scales.name: Earthen Scales
Earthen Scales.flavor: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

Faceless Manipulator.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
Faceless Manipulator.name: Faceless Manipulator
Faceless Manipulator.targetingArrowText: Become a copy of a minion.
Faceless Manipulator.flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

Marin the Fox.text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/8 Treasure Chest for your opponent. (Break it for awesome loot!)
Marin the Fox.howToEarnGolden: Unlocked with the BlizzCon 2017 virtual ticket.
Marin the Fox.howToEarn: Unlocked by opening a Kobolds & Catacombs pack.
Marin the Fox.name: Marin the Fox
Marin the Fox.flavor: My name is Marin the Fox. You took my treasure. Prepare to die.

Spiritsinger Umbra.text: After you summon a minion, trigger its Deathrattle effect.
Spiritsinger Umbra.name: Spiritsinger Umbra
Spiritsinger Umbra.flavor: She sees the fate of anyone she meets, but it's always the same: dinosaur attack.

Tinkertown Technician.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, gain +1/+1 and add a Spare Part to your hand.
Tinkertown Technician.name: Tinkertown Technician
Tinkertown Technician.flavor: Won't you take me to... Tinkertown?

Sir Finley Mrrgglton.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Sir Finley Mrrgglton.text: Battlecry: Discover a new basic Hero Power.
Sir Finley Mrrgglton.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Sir Finley Mrrgglton.name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton
Sir Finley Mrrgglton.flavor: In addition to fluent Common, he also speaks fourteen dialects of 'mrgl'.

Mechanical Yeti.name: Mechanical Yeti
Mechanical Yeti.flavor: The yetis of Chillwind Point are a source of both inspiration and savage beatings.

Feral Gibberer.text: After this minion attacks a hero, add a copy of it to your hand.
Feral Gibberer.name: Feral Gibberer

Barkskin.text: Give a minion +3 Health. Gain 3 Armor.
Barkskin.name: Barkskin
Barkskin.flavor: Make like a tree… and gain armor.

Sergeant Sally.text: Deathrattle: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
Sergeant Sally.name: Sergeant Sally
Sergeant Sally.flavor: "Who is she?  Where did she come from?  We don't even have a police force here in Gadgetzan!!" - Mayor Noggenfogger

Elise the Trailblazer.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a sealed Un'Goro pack into your deck.
Elise the Trailblazer.name: Elise the Trailblazer
Elise the Trailblazer.flavor: Reno taught her that blazing her own trail is a lot more fun than following someone else's map.

Servant of Kalimos.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn,  Discover an Elemental.
Servant of Kalimos.name: Servant of Kalimos
Servant of Kalimos.flavor: He's doing his best, but his mom thinks that if he had just applied himself in school Kalimos would be working for HIM.

Treachery.text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to your opponent.
Treachery.name: Treachery
Treachery.flavor: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

Wee Spellstopper.text: Adjacent minions can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Wee Spellstopper.name: Wee Spellstopper
Wee Spellstopper.flavor: Bane of spellcasters and spelling bees everywhere.

Pantry Spider.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Pantry Spider.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Pantry Spider.name: Pantry Spider
Pantry Spider.flavor: You have to admit, they make a cute couple.

Gluttonous Ooze.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and gain Armor equal to its Attack.
Gluttonous Ooze.name: Gluttonous Ooze
Gluttonous Ooze.flavor: Three time winner of the Un'Goro weapon eating contest.

Death Revenant.name: Death Revenant
Death Revenant.flavor: How's everyone doing? Hurt? Bleeding? Wounded? ... Excellent.

Toxic Sewer Ooze.text: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
Toxic Sewer Ooze.name: Toxic Sewer Ooze
Toxic Sewer Ooze.flavor: When Sergeant Sally shows up unexpectedly, DO NOT FLUSH YOUR MANA CRYSTALS DOWN THE TOILET.

Blood To Ichor.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, summon a 2/2 Slime.
Blood To Ichor.name: Blood To Ichor
Blood To Ichor.flavor: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.

Ghastly Conjurer.text: Battlecry: Add a 'Mirror Image' spell to your hand.
Ghastly Conjurer.name: Ghastly Conjurer
Ghastly Conjurer.flavor: Wearing purple after the holidays? GHASTLY!

Eye for an Eye.text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal that much damage to the enemy hero.
Eye for an Eye.name: Eye for an Eye
Eye for an Eye.flavor: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

Dire Mole.name: Dire Mole
Dire Mole.flavor: You especially don't want to make a dire mountain out of a dire mole hill.

Soul of the Forest.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
Soul of the Forest.name: Soul of the Forest

Shadow Word: Pain.text: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack.
Shadow Word: Pain.name: Shadow Word: Pain
Shadow Word: Pain.flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

Siphon Soul.text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to your hero.
Siphon Soul.name: Siphon Soul
Siphon Soul.flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

Forbidden Healing.text: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.
Forbidden Healing.name: Forbidden Healing
Forbidden Healing.flavor: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.

Vilespine Slayer.name: Vilespine Slayer
Vilespine Slayer.flavor: 'Cause slayers gonna slay, slay, slay, slay, slay.

Bone Drake.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
Bone Drake.name: Bone Drake
Bone Drake.flavor: The bone drake brings all the dragons to the yard. He would teach you, but you have no cards.

Flame Juggler.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Flame Juggler.name: Flame Juggler
Flame Juggler.flavor: At first he liked juggling chain saws, but then he thought, "Flames are better!  Because FIRE!"

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

Prince Taldaram.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 3-Cost cards, transform into a 3/3 copy of a minion.
Prince Taldaram.name: Prince Taldaram
Prince Taldaram.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to copy others.

Daring Reporter.text: Whenever your opponent draws a card, gain +1/+1.
Daring Reporter.name: Daring Reporter
Daring Reporter.flavor: She's working on a story!  While skydiving!

Runic Egg.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Runic Egg.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Runic Egg.name: Runic Egg
Runic Egg.flavor: Oh man! Runic omelettes are the best!

Dragonslayer.name: Dragonslayer
Dragonslayer.flavor: A pair of stout dwarves nearly averted the Cataclysm.

Medivh's Valet.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 3 damage.
Medivh's Valet.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Medivh's Valet.name: Medivh's Valet
Medivh's Valet.flavor: "Magus Medivh sir, I've brought the flaming balloons, as you requested."
Medivh's Valet.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Assassinate.name: Assassinate
Assassinate.flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

Venomancer.name: Venomancer
Venomancer.flavor: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

Lesser Jasper Spellstone.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. @(Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
Lesser Jasper Spellstone.name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
Lesser Jasper Spellstone.flavor:
In ancient woods, elves fought the curse
The demon’s shadow to disperse
But hatred raged and frail souls turned
Now horned and hooved their forests burned.
Lesser Jasper Spellstone.collectionText: Deal $2 damage to a minion. (Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)

Living Roots.text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
Living Roots.name: Living Roots
Living Roots.flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

Kabal Crystal Runner.text: Costs (2) less for each Secret you've played this game.
Kabal Crystal Runner.name: Kabal Crystal Runner
Kabal Crystal Runner.flavor: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

Sunwalker.name: Sunwalker
Sunwalker.flavor: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don’t worry!

Humongous Razorleaf.name: Humongous Razorleaf
Humongous Razorleaf.flavor: Loves goblins.  In a light cream sauce.

King of Beasts.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other Beast you have.
King of Beasts.name: King of Beasts
King of Beasts.flavor: He never sleeps.  Not even in the mighty jungle.

Keeper of Uldaman.text: Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
Keeper of Uldaman.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Keeper of Uldaman.name: Keeper of Uldaman
Keeper of Uldaman.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Keeper of Uldaman.flavor: U da man!  No, U da man!

Ogre Ninja.text: Stealth 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Ogre Ninja.name: Ogre Ninja
Ogre Ninja.flavor: He didn't have the grades to get into ninja school, but his dad pulled some strings.

Kabal Talonpriest.name: Kabal Talonpriest
Kabal Talonpriest.flavor: Inkmaster Solia had to figure out how to tattoo feathers.

Obsidian Shard.text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each
card you've played from
another class.
Obsidian Shard.name: Obsidian Shard
Obsidian Shard.flavor: You know you’re a Rogue when a sharp rock makes you go “Ooh!  Dagger!”

Hogger, Doom of Elwynn.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
Hogger, Doom of Elwynn.name: Hogger, Doom of Elwynn
Hogger, Doom of Elwynn.flavor: When C'thun went to sleep, he checked under his bed for Hogger.

Worgen Infiltrator.name: Worgen Infiltrator
Worgen Infiltrator.flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

Fen Creeper.name: Fen Creeper
Fen Creeper.flavor: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast.   Boom, New Name!

Tournament Attendee.name: Tournament Attendee
Tournament Attendee.flavor: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament.  He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

Blackwater Pirate.name: Blackwater Pirate
Blackwater Pirate.flavor: "Look, they fell off the back of a ship, do you want them or not? I have a meeting with Y'Shaarj in like ten minutes."

Lynessa Sunsorrow.text: [x]Battlecry: Cast each spell you cast on your minions this game on this one.
Lynessa Sunsorrow.name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
Lynessa Sunsorrow.flavor: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

Pyroblast.name: Pyroblast
Pyroblast.flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

Possessed Villager.name: Possessed Villager
Possessed Villager.flavor: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.

Enter the Coliseum.text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
Enter the Coliseum.name: Enter the Coliseum
Enter the Coliseum.flavor: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...

Windfury Harpy.name: Windfury Harpy
Windfury Harpy.flavor: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

Lesser Sapphire Spellstone.text: Summon 1 copy of a friendly minion. @(Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)
Lesser Sapphire Spellstone.name: Lesser Sapphire Spellstone
Lesser Sapphire Spellstone.flavor:
A stone of blue, embraced with glee
By murloc lords beneath the sea
Soon numberless they swarmed the shore
First two, then four, then more...and more...
Lesser Sapphire Spellstone.collectionText: Summon 1 copy of a friendly minion. (Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)

Abusive Sergeant.text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
Abusive Sergeant.name: Abusive Sergeant
Abusive Sergeant.flavor: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

Spellbreaker.name: Spellbreaker
Spellbreaker.flavor: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders.  The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

Kobold Hermit.text: Battlecry: Choose a basic Totem. Summon it.
Kobold Hermit.name: Kobold Hermit
Kobold Hermit.flavor: To truly understand candles, it takes YEARS of quiet contemplation.

Pterrordax Hatchling.name: Pterrordax Hatchling
Pterrordax Hatchling.flavor: Aww.  So cute.  Want to feed him another finger?

Charge.text: Give a friendly minion Charge. It can't attack heroes this turn.
Charge.name: Charge
Charge.flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

Nefarian.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Nefarian.text: Battlecry: Add 2 random spells to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Nefarian.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Nefarian.name: Nefarian
Nefarian.flavor: They call him "Blackwing" because he's a black dragon...... and he's got wings.

Twisting Nether.name: Twisting Nether
