Twisting Nether.flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

Tunnel Trogg.text: Whenever you Overload, gain +1 Attack per locked Mana Crystal.
Tunnel Trogg.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Tunnel Trogg.name: Tunnel Trogg
Tunnel Trogg.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Tunnel Trogg.flavor: Sure, they're ugly, but they live in tunnels.  You try your beauty routine without natural light.

Loatheb.text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
Loatheb.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Loatheb.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Loatheb.name: Loatheb
Loatheb.flavor: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast.  This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.

Redemption.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
Redemption.name: Redemption
Redemption.flavor: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!

Dragon's Breath.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dragon's Breath.text: Deal $4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Dragon's Breath.name: Dragon's Breath
Dragon's Breath.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dragon's Breath.flavor: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy?  It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.

Consecration.name: Consecration
Consecration.flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

Gnash.text: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Gain 3 Armor.
Gnash.name: Gnash
Gnash.flavor: It's rude to gnash with your mouth open.

Crazed Worshipper.text: Taunt. Whenever this minion takes damage, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Crazed Worshipper.name: Crazed Worshipper
Crazed Worshipper.flavor: Every month they share a pancake breakfast with the Perfectly Rational Worshippers.

Soggoth the Slitherer.text: Taunt Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Soggoth the Slitherer.name: Soggoth the Slitherer
Soggoth the Slitherer.flavor: Don't tell Soggoth, but in the future he gets totally owned by the Master's Glaive and his skull becomes a tourist attraction.

Tyrantus.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Tyrantus.name: Tyrantus
Tyrantus.flavor: Millennia of evolutionary pressures turned his species into the Faerie Dragons we know today.

Infest.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."
Infest.name: Infest
Infest.flavor: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err… corpse.

Lotus Agents.text: Battlecry: Discover a Druid, Rogue, or Shaman card.
Lotus Agents.name: Lotus Agents
Lotus Agents.flavor: Mostly, they stand around and look cool.

Stegodon.name: Stegodon
Stegodon.flavor: Level 40 Tortollan Paladins quest to tame a Stegodon.  There are no level 41 Tortollan Paladins.

Emerald Hive Queen.name: Emerald Hive Queen
Emerald Hive Queen.flavor: She rules the emerald hive at the end of the yellow brick trail.

Booty Bay Bodyguard.name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
Booty Bay Bodyguard.flavor: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

Rallying Blade.text: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.
Rallying Blade.name: Rallying Blade
Rallying Blade.flavor: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

Keening Banshee.text: Whenever you play a card, remove the top 3 cards of your deck.
Keening Banshee.name: Keening Banshee
Keening Banshee.flavor: "What are your strengths?" the interviewer asked. "Well," she replied, "I'm really good at keening."

Mad Scientist.text: Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
Mad Scientist.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Mad Scientist.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Mad Scientist.name: Mad Scientist
Mad Scientist.flavor: His mother wanted him to be a mage or a warlock, but noooooooo, he had to go and be a scientist like his father.

Competitive Spirit.text: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
Competitive Spirit.name: Competitive Spirit
Competitive Spirit.flavor: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.

Leatherclad Hogleader.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand, gain Charge.
Leatherclad Hogleader.name: Leatherclad Hogleader
Leatherclad Hogleader.flavor: The Hogchoppers, the terrors of Tanaris, can always be found at one tavern or another in Gadgetzan, refueling for totally real and legit adventures that they go on.

Void Crusher.text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.
Void Crusher.name: Void Crusher

Stalagg.text: Deathrattle: If Feugen also died this game, summon Thaddius.
Stalagg.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Stalagg.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Stalagg.name: Stalagg
Stalagg.flavor: Stalagg want to write own flavor text.  "STALAGG AWESOME!"

Backstreet Leper.text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Backstreet Leper.name: Backstreet Leper
Backstreet Leper.flavor: Quit playing games with his heart. And his fingers. And foot. It's rude.

Lesser Amethyst Spellstone.text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
Lesser Amethyst Spellstone.name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
Lesser Amethyst Spellstone.flavor:
A purple stone Azari carved
For dark hearts, craving, power-starved.
The first to bow, the warlock Rin,
Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

Crypt Lord.text: [x]Taunt After you summon a minion, gain +1 Health.
Crypt Lord.name: Crypt Lord

Spikeridged Steed.text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.
Spikeridged Steed.name: Spikeridged Steed

Dispatch Kodo.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack.
Dispatch Kodo.name: Dispatch Kodo
Dispatch Kodo.flavor: "Crime reported at First Bank of Gadgetzan.  Huge quantities of Jade being carried away by what looks like a bunch of Hozen.  Kodo 77 can you make it over there now?"

Kindly Grandmother.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Kindly Grandmother.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Kindly Grandmother.name: Kindly Grandmother

Darkshire Librarian.text: Battlecry: Discard a random card. Deathrattle: Draw a card.
Darkshire Librarian.name: Darkshire Librarian
Darkshire Librarian.flavor: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.

King Togwaggle.text: [x]Battlecry: Swap decks with your opponent. Give them a Ransom spell to swap back.
King Togwaggle.name: King Togwaggle
King Togwaggle.flavor: Management of the Kobold Empire requires a careful balance between a lack of social services and fiscal irresponsibility.

Shadow Ascendant.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
give another random
friendly minion +1/+1.
Shadow Ascendant.name: Shadow Ascendant
Shadow Ascendant.flavor: When you're at the bottom, there's nowhere to ascend, but up.

Recycle.text: Shuffle an enemy minion into your opponent's deck.
Recycle.name: Recycle
Recycle.flavor: Druidic recycling involves putting plastics in one bin and enemy minions in another bin.

Lance Carrier.name: Lance Carrier
Lance Carrier.flavor: Lance Carrier is an obscure entry level position in orcish armies.  A mystery, since orcs don't generally use lances.

Darkscale Healer.text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
Darkscale Healer.name: Darkscale Healer
Darkscale Healer.flavor: Healing is just something she does in her free time.  It's more of a hobby really.

Gilded Gargoyle.text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
Gilded Gargoyle.name: Gilded Gargoyle
Gilded Gargoyle.flavor: You hear a coin rattling inside the slotted gargoyle...What could it mean?

Dark Iron Dwarf.text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
Dark Iron Dwarf.name: Dark Iron Dwarf
Dark Iron Dwarf.flavor: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.  Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

Val'kyr Soulclaimer.text:
[x]After this minion
survives damage,
summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Val'kyr Soulclaimer.name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer
Val'kyr Soulclaimer.flavor: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

Djinni of Zephyrs.text: After you cast a spell on another friendly minion, cast a copy of it on this one.
Djinni of Zephyrs.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Djinni of Zephyrs.name: Djinni of Zephyrs
Djinni of Zephyrs.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Djinni of Zephyrs.flavor: If you want your wish granted, don't rub him the wrong way.

Clockwork Giant.text: Costs (1) less for each card in your opponent's hand.
Clockwork Giant.name: Clockwork Giant
Clockwork Giant.flavor: He and Mountain Giant don't get along.

Windspeaker.name: Windspeaker
Windspeaker.flavor: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

Unbound Elemental.text: Whenever you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.
Unbound Elemental.name: Unbound Elemental
Unbound Elemental.flavor: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

Stolen Goods.text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +3/+3.
Stolen Goods.name: Stolen Goods
Stolen Goods.flavor: It fell off a kodo, I promise!

Innervate.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
Innervate.name: Innervate
Innervate.flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

Confuse.text: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions.
Confuse.name: Confuse

Sanguine Reveler.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain +2/+2.
Sanguine Reveler.name: Sanguine Reveler
Sanguine Reveler.flavor: Have some! This drink is to die for!

Master of Evolution.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
Master of Evolution.name: Master of Evolution
Master of Evolution.flavor: Will be really useful in the new "Hearthémon" game.

Sleep with the Fishes.text: Deal $3 damage to all damaged minions.
Sleep with the Fishes.name: Sleep with the Fishes
Sleep with the Fishes.flavor: If you're sleeping with the fishes, we highly suggest not bringing an electric blanket.

Mogu'shan Warden.name: Mogu'shan Warden
Mogu'shan Warden.flavor: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

Iron Sensei.text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.
Iron Sensei.name: Iron Sensei
Iron Sensei.flavor:
Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language.
0110100001101001

Fire Elemental.name: Fire Elemental
Fire Elemental.flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

Demolisher.text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Demolisher.name: Demolisher
Demolisher.flavor: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone.  It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

Dark Iron Skulker.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all undamaged enemy minions.
Dark Iron Skulker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dark Iron Skulker.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dark Iron Skulker.name: Dark Iron Skulker
Dark Iron Skulker.flavor: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.

Felfire Potion.name: Felfire Potion
Felfire Potion.flavor: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.

Freezing Trap.text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
Freezing Trap.name: Freezing Trap
Freezing Trap.flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

Arcane Giant.text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each spell
you've cast this game.
Arcane Giant.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Arcane Giant.name: Arcane Giant
Arcane Giant.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Arcane Giant.flavor: Claims to be drawn to Karazhan because of the ley lines. Actually, just loves Moroes’ cooking.

Medivh, the Guardian.text: Battlecry: Equip Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian.
Medivh, the Guardian.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Medivh, the Guardian.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Medivh, the Guardian.name: Medivh, the Guardian
Medivh, the Guardian.flavor: If you think the party's great now, just wait 'til he invites the orcs over!

Ticking Abomination.name: Ticking Abomination
Ticking Abomination.flavor: Abomination. Emphasis on the second syllable.

Arcane Golem.text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
Arcane Golem.name: Arcane Golem
Arcane Golem.flavor: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

Patches the Pirate.text:
[x]After you play a Pirate,
summon this minion
from your deck.
Patches the Pirate.name: Patches the Pirate
Patches the Pirate.flavor: What do sailors yell when Patches steals their treasure chest full of laws and other things being transported to parliament for a vote?  "The Eyes have it!"

Simulacrum.text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
Simulacrum.name: Simulacrum
Simulacrum.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

Moonfire.name: Moonfire
Moonfire.flavor: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

Firelands Portal.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
Firelands Portal.text:
Deal $5 damage. Summon a random
5-Cost minion.
Firelands Portal.name: Firelands Portal
Firelands Portal.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
Firelands Portal.flavor: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"

Infested Wolf.name: Infested Wolf
Infested Wolf.flavor: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

Shadowreaper Anduin.text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
Shadowreaper Anduin.name: Shadowreaper Anduin
Shadowreaper Anduin.flavor: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light… inevitably casts a shadow."

Journey Below.name: Journey Below
Journey Below.flavor: Don't stop believing there's something below.

Corrupted Seer.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all non-Murloc minions.
Corrupted Seer.name: Corrupted Seer
Corrupted Seer.flavor: For seers, it's very handy to have your crystal ball hanging right in front of your face.

Fierce Monkey.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Fierce Monkey.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Fierce Monkey.name: Fierce Monkey

Silvermoon Portal.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Silvermoon Portal.text:
Give a minion +2/+2. Summon a random
2-Cost minion.
Silvermoon Portal.name: Silvermoon Portal
Silvermoon Portal.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Silvermoon Portal.flavor: What's Millhouse Manastorm doing in Silvermoon?

Fal'dorei Strider.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your deck. When drawn, summon a 4/4 Spider.
Fal'dorei Strider.name: Fal'dorei Strider
Fal'dorei Strider.flavor: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

Auchenai Soulpriest.text: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
Auchenai Soulpriest.name: Auchenai Soulpriest
Auchenai Soulpriest.flavor: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

Refreshment Vendor.name: Refreshment Vendor
Refreshment Vendor.flavor: Menu:  Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks.  It's hard serving a diverse clientele.

Core Rager.text: Battlecry: If your hand is empty, gain +3/+3.
Core Rager.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Core Rager.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Core Rager.name: Core Rager
Core Rager.flavor: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.

Patient Assassin.name: Patient Assassin
Patient Assassin.flavor: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

Val'anyr.text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
Val'anyr.name: Val'anyr
Val'anyr.flavor: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

Primordial Glyph.text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
Primordial Glyph.name: Primordial Glyph
Primordial Glyph.flavor: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

N'Zoth's First Mate.name: N'Zoth's First Mate
N'Zoth's First Mate.flavor: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

Divine Strength.name: Divine Strength
Divine Strength.flavor: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

Master of Ceremonies.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Spell Damage, gain +2/+2.
Master of Ceremonies.name: Master of Ceremonies

Thrall, Deathseer.text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.
Thrall, Deathseer.name: Thrall, Deathseer
Thrall, Deathseer.flavor: "Do not be afraid. Approach. The dead will sleep… for now."

Bone Baron.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Skeletons to your hand.
Bone Baron.name: Bone Baron

Lightbomb.text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
Lightbomb.name: Lightbomb
Lightbomb.flavor: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

Fire Plume Phoenix.name: Fire Plume Phoenix
Fire Plume Phoenix.flavor: This is what happens when you use a volcano as a bird bath.

Voidcaller.text: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
Voidcaller.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Voidcaller.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Voidcaller.name: Voidcaller

Tirion Fordring.name: Tirion Fordring
Tirion Fordring.flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

Demented Frostcaller.text: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy.
Demented Frostcaller.name: Demented Frostcaller
Demented Frostcaller.flavor: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'

Reliquary Seeker.text: Battlecry: If you have 6 other minions, gain +4/+4.
Reliquary Seeker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Reliquary Seeker.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Reliquary Seeker.name: Reliquary Seeker
Reliquary Seeker.flavor: The Reliquary considers itself the equal of the League of Explorers.  The League of Explorers doesn't.

Hallucination.text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
Hallucination.name: Hallucination
Hallucination.flavor: It's the good kind of hallucination.

Dark Wispers.text: Choose One - Summon 5 Wisps; or Give a minion +5/+5 and Taunt.
Dark Wispers.name: Dark Wispers
Dark Wispers.flavor: Don't worry; we fired the person who named this card.

Soot Spewer.name: Soot Spewer
Soot Spewer.flavor: The inventor of the goblin shredder is involved in several patent disputes with the inventor of the soot spewer.

Kobold Illusionist.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 copy of a minion from your hand.
Kobold Illusionist.name: Kobold Illusionist
Kobold Illusionist.flavor: He can make ANYTHING look like a candle.

Young Priestess.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
Young Priestess.name: Young Priestess
Young Priestess.flavor: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

Cairne Bloodhoof.name: Cairne Bloodhoof
Cairne Bloodhoof.flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

Vulgar Homunculus.name: Vulgar Homunculus
Vulgar Homunculus.flavor: Fortunately he has an even number of fingers.

Dead Man's Hand.text: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your deck.
Dead Man's Hand.name: Dead Man's Hand
Dead Man's Hand.flavor: I got two pair, Rags and Armorsmiths. What you got?

Commanding Shout.text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.
Commanding Shout.name: Commanding Shout
Commanding Shout.flavor: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

Sap.text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
Sap.name: Sap

Scorp-o-matic.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 1 or less Attack.
Scorp-o-matic.name: Scorp-o-matic
Scorp-o-matic.flavor: Back in my day, we had to manually scorp.

Grimestreet Pawnbroker.text: Battlecry: Give a random weapon in your hand +1/+1.
Grimestreet Pawnbroker.name: Grimestreet Pawnbroker
Grimestreet Pawnbroker.flavor: "I don't know a lot about used GvG cards, so I'm going to have to call in an expert."

Blessing of Kings.name: Blessing of Kings
Blessing of Kings.flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

Spreading Madness.text: Deal $9 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
Spreading Madness.name: Spreading Madness
Spreading Madness.flavor: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

Venomstrike Trap.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a 2/3 Poisonous Cobra.
Venomstrike Trap.name: Venomstrike Trap

Revenge.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Revenge.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $3 damage instead.
Revenge.name: Revenge
Revenge.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Revenge.flavor: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.

Mechwarper.name: Mechwarper
Mechwarper.flavor: Mechs that summon mechs? What's next? Donuts that summon donuts? Mmmmm.

Babbling Book.text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
Babbling Book.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Babbling Book.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Babbling Book.name: Babbling Book
Babbling Book.flavor: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.

Siltfin Spiritwalker.text: Whenever another friendly Murloc dies, draw a card. Overload: (1)
Siltfin Spiritwalker.name: Siltfin Spiritwalker
Siltfin Spiritwalker.flavor: The elements respond to anyone who calls them for a worthy cause, even if you call them by yelling, "MRGHRGLGLGL!"

Mirror Entity.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
Mirror Entity.name: Mirror Entity
Mirror Entity.flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

Bloodsail Corsair.text: [x]Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
Bloodsail Corsair.name: Bloodsail Corsair
Bloodsail Corsair.flavor: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It's called the "Pirate's Code".

Thunder Bluff Valiant.name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
Thunder Bluff Valiant.flavor: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating.  I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

Whirling Zap-o-matic.name: Whirling Zap-o-matic
Whirling Zap-o-matic.flavor: If you pay a little extra, you can get it in "candy-apple red."

Lakkari Sacrifice.name: Lakkari Sacrifice
Lakkari Sacrifice.flavor: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

Mountainfire Armor.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, gain 6 Armor.
Mountainfire Armor.name: Mountainfire Armor
Mountainfire Armor.flavor: Excuse me. Your mountain is on fire.

Junkbot.text: Whenever a friendly Mech dies, gain +2/+2.
Junkbot.name: Junkbot
Junkbot.flavor: One bot's junk is another bot's AWESOME UPGRADE!

Fireguard Destroyer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Fireguard Destroyer.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Fireguard Destroyer.name: Fireguard Destroyer
Fireguard Destroyer.flavor: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.

Trogg Gloomeater.name: Trogg Gloomeater
Trogg Gloomeater.flavor: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

Eviscerate.name: Eviscerate
Eviscerate.flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent:  It takes a long time to get blood stains out of leather armor.

The Curator.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
The Curator.text: Taunt Battlecry: Draw a Beast, Dragon, and Murloc from your deck.
The Curator.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
The Curator.name: The Curator
The Curator.flavor: The Curator guards Azeroth’s deadliest creatures, but it’s secretly terrified of squirrels.

Tiny Knight of Evil.text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
Tiny Knight of Evil.name: Tiny Knight of Evil
Tiny Knight of Evil.flavor: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

Silver Hand Knight.name: Silver Hand Knight
Silver Hand Knight.flavor: It's good to be a knight.   Less so to be one's squire.

Ogre Brute.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Ogre Brute.name: Ogre Brute
Ogre Brute.flavor: Ogres have really terrible short-term chocolate.

Bluegill Warrior.name: Bluegill Warrior
Bluegill Warrior.flavor: He just wants a hug.   A sloppy... slimy... hug.

Dreadsteed.text: Deathrattle: At the end of the turn, summon a Dreadsteed.
Dreadsteed.name: Dreadsteed
Dreadsteed.flavor: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

Undertaker.text: Whenever you summon a minion with Deathrattle, gain +1 Attack.
Undertaker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Undertaker.name: Undertaker
Undertaker.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Undertaker.flavor: In a world where you can run to a spirit healer and resurrect yourself, Undertakers do pretty light business.

Defile.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If any die, cast this again.
Defile.name: Defile
Defile.flavor: This spell was originally designed to help warlocks clean up their hard drives.

Tar Lurker.text: Taunt Has +3 Attack during your opponent's turn.
Tar Lurker.name: Tar Lurker
Tar Lurker.flavor: Hi, Tar here. Long time lurking, first time taunting…

Lone Champion.text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
Lone Champion.name: Lone Champion
Lone Champion.flavor: He is a champion, with no friends. He'll keep on fighting, til the end!

Baron Rivendare.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Baron Rivendare.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Baron Rivendare.name: Baron Rivendare
Baron Rivendare.flavor: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.

Jade Idol.text: Choose One - Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.
Jade Idol.name: Jade Idol
Jade Idol.collectionText: Choose One - Summon a Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.

Giant Mastodon.name: Giant Mastodon
Giant Mastodon.flavor: Still salty about it not being the "Year of the Mastodon."

Tinkmaster Overspark.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform another random minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel.
Tinkmaster Overspark.name: Tinkmaster Overspark
Tinkmaster Overspark.targetingArrowText: Transform a minion into a 5/5 or a 1/1 at random.
Tinkmaster Overspark.flavor: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.

Bomb Lobber.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.
Bomb Lobber.name: Bomb Lobber
Bomb Lobber.flavor: He lobbies Orgrimmar daily on behalf of bombs.

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

C'Thun.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack randomly split among all enemies.
C'Thun.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
C'Thun.howToEarn: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
C'Thun.name: C'Thun
C'Thun.flavor: C'Thun's least favorite Hearthstone card: Eye for an Eye.

Sinister Strike.text: Deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.
Sinister Strike.name: Sinister Strike
Sinister Strike.flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

Windfury.name: Windfury
Windfury.flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

Acidmaw.text: Whenever another minion takes damage, destroy it.
Acidmaw.name: Acidmaw
Acidmaw.flavor: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!

Shado-Pan Rider.name: Shado-Pan Rider
Shado-Pan Rider.flavor: He needed a break after that business in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Naturally, he chose to spend his vacation in an icy snowscape killing monsters.

Armorsmith.text: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
Armorsmith.name: Armorsmith
Armorsmith.flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

Gruul.text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
Gruul.name: Gruul
Gruul.flavor: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

Tuskarr Jouster.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore 7 Health to your hero.
Tuskarr Jouster.name: Tuskarr Jouster
Tuskarr Jouster.flavor: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...

The Mistcaller.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
The Mistcaller.name: The Mistcaller
The Mistcaller.flavor: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great.  "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

Forbidden Ritual.text: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.
Forbidden Ritual.name: Forbidden Ritual
Forbidden Ritual.flavor: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.

Museum Curator.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Museum Curator.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Museum Curator.name: Museum Curator
Museum Curator.flavor: He is forever cursing the kids who climb on the rails and the evil archeologists who animate the exhibits.

Alley Armorsmith.text: [x]Taunt Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
Alley Armorsmith.name: Alley Armorsmith
Alley Armorsmith.flavor: The rent is cheap and she passes the savings onto YOU!

Shadowfiend.text: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
Shadowfiend.name: Shadowfiend
Shadowfiend.flavor: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.

Repentance.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
Repentance.name: Repentance
Repentance.flavor: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

Shadow Word: Horror.text: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.
Shadow Word: Horror.name: Shadow Word: Horror
Shadow Word: Horror.flavor: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."

Spectral Knight.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Spectral Knight.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Spectral Knight.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Spectral Knight.name: Spectral Knight
Spectral Knight.flavor: What do Faerie Dragons and Spectral Knights have in common?  They both love pasta!

Pint-Sized Summoner.text: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.
Pint-Sized Summoner.name: Pint-Sized Summoner
Pint-Sized Summoner.flavor: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

Skeram Cultist.name: Skeram Cultist
Skeram Cultist.flavor: Just before he comes into play, there is an AWESOME training montage with C'Thun.

Herald Volazj.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of each of your other minions.
Herald Volazj.name: Herald Volazj
Herald Volazj.flavor: His whole job is yelling "Yogg-Saron comin'!"

Lotus Illusionist.text:
[x]After this minion attacks
a hero, transform it into a
 random 6-Cost minion.
Lotus Illusionist.name: Lotus Illusionist
Lotus Illusionist.flavor: If you think her Illidan and Sylvanas cosplay is great, wait till you see her Reno Jackson!

Raging Worgen.name: Raging Worgen
Raging Worgen.flavor: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

Power Word: Shield.text:
Give a minion +2 Health.
Draw a card.
Power Word: Shield.name: Power Word: Shield
Power Word: Shield.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

Excavated Evil.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Excavated Evil.text:
Deal $3 damage to all minions.
Shuffle this card into your opponent's deck.
Excavated Evil.name: Excavated Evil
Excavated Evil.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Excavated Evil.flavor: MOM! DAD! DON'T TOUCH IT! IT'S EVIL!!!!!!

Clockwork Knight.name: Clockwork Knight
Clockwork Knight.flavor: It takes a lot to wind him up.

Prophet Velen.text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
Prophet Velen.name: Prophet Velen
Prophet Velen.flavor: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

Cheat Death.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand. It costs (2) less.
Cheat Death.name: Cheat Death

Molten Blade.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
Molten Blade.name: Molten Blade
Molten Blade.flavor: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!

Valeera the Hollow.name: Valeera the Hollow
Valeera the Hollow.flavor: "Run away. Hide in your precious keeps, behind your walls and your bodyguards. Night always falls, and shadows will fill your hallowed halls. One day, one of those shadows will be me."

Wrathion.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Draw cards until you draw one that isn't a Dragon.
Wrathion.name: Wrathion
Wrathion.flavor: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon.  Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask?  WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

Al'Akir the Windlord.name: Al'Akir the Windlord
Al'Akir the Windlord.flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

Greedy Sprite.name: Greedy Sprite
Greedy Sprite.flavor: Sparkliest of the seven deadly sprites.

Carnivorous Cube.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of it.
Carnivorous Cube.name: Carnivorous Cube
Carnivorous Cube.flavor: He's always grumpy until he's eaten his first barista of the morning.

On the Hunt.name: On the Hunt
On the Hunt.flavor: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

Stand Against Darkness.name: Stand Against Darkness
Stand Against Darkness.flavor: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

Evasion.text: Secret: After your hero takes damage, become Immune this turn.
Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.flavor: Works on weapons, missiles, and taxes.

Boisterous Bard.name: Boisterous Bard
Boisterous Bard.flavor: As a kid, she fought with rocks.  Now she fights with ROCK!

Spider Tank.name: Spider Tank
Spider Tank.flavor: "What if we put guns on it?" -Fizzblitz, staring at the spider-transportation-machine

Call Pet.text:
Draw a card.
If it's a Beast, it costs (4) less.
Call Pet.name: Call Pet

Avalanche.text: Freeze a minion and deal $3 damage to adjacent ones.
Avalanche.name: Avalanche
Avalanche.flavor: One of our more snowbally cards.

Bittertide Hydra.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 3 damage to your hero.
Bittertide Hydra.name: Bittertide Hydra
Bittertide Hydra.flavor: It's actually only the middle head that's bitter. The others are sweet and spicy.

Addled Grizzly.text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1.
Addled Grizzly.name: Addled Grizzly
Addled Grizzly.flavor: Druids who spend too long in bear form are more susceptible to the whispers of the Old Gods.  Right now they are whispering the lyrics to "La Bamba".

Tanaris Hogchopper.text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent's hand is empty, gain Charge.
Tanaris Hogchopper.name: Tanaris Hogchopper
Tanaris Hogchopper.flavor: The Hogchoppers are well-known throughout Kalimdor for being a real, actual group.

Dalaran Mage.name: Dalaran Mage
Dalaran Mage.flavor: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

Dragonfire Potion.text:
[x]Deal $5 damage to all
minions except Dragons.
Dragonfire Potion.name: Dragonfire Potion
Dragonfire Potion.flavor: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

Scarlet Crusader.name: Scarlet Crusader
Scarlet Crusader.flavor: Never wash your whites with a Scarlet Crusader.

Demonheart.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion.  If it's a friendly Demon, give it +5/+5 instead.
Demonheart.name: Demonheart
Demonheart.flavor: Virtually every member of the pro demon lobby is a warlock. Weird.

Anodized Robo Cub.name: Anodized Robo Cub
Anodized Robo Cub.flavor: It's adorable! AND OH MY GOODNESS WHY IS IT EATING MY FACE

Silvermoon Guardian.name: Silvermoon Guardian
Silvermoon Guardian.flavor: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

Lotus Assassin.text: Stealth. Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain Stealth.
Lotus Assassin.name: Lotus Assassin
Lotus Assassin.flavor: For 5000g, you can just give the Jade Lotus any name and they will assassinate and/or embarrass them.

Evolving Spores.name: Evolving Spores
Evolving Spores.flavor: The most powerful mushrooms are commonly found in boxes marked with "?".

Kabal Courier.text: Battlecry: Discover a Mage, Priest, or Warlock card.
Kabal Courier.name: Kabal Courier
Kabal Courier.flavor: Hey, you park your kodo under a harpy nest, you get what you deserve.

Desert Camel.text: Battlecry: Put a 1-Cost minion from each deck into the battlefield.
Desert Camel.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Desert Camel.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Desert Camel.name: Desert Camel
Desert Camel.flavor: Dang.  This card is sweet.  Almost as sweet as Dessert Camel.

Flame Imp.name: Flame Imp
Flame Imp.flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

Scavenging Hyena.text: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
Scavenging Hyena.name: Scavenging Hyena
Scavenging Hyena.flavor: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything.  Even Brussels sprouts.

Wax Elemental.name: Wax Elemental
Wax Elemental.flavor: Takes double damage from wick-based weapons.

Ancestral Spirit.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
Ancestral Spirit.name: Ancestral Spirit
Ancestral Spirit.flavor: It was just a flesh wound.

Darkspeaker.text: Battlecry: Swap stats with a friendly minion.
Darkspeaker.name: Darkspeaker
Darkspeaker.flavor: People often think that Darkspeaker is the arch nemesis of Lightspeaker, but that title actually belongs to Heavyspeaker.

Polluted Hoarder.name: Polluted Hoarder
Polluted Hoarder.flavor: Roll ‘greed’ OR THIS COULD HAPPEN TO YOU.

Deadly Poison.name: Deadly Poison
Deadly Poison.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

Murloc Tidecaller.text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
Murloc Tidecaller.name: Murloc Tidecaller
Murloc Tidecaller.flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

Duplicate.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Duplicate.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
Duplicate.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Duplicate.name: Duplicate
Duplicate.flavor: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!

Razorpetal Volley.text: Add two Razorpetals to your hand that deal 1 damage.
Razorpetal Volley.name: Razorpetal Volley
Razorpetal Volley.flavor: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

Psychic Scream.text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
Psychic Scream.name: Psychic Scream

Second-Rate Bruiser.text: [x]Taunt Costs (2) less if your opponent has at least three minions.
Second-Rate Bruiser.name: Second-Rate Bruiser
Second-Rate Bruiser.flavor: He'll be a first-rate bruiser once he gets used to his contacts.

Sense Demons.name: Sense Demons
Sense Demons.flavor: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

Ixlid, Fungal Lord.text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
Ixlid, Fungal Lord.name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
Ixlid, Fungal Lord.flavor: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

Velen's Chosen.name: Velen's Chosen
Velen's Chosen.flavor: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

Powermace.name: Powermace
Powermace.flavor: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

Arrogant Crusader.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Arrogant Crusader.name: Arrogant Crusader
Arrogant Crusader.flavor: To be honest, he was kind of a jerk even BEFORE he was bitten by that ghoul.

Gormok the Impaler.text: Battlecry: If you have at least 4 other minions, deal 4 damage.
Gormok the Impaler.name: Gormok the Impaler
Gormok the Impaler.flavor: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds.  For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!

Light's Justice.name: Light's Justice
Light's Justice.flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

Mirage Caller.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
Mirage Caller.name: Mirage Caller
Mirage Caller.flavor: Mirage is actually the name of its long-lost cat.

Forked Lightning.text: Deal $2 damage to 2 random enemy minions. Overload: (2)
Forked Lightning.name: Forked Lightning
Forked Lightning.flavor: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

Avenge.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Avenge.text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
Avenge.howToEarn: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Avenge.name: Avenge
Avenge.flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force".  Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.

Illidan Stormrage.text: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth.
Illidan Stormrage.name: Illidan Stormrage
Illidan Stormrage.flavor: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years.  Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

Ancient Brewmaster.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
Ancient Brewmaster.name: Ancient Brewmaster
Ancient Brewmaster.targetingArrowText: Return a minion to your hand.
Ancient Brewmaster.flavor: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak.  But apparently that's a compliment.

Hogger.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
Hogger.name: Hogger
Hogger.flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

Gemstudded Golem.text: Taunt Can only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.
Gemstudded Golem.name: Gemstudded Golem

Raven Idol.text: Choose One - Discover a minion; or Discover a spell.
Raven Idol.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Raven Idol.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Raven Idol.name: Raven Idol
Raven Idol.flavor: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothian Idol.

Reckless Flurry.text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
Reckless Flurry.name: Reckless Flurry
Reckless Flurry.flavor: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

Armored Warhorse.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Charge.
Armored Warhorse.name: Armored Warhorse
Armored Warhorse.flavor: Yep.  It's a horse... wearing armor... going to war.

Polymorph: Boar.text: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.
Polymorph: Boar.name: Polymorph: Boar

Leyline Manipulator.text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
Leyline Manipulator.name: Leyline Manipulator
Leyline Manipulator.flavor: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

Mana Wraith.name: Mana Wraith
Mana Wraith.flavor: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

Backstab.text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
Backstab.name: Backstab
Backstab.flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

Stormpike Commando.name: Stormpike Commando
Stormpike Commando.flavor: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts.  They also bake a mean cupcake.

Meat Wagon.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.
Meat Wagon.name: Meat Wagon

Magma Rager.name: Magma Rager
Magma Rager.flavor: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

Corrupting Mist.text: Corrupt every minion. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
Corrupting Mist.name: Corrupting Mist
Corrupting Mist.flavor: The most terrifying of Un’goro magics is both silent… AND deadly.

Mysterious Challenger.text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
Mysterious Challenger.name: Mysterious Challenger
Mysterious Challenger.flavor: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

Charged Devilsaur.name: Charged Devilsaur
Charged Devilsaur.flavor: What happens when a dinosaur mixes soda and pop rocks.

Dragon Egg.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/1 Whelp.
Dragon Egg.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dragon Egg.name: Dragon Egg
Dragon Egg.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dragon Egg.flavor: Think of them as bullets for your dragon gun.

Vinecleaver.text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
summon two 1/1 Silver
Hand Recruits.
Vinecleaver.name: Vinecleaver
Vinecleaver.flavor: George and Karl!  Thank the Light we found you!

Primal Talismans.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random basic Totem."
Primal Talismans.name: Primal Talismans
Primal Talismans.flavor: All that remained from the first kobold colony: a single talisman and the word "Flamestrike."

Undercity Huckster.text: Deathrattle: Add a random class card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Undercity Huckster.name: Undercity Huckster
Undercity Huckster.flavor: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

Spectral Pillager.text: [x]Combo: Deal damage equal to the number of other cards you've played this turn.
Spectral Pillager.name: Spectral Pillager
Spectral Pillager.flavor: It turns out you CAN take it with you.

Shadowflame.text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
Shadowflame.name: Shadowflame
Shadowflame.flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

Tracking.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others.
Tracking.name: Tracking
Tracking.flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

Ravasaur Runt.text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, Adapt.
Ravasaur Runt.name: Ravasaur Runt
Ravasaur Runt.flavor: Doesn't like to adapt unless others are watching. Some minions are such show-offs.

The Black Knight.name: The Black Knight
The Black Knight.flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

Princess Huhuran.name: Princess Huhuran
Princess Huhuran.flavor: She flitters around Ahn'Qiraj dreaming of the day she will meet a sweet prince, whom she can lay thousands of eggs with.

Onyx Bishop.text: Battlecry: Summon a friendly minion that died this game.
Onyx Bishop.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Onyx Bishop.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Onyx Bishop.name: Onyx Bishop
Onyx Bishop.flavor: B4 is a nice place to visit, but he wouldn't want to live there.

Naga Sea Witch.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Naga Sea Witch.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Naga Sea Witch.name: Naga Sea Witch
Naga Sea Witch.flavor: If she had studied harder, she would have been a C+ witch.

Tar Creeper.text: Taunt Has +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
Tar Creeper.name: Tar Creeper
Tar Creeper.flavor: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!

Ethereal Arcanist.text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
Ethereal Arcanist.name: Ethereal Arcanist
Ethereal Arcanist.flavor: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

Ancient Watcher.name: Ancient Watcher
Ancient Watcher.flavor: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

Kobold Librarian.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Deal 2 damage to your hero.
Kobold Librarian.name: Kobold Librarian
Kobold Librarian.flavor: Kobolds sort books using a gooey decimal system.

Bolf Ramshield.text: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
Bolf Ramshield.name: Bolf Ramshield
Bolf Ramshield.flavor: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament.  It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.

Iron Hide.name: Iron Hide
Iron Hide.flavor: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

Lakkari Felhound.name: Lakkari Felhound
Lakkari Felhound.flavor: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

Cabalist's Tome.text: Add 3 random Mage spells to your hand.
Cabalist's Tome.name: Cabalist's Tome
Cabalist's Tome.flavor: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!

Shadowform.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage'. If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.
Shadowform.name: Shadowform
Shadowform.flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

Kara Kazham!.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Kara Kazham!.text: Summon a 1/1 Candle, 2/2 Broom, and 3/3 Teapot.
Kara Kazham!.name: Kara Kazham!
Kara Kazham!.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Kara Kazham!.flavor: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.

Demonfire.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it’s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.
Demonfire.name: Demonfire
Demonfire.flavor: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

Power Word: Glory.text:
Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to
your hero.
Power Word: Glory.name: Power Word: Glory
Power Word: Glory.flavor: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

Gorehowl.text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
Gorehowl.name: Gorehowl
Gorehowl.flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

Howlfiend.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a random card.
Howlfiend.name: Howlfiend
Howlfiend.flavor: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

Gang Up.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Gang Up.text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
Gang Up.name: Gang Up
Gang Up.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Gang Up.flavor: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.

Holy Nova.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
Holy Nova.name: Holy Nova
Holy Nova.flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

Leper Gnome.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Leper Gnome.name: Leper Gnome
Leper Gnome.flavor: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

Defias Cleaner.name: Defias Cleaner
Defias Cleaner.flavor: His house cleaning service is quite thorough.  Not a spot to be found... or any of your stuff!

Green Jelly.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/2 Ooze with Taunt.
Green Jelly.name: Green Jelly
Green Jelly.flavor: This card really breaks out of the mold.

Moroes.text: Stealth At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Steward.
Moroes.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Moroes.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Moroes.name: Moroes
Moroes.flavor: Moroes runs an army of stewards, but still ends up inflating the balloons himself.

Blessed Champion.name: Blessed Champion
Blessed Champion.flavor: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

Zealous Initiate.name: Zealous Initiate
Zealous Initiate.flavor: Ok, Initiate. You need to settle down and do your job. In this case, that means die so someone else can get a minor buff.

Holy Light.name: Holy Light
Holy Light.flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

Nightbane Templar.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 1/1 Whelps.
Nightbane Templar.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Nightbane Templar.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Nightbane Templar.name: Nightbane Templar
Nightbane Templar.flavor: Originally joined to be Arcanagos’ Templar, but has to admit that ordering pizza has become waaaay easier.

Unidentified Shield.text:
Gain 5 Armor.
Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
Unidentified Shield.name: Unidentified Shield
Unidentified Shield.flavor: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

Cogmaster.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
Cogmaster.name: Cogmaster
Cogmaster.flavor: After a while, you don't see the cogs and sprockets. All you see is a robot, a spider tank, a deathray...

Blood of The Ancient One.text:
If you control two of these
at the end of your turn, merge them into 'The Ancient One'.
Blood of The Ancient One.name: Blood of The Ancient One
Blood of The Ancient One.flavor: Add two cups of Blood of the Ancient One to one cup of lemon juice. Add just a dash of sugar and stir. Delicious!

Silver Vanguard.name: Silver Vanguard
Silver Vanguard.flavor: Float like a Faerie Dragon, sting like a Hivequeen.

Hungry Ettin.text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion for your opponent.
Hungry Ettin.name: Hungry Ettin
Hungry Ettin.flavor: How can he be hungry… if he's Ettin!?

Gilblin Stalker.name: Gilblin Stalker
Gilblin Stalker.flavor:
"Shhh, I think I hear something."
"Ah, it's probably nothing." - Every Henchman

One-eyed Cheat.text: Whenever you summon a Pirate, gain Stealth.
One-eyed Cheat.name: One-eyed Cheat
One-eyed Cheat.flavor: When pirates say there is no "Eye" in "team," they are very literal about it.

Healing Wave.text: Restore #7 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, Restore #14 instead.
Healing Wave.name: Healing Wave
Healing Wave.flavor: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

Mark of the Lotus.name: Mark of the Lotus
Mark of the Lotus.flavor: The mark of the Lotus is a little flower drawn in permanent marker on the ankle.

Blackwing Technician.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
Blackwing Technician.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackwing Technician.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackwing Technician.name: Blackwing Technician
Blackwing Technician.flavor: This is who you go to when your Blackwing needs a tune up. Don't go to a cut rate Blackwing tune up shop!

Mire Keeper.text: [x]Choose One - Summon a 2/2 Slime; or Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Mire Keeper.name: Mire Keeper
Mire Keeper.flavor:
"Hey.... Is that Mire for sale?" 
"No.  I'm keeping it."

Hooked Reaver.text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3 and Taunt.
Hooked Reaver.name: Hooked Reaver
Hooked Reaver.flavor: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

Rat Pack.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a number of 1/1 Rats equal  to this minion's Attack.
Rat Pack.name: Rat Pack
Rat Pack.flavor: He's gonna do it his way.

Bright-Eyed Scout.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Change its Cost to (5).
Bright-Eyed Scout.name: Bright-Eyed Scout

Geosculptor Yip.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with Cost equal to your Armor (up to 10).
Geosculptor Yip.name: Geosculptor Yip
Geosculptor Yip.flavor: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

Crystalline Oracle.text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck  and add it to your hand.
Crystalline Oracle.name: Crystalline Oracle
Crystalline Oracle.flavor: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

Feugen.text: Deathrattle: If Stalagg also died this game, summon Thaddius.
Feugen.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Feugen.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Feugen.name: Feugen
Feugen.flavor: Feugen is sad because everyone likes Stalagg better.

Arcane Missiles.text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Arcane Missiles.name: Arcane Missiles
Arcane Missiles.flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

Soulfire.name: Soulfire
Soulfire.flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

War Golem.name: War Golem
War Golem.flavor: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

Cutpurse.text: Whenever this minion attacks a hero, add the Coin to your hand.
Cutpurse.name: Cutpurse
Cutpurse.flavor: He has a giant collection of purses now.  One for every outfit!

Eggnapper.name: Eggnapper
Eggnapper.flavor: Often misunderstood, it's just that he likes to use the eggs as pillows.

Kobold Geomancer.name: Kobold Geomancer
Kobold Geomancer.flavor: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

Don Han'Cho.text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +5/+5.
Don Han'Cho.name: Don Han'Cho
Don Han'Cho.flavor: The brilliant mastermind of the Grimy Goons, Han sometimes thinks about ditching the idiot Cho, but that would just tear him apart.

Mech-Bear-Cat.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, add a Spare Part card to your hand.
Mech-Bear-Cat.name: Mech-Bear-Cat
Mech-Bear-Cat.flavor: Crushes buildings with his BEAR hands.

Forgotten Torch.howToEarnGolden: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.
Forgotten Torch.text: Deal $3 damage. Shuffle a 'Roaring Torch' into your deck that deals 6 damage.
Forgotten Torch.name: Forgotten Torch
Forgotten Torch.howToEarn: Unlocked by starting the League of Explorers adventure.
Forgotten Torch.flavor: Why does a forgotten torch turn into a roaring torch with no provocation?  It's one of life's many mysteries.

Mortal Coil.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
Mortal Coil.name: Mortal Coil
Mortal Coil.flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

Kidnapper.text: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
Kidnapper.name: Kidnapper
Kidnapper.flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

Arfus.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Death Knight card to your hand.
Arfus.name: Arfus
Arfus.flavor: There must always be a Lick King.

Kobold Barbarian.text: At the start of your turn, attack a random enemy.
Kobold Barbarian.name: Kobold Barbarian
Kobold Barbarian.flavor: What is best in life? To make candle. To keep candle. To hear lamentations of candle-takers.

Ravenous Pterrordax.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to Adapt twice.
Ravenous Pterrordax.name: Ravenous Pterrordax
Ravenous Pterrordax.flavor: For better results, feed your pterrordax low-fat, high-fiber minions.

Wyrmrest Agent.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
Wyrmrest Agent.name: Wyrmrest Agent
Wyrmrest Agent.flavor: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority #1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!

Starfall.text: Choose One - Deal $5 damage to a minion; or $2 damage to all enemy minions.
Starfall.name: Starfall
Starfall.flavor: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

Hydrologist.name: Hydrologist
Hydrologist.flavor: Murloc hydrologists are pretty rare.  Most murloc undergrads pick computer science.

Tortollan Primalist.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell and cast it with random targets.
Tortollan Primalist.name: Tortollan Primalist
Tortollan Primalist.flavor: I see pizza in my future.

Curious Glimmerroot.text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one started in your opponent's deck to get a copy of it.
Curious Glimmerroot.name: Curious Glimmerroot
Curious Glimmerroot.flavor: George promised to be good. But it's easy for little Glimmerroots to forget.

Neptulon.text: Battlecry: Add 4 random Murlocs to your hand. Overload: (3)
Neptulon.name: Neptulon
Neptulon.flavor: Neptulon is "The Tidehunter". He’s one of the four elemental lords. And he and Ragnaros get together and make really amazing saunas.

Fool's Bane.text: Unlimited attacks each turn. Can't attack heroes.
Fool's Bane.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Fool's Bane.name: Fool's Bane
Fool's Bane.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Fool's Bane.flavor: A fool and his bane are soon parted.

Mimic Pod.text: Draw a card, then add a copy of it to your hand.
Mimic Pod.name: Mimic Pod

Dread Corsair.text: Taunt Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
Dread Corsair.name: Dread Corsair
Dread Corsair.flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

Warsong Commander.name: Warsong Commander
Warsong Commander.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

Echo of Medivh.text: Put a copy of each friendly minion into your hand.
Echo of Medivh.name: Echo of Medivh
Echo of Medivh.flavor: Medivh's echo haunts Karazhan, eternally cheating at chess and Hearthstone.

Mirror Image.name: Mirror Image
Mirror Image.flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

Evolve.text: Transform your minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
Evolve.name: Evolve
Evolve.flavor: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.

Ragnaros the Firelord.text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
Ragnaros the Firelord.name: Ragnaros the Firelord
Ragnaros the Firelord.flavor: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

Abomination.name: Abomination
Abomination.flavor: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

Clutchmother Zavas.text: Whenever you discard this, give it +2/+2 and return it to your hand.
Clutchmother Zavas.name: Clutchmother Zavas
Clutchmother Zavas.flavor: A bit of a snob: still refuses to drive anything with automatic transmission.

Dragon Soul.text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
Dragon Soul.name: Dragon Soul
Dragon Soul.flavor: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

The Marsh Queen.name: The Marsh Queen
The Marsh Queen.flavor: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 15 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

Hired Gun.name: Hired Gun
Hired Gun.flavor: He loves his job and would do it for free!  (But don't tell his boss!)

Violet Wurm.name: Violet Wurm
Violet Wurm.flavor: It's wurms all the way down.

Fel Orc Soulfiend.text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to this minion.
Fel Orc Soulfiend.name: Fel Orc Soulfiend
Fel Orc Soulfiend.flavor: "Doc says the persistent burning sensation in my soul is probably just an ulcer."

Air Elemental.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Air Elemental.name: Air Elemental

Kvaldir Raider.name: Kvaldir Raider
Kvaldir Raider.flavor: Coming soon... to a tuskarr village near you!

The Skeleton Knight.text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
The Skeleton Knight.name: The Skeleton Knight
The Skeleton Knight.flavor: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

Drakkari Defender.name: Drakkari Defender
Drakkari Defender.flavor: Sometimes, the best defense is an offensive troll.

Stubborn Gastropod.name: Stubborn Gastropod
Stubborn Gastropod.flavor: Stubbornly pursuing its dream to become Azeroth's fastest animal!

Hungry Dragon.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for your opponent.
Hungry Dragon.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Hungry Dragon.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Hungry Dragon.name: Hungry Dragon
Hungry Dragon.flavor: Hungry Hungry Dragon is NOT a fun game.

Bomb Squad.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
Bomb Squad.name: Bomb Squad
Bomb Squad.flavor: Please don't explode!  Please don't explode!  Please don't explode!

Lesser Pearl Spellstone.text: Summon a 2/2 Spirit with Taunt. @(Restore 3 Health to upgrade.)
Lesser Pearl Spellstone.name: Lesser Pearl Spellstone
Lesser Pearl Spellstone.flavor:
In ages old, when Ancients broke
Azari of the Legion spoke
To tempt the mortals: gems of power
 The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.
Lesser Pearl Spellstone.collectionText: Summon a 2/2 Spirit with Taunt. (Restore 3 Health to upgrade.)

Wicked Witchdoctor.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random basic Totem.
Wicked Witchdoctor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Wicked Witchdoctor.name: Wicked Witchdoctor
Wicked Witchdoctor.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Wicked Witchdoctor.flavor: You can easily defeat her by either dealing 4 damage, or dropping a house on her.

Coghammer.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield and Taunt.
Coghammer.name: Coghammer
Coghammer.flavor: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.

Flame Leviathan.text: When you draw this, deal 2 damage to all characters.
Flame Leviathan.name: Flame Leviathan
Flame Leviathan.flavor: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.

Spiteful Summoner.text: [x]Battlecry: Reveal a spell from your deck. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
Spiteful Summoner.name: Spiteful Summoner
Spiteful Summoner.flavor: Sometimes she'll summon a Doomsayer. Out of spite.

Deadly Shot.name: Deadly Shot
Deadly Shot.flavor: Accuracy is not a highly valued trait among the mok'nathal.  Deadliness is near the top, though.

Volcanic Drake.text: Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Volcanic Drake.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Volcanic Drake.name: Volcanic Drake
Volcanic Drake.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Volcanic Drake.flavor: Volcanic Drakes breathe lava instead of fire. The antacid vendor at Thorium Point does a brisk business with them.

Gladiator's Longbow.name: Gladiator's Longbow
Gladiator's Longbow.flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

Light's Champion.name: Light's Champion
Light's Champion.flavor: When there's something strange (say, a gibbering demon) in your neighborhood, who are you going to call?

Rhonin.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 copies of Arcane Missiles to your hand.
Rhonin.name: Rhonin

Ironwood Golem.text: Taunt Can only attack if you have 3 or more Armor.
Ironwood Golem.name: Ironwood Golem

Stoneskin Gargoyle.text: At the start of your turn, restore this minion to full Health.
Stoneskin Gargoyle.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Stoneskin Gargoyle.name: Stoneskin Gargoyle
Stoneskin Gargoyle.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Hunter's Mark.name: Hunter's Mark
Hunter's Mark.flavor: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

Snowflipper Penguin.name: Snowflipper Penguin
Snowflipper Penguin.flavor: On land, a group of penguins is called a "waddle."

Far Sight.text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
Far Sight.name: Far Sight
Far Sight.flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

Cruel Taskmaster.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
Cruel Taskmaster.name: Cruel Taskmaster
Cruel Taskmaster.flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

Multi-Shot.text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.
Multi-Shot.name: Multi-Shot

Drain Life.text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
Drain Life.name: Drain Life
Drain Life.flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

Violet Teacher.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
Violet Teacher.name: Violet Teacher
Violet Teacher.flavor: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

Vitality Totem.text: At the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.
Vitality Totem.name: Vitality Totem
Vitality Totem.flavor: You can usually find these at the totemist's market on Saturdays.

Wisp.name: Wisp
Wisp.flavor: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode.   But why?

Defias Ringleader.name: Defias Ringleader
Defias Ringleader.flavor: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

Rumbling Elemental.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Rumbling Elemental.text: After you play a Battlecry minion, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Rumbling Elemental.name: Rumbling Elemental
Rumbling Elemental.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Grimscale Oracle.name: Grimscale Oracle
Grimscale Oracle.flavor: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

Wickerflame Burnbristle.name: Wickerflame Burnbristle
Wickerflame Burnbristle.flavor: Wickerflame spent years as a recruit for the Goons, never making the big-time because he always fired his chest-cannon too slowly.  "Hey," he thought, "maybe if I keep my beard lit on fire, I can do this faster."  BOOM, promoted.

Drakonid Crusher.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3.
Drakonid Crusher.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Drakonid Crusher.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Drakonid Crusher.name: Drakonid Crusher
Drakonid Crusher.flavor: Drakonids were created to have all the bad parts of a dragon in the form of a humanoid. But, like, why?

Blubber Baron.text: Whenever you summon a Battlecry minion while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.
Blubber Baron.name: Blubber Baron
Blubber Baron.flavor: When oil, railroad, steel, robber, and red are all already taken, your options are limited.

Effigy.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.
Effigy.name: Effigy

Kalimos, Primal Lord.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, cast an Elemental Invocation.
Kalimos, Primal Lord.name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
Kalimos, Primal Lord.flavor: All that's missing is a little heart.

Toothy Chest.text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 4.
Toothy Chest.name: Toothy Chest
Toothy Chest.flavor: Do you want to eat an adventurer?  I want to eat an adventurer!

Light's Sorrow.text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +1 Attack.
Light's Sorrow.name: Light's Sorrow

Grimestreet Protector.name: Grimestreet Protector
Grimestreet Protector.flavor: Some new asphalt should do the trick.

Deathwing.text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
Deathwing.name: Deathwing
Deathwing.flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

Anubisath Sentinel.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Anubisath Sentinel.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Anubisath Sentinel.name: Anubisath Sentinel
Anubisath Sentinel.flavor: He's actually a 1/1 who picked up the hammer from the last guy.

Murloc Tinyfin.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Murloc Tinyfin.name: Murloc Tinyfin
Murloc Tinyfin.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Murloc Tinyfin.flavor: High mortality rate, from often being hugged to death.

Bearshark.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Bearshark.name: Bearshark

Emperor Thaurissan.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
Emperor Thaurissan.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Emperor Thaurissan.name: Emperor Thaurissan
Emperor Thaurissan.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Emperor Thaurissan.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

Psionic Probe.text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
Psionic Probe.name: Psionic Probe

Murloc Warleader.name: Murloc Warleader
Murloc Warleader.flavor: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

Lock and Load.text: Each time you cast a spell this turn, add a random Hunter card to your hand.
Lock and Load.name: Lock and Load
Lock and Load.flavor:
Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time.  Lock and load."
This card pays homage to that special moment.

Fire Plume Harbinger.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand by (1).
Fire Plume Harbinger.name: Fire Plume Harbinger
Fire Plume Harbinger.flavor: Good for summoning elementals. Great for making s'mores.

Lava Burst.name: Lava Burst
Lava Burst.flavor: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

Drywhisker Armorer.text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, gain 2 Armor.
Drywhisker Armorer.name: Drywhisker Armorer
Drywhisker Armorer.flavor: Kobolds use anything for armor: Pots, pans, garbage cans… even other kobolds.

Swamp King Dred.text: After your opponent plays a minion, attack it.
Swamp King Dred.name: Swamp King Dred
Swamp King Dred.flavor: Swamp King Dred, more like Swamp King Dead, amiright?

Tuskarr Totemic.name: Tuskarr Totemic
Tuskarr Totemic.flavor: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

Timber Wolf.name: Timber Wolf
Timber Wolf.flavor: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

Frost Giant.text: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
Frost Giant.name: Frost Giant
Frost Giant.flavor: Don't ask him about the beard.  JUST DON'T.

Grommash Hellscream.name: Grommash Hellscream
Grommash Hellscream.flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

Twin Emperor Vek'lor.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, summon another Emperor.
Twin Emperor Vek'lor.name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
Twin Emperor Vek'lor.flavor: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

Nerub'ar Weblord.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Nerub'ar Weblord.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Nerub'ar Weblord.name: Nerub'ar Weblord
Nerub'ar Weblord.flavor: Weblords spend all day making giant trampoline parks.

Cryomancer.name: Cryomancer
Cryomancer.flavor: She loves Frozen. I mean who doesn't?

Eerie Statue.text: Can’t attack unless it’s the only minion in the battlefield.
Eerie Statue.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Eerie Statue.name: Eerie Statue
Eerie Statue.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Eerie Statue.flavor: Don't blink!  Don't turn your back, don't look away, and DON'T BLINK.

Burgly Bully.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, add a Coin to your hand.
Burgly Bully.name: Burgly Bully
Burgly Bully.flavor: He only burgles to pay the bills.  He is really just a bully at heart.

Aya Blackpaw.name: Aya Blackpaw
Aya Blackpaw.flavor: Though young, Aya took over as the leader of Jade Lotus through her charisma and strategic acumen when her predecessor was accidentally crushed by a jade golem.

Cryostasis.name: Cryostasis
Cryostasis.flavor: We'll thaw you out when we find a cure!

Old Murk-Eye.howToEarnGolden: Unlocked when you have all the Golden Murlocs from the Expert and Basic Sets.
Old Murk-Eye.text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
Old Murk-Eye.howToEarn: Unlocked when you have all the Murlocs from the Classic Set.
Old Murk-Eye.name: Old Murk-Eye
Old Murk-Eye.flavor: He's a legend among murlocs.  "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.

Knife Juggler.text:
[x]After you summon a
minion, deal 1 damage
to a random enemy.
Knife Juggler.name: Knife Juggler
