Knife Juggler.flavor: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers.    They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

Mana Addict.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack this turn.
Mana Addict.name: Mana Addict
Mana Addict.flavor: She’s trying to kick the habit, but still takes some mana whenever she has a stressful day.

Jade Shuriken.name: Jade Shuriken
Jade Shuriken.flavor: Good news is, after you remove it from your wound, you can use it to pay your medical bills!

Forbidden Flame.text: Spend all your Mana. Deal that much damage to a minion.
Forbidden Flame.name: Forbidden Flame
Forbidden Flame.flavor: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.

Fist of Jaraxxus.text: When you play or discard this, deal $4 damage to a random enemy.
Fist of Jaraxxus.name: Fist of Jaraxxus

Malorne.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this minion into your deck.
Malorne.name: Malorne
Malorne.flavor: When Malorne isn't mauling hordes of demons, he enjoys attending parties, though he prefers to go stag.

Light of the Naaru.text: Restore #3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.
Light of the Naaru.name: Light of the Naaru
Light of the Naaru.flavor: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

Frost Lich Jaina.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.
Frost Lich Jaina.name: Frost Lich Jaina
Frost Lich Jaina.flavor: "Arthas was a spoiled child, playing with toys he could neither control nor understand. Come into the cold. I will show you the true power of the Frozen Throne."

Mad Bomber.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
Mad Bomber.name: Mad Bomber
Mad Bomber.flavor: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

Twilight Geomancer.name: Twilight Geomancer
Twilight Geomancer.flavor: "Ok C'Thun, repeat after me: 'Your mother was a hamster.'"

Sen'jin Shieldmasta.name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
Sen'jin Shieldmasta.flavor: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

Solemn Vigil.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Solemn Vigil.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Solemn Vigil.name: Solemn Vigil
Solemn Vigil.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Solemn Vigil.flavor: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.

Disciple of C'Thun.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
Disciple of C'Thun.name: Disciple of C'Thun
Disciple of C'Thun.flavor: C’Thun’s recruiting pitch involves cookies, which is why it’s the most popular Old God.

Wisps of the Old Gods.text: Choose One - Summon seven 1/1 Wisps; or Give your minions +2/+2.
Wisps of the Old Gods.name: Wisps of the Old Gods
Wisps of the Old Gods.flavor: They're just normal wisps, actually. The "Of the Old Gods" bit is just marketing.

Mimiron's Head.text: At the start of your turn, if you have at least 3 Mechs, destroy them all and form V-07-TR-0N.
Mimiron's Head.name: Mimiron's Head
Mimiron's Head.flavor: Do not push the big red button!

Cho'gall.text: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
Cho'gall.name: Cho'gall
Cho'gall.flavor: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.

Explosive Runes.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
Explosive Runes.name: Explosive Runes
Explosive Runes.flavor: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

Corpse Widow.name: Corpse Widow
Corpse Widow.flavor: Her marriage survived death, but it decayed pretty quickly after that.

Sherazin, Corpse Flower.text: Deathrattle: Go dormant. Play 4 cards in a turn to revive this minion.
Sherazin, Corpse Flower.name: Sherazin, Corpse Flower

Faerie Dragon.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Faerie Dragon.name: Faerie Dragon
Faerie Dragon.flavor: Adorable.  Immune to Magic.  Doesn't pee on the rug.  The perfect pet!

Skycap'n Kragg.text: Charrrrrge Costs (1) less for each friendly Pirate.
Skycap'n Kragg.name: Skycap'n Kragg
Skycap'n Kragg.flavor: What's more boss than riding a parrot with a jawbone for a shoulderpad while wielding a giant hook-lance-thing and wearing a pirate hat?  NOTHING.

Coldlight Seer.name: Coldlight Seer
Coldlight Seer.flavor: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths.  So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

Core Hound.name: Core Hound
Core Hound.flavor: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

Twilight Guardian.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
Twilight Guardian.name: Twilight Guardian
Twilight Guardian.flavor: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.

Giant Anaconda.text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your hand with 5 or more Attack.
Giant Anaconda.name: Giant Anaconda

Voidlord.name: Voidlord
Voidlord.flavor: Never let it hold your checkbook.

Ice Fishing.name: Ice Fishing
Ice Fishing.flavor: Glow fish, war fish... blow fish, more fish...

Duskboar.name: Duskboar
Duskboar.flavor: Often excluded from dinner parties.  To be fair, he is very boaring.

Shadowboxer.text: Whenever a character is healed, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Shadowboxer.name: Shadowboxer
Shadowboxer.flavor: Punching is its primary function. Also, its secondary function.

Tomb Pillager.text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
Tomb Pillager.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Tomb Pillager.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Tomb Pillager.name: Tomb Pillager
Tomb Pillager.flavor: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.

Stampeding Kodo.text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
Stampeding Kodo.name: Stampeding Kodo
Stampeding Kodo.flavor: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

Flamestrike.text: Deal $4 damage to all enemy minions.
Flamestrike.name: Flamestrike
Flamestrike.flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

Drakonid Operative.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a card in  your opponent's deck.
Drakonid Operative.name: Drakonid Operative
Drakonid Operative.flavor: His job is to spy on the Goons and the Jade Lotus, but he's OBVIOUSLY a dragon so it's pretty hard work.

Brave Archer.text: Inspire: If your hand is empty, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Brave Archer.name: Brave Archer

Sleepy Dragon.name: Sleepy Dragon
Sleepy Dragon.flavor: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

Mogor the Ogre.text: All minions have a 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Mogor the Ogre.name: Mogor the Ogre
Mogor the Ogre.flavor: Mogor helped reopen the Dark Portal once. You know you're in trouble when you have to rely on an ogre.

Giant Wasp.name: Giant Wasp
Giant Wasp.flavor: Float like a butterfly, sting like a giant wasp!

Aldor Peacekeeper.text: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.
Aldor Peacekeeper.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
Aldor Peacekeeper.flavor: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

Inkmaster Solia.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, the next spell you cast this turn costs (0).
Inkmaster Solia.name: Inkmaster Solia
Inkmaster Solia.flavor: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

Draenei Totemcarver.name: Draenei Totemcarver
Draenei Totemcarver.flavor: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

Shadowstep.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
Shadowstep.name: Shadowstep
Shadowstep.flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.

Inner Rage.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
Inner Rage.name: Inner Rage
Inner Rage.flavor: They're only smiling on the outside.

Knight of the Wild.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, reduce the Cost of this card by (1).
Knight of the Wild.name: Knight of the Wild
Knight of the Wild.flavor: He gets a discount on the tournament entry fee because he is his own horse.

Big Game Hunter.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
Big Game Hunter.name: Big Game Hunter
Big Game Hunter.targetingArrowText: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 7 or more.
Big Game Hunter.flavor: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

Backroom Bouncer.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
Backroom Bouncer.name: Backroom Bouncer
Backroom Bouncer.flavor: "WHY ARE YOU IN THE BACK ROOM?  WHO IS WATCHING THE FRONT?!"

Steamwheedle Sniper.text: Your Hero Power can target minions.
Steamwheedle Sniper.name: Steamwheedle Sniper
Steamwheedle Sniper.flavor: Goblins seldom have the patience for sniping. Most prefer lobbing explosives.

Starving Buzzard.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.
Starving Buzzard.name: Starving Buzzard
Starving Buzzard.flavor: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

Tomb Lurker.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random Deathrattle minion that died this game to your hand.
Tomb Lurker.name: Tomb Lurker
Tomb Lurker.flavor: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

Perdition's Blade.name: Perdition's Blade
Perdition's Blade.flavor: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

Gelbin Mekkatorque.howToEarnGolden: This was rewarded to players who helped test the Store during the Beta.
Gelbin Mekkatorque.name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
Gelbin Mekkatorque.flavor: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor.  He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.

Grook Fu Master.name: Grook Fu Master
Grook Fu Master.flavor: Grook Fu, the ancient Hozen art of bashing heads with a stick.

Razorfen Hunter.name: Razorfen Hunter
Razorfen Hunter.flavor: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

Hemet, Jungle Hunter.text: Battlecry: Destroy all cards in your deck that cost (3) or less.
Hemet, Jungle Hunter.name: Hemet, Jungle Hunter
Hemet, Jungle Hunter.flavor: The goblin travel agency lost his luggage, but he's still having a great vacation!

Deadly Fork.text: Deathrattle: Add a 3/2 weapon to your hand.
Deadly Fork.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Deadly Fork.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Deadly Fork.name: Deadly Fork
Deadly Fork.flavor: For a proper setting, place the deadly fork after the salad fork, but before the dinner fork.

Furbolg Mossbinder.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a 6/6 Elemental.
Furbolg Mossbinder.name: Furbolg Mossbinder
Furbolg Mossbinder.flavor: Behold, the unstoppable power of MOSS!

Beneath the Grounds.text: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your opponent's deck. When drawn, you summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
Beneath the Grounds.name: Beneath the Grounds
Beneath the Grounds.flavor: Can you hold these eggs for just a second?  I promise they're not full of giant enraged undead spider things.

Shellshifter.name: Shellshifter
Shellshifter.flavor: Master of the Three Shell Monte.

Sunkeeper Tarim.text: Taunt Battlecry: Set all other minions' Attack and Health to 3.
Sunkeeper Tarim.name: Sunkeeper Tarim

Twilight Acolyte.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
Twilight Acolyte.name: Twilight Acolyte
Twilight Acolyte.flavor: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

Explore Un'Goro.text: Replace your deck with copies of "Discover a card."
Explore Un'Goro.name: Explore Un'Goro
Explore Un'Goro.flavor: It turns out cards DO grow on trees!

Undercity Valiant.name: Undercity Valiant
Undercity Valiant.flavor: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

Malchezaar's Imp.text: Whenever you discard a card, draw a card.
Malchezaar's Imp.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Malchezaar's Imp.name: Malchezaar's Imp
Malchezaar's Imp.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Malchezaar's Imp.flavor: Malchezaar used to have an imp named Dobby working for him, but there was a tragic accident.

Grimestreet Informant.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Hunter, Paladin, or Warrior card.
Grimestreet Informant.name: Grimestreet Informant
Grimestreet Informant.flavor: "Naw, naw.  You're talkin' about Grime BOULEVARD.  I ain't know nuthin' 'bout that."

Gurubashi Berserker.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.
Gurubashi Berserker.name: Gurubashi Berserker

Jade Blossom.text: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Jade Blossom.name: Jade Blossom
Jade Blossom.flavor: Meditating under a jade blossom is said to grant you wisdom, unless you have a pollen allergy.
Jade Blossom.collectionText: Summon a Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.

Bloodhoof Brave.name: Bloodhoof Brave
Bloodhoof Brave.flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it.  He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

Sea Giant.text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
Sea Giant.name: Sea Giant

Wrath.text: Choose One - Deal $3 damage to a minion; or $1 damage and draw a card.
Wrath.name: Wrath
Wrath.flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

Primordial Drake.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
Primordial Drake.name: Primordial Drake
Primordial Drake.flavor: Before he became a rap artist.

Big-Time Racketeer.name: Big-Time Racketeer
Big-Time Racketeer.flavor: "It'd be a shame if someone disenchanted those Legendaries."

Arcane Artificer.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its Cost.
Arcane Artificer.name: Arcane Artificer
Arcane Artificer.flavor: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

Jungle Giants.text: [x]Quest: Summon 5 minions with 5 or more Attack. Reward: Barnabus.
Jungle Giants.name: Jungle Giants
Jungle Giants.flavor: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

Archbishop Benedictus.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of your opponent's deck into your deck.
Archbishop Benedictus.name: Archbishop Benedictus

Silver Hand Regent.name: Silver Hand Regent
Silver Hand Regent.flavor: The Silver Hand is the best paladin organization.  The Argent Crusaders are super jealous.

Alleycat.name: Alleycat
Alleycat.flavor: To be a cool cat in Gadgetzan, you gotta have bling.

Ravenholdt Assassin.name: Ravenholdt Assassin
Ravenholdt Assassin.flavor: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

Rend Blackhand.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Rend Blackhand.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a Legendary minion.
Rend Blackhand.name: Rend Blackhand
Rend Blackhand.flavor: Rend believes he is the True Warchief of the Horde and he keeps editing the wikipedia page for "Warchief of the Horde" to include his picture.
Rend Blackhand.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Thrallmar Farseer.name: Thrallmar Farseer
Thrallmar Farseer.flavor: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

Tentacles for Arms.name: Tentacles for Arms
Tentacles for Arms.flavor: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.

Misdirection.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, instead it attacks another random character.
Misdirection.name: Misdirection
Misdirection.flavor: Sometimes it's as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.

King's Elekk.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
King's Elekk.name: King's Elekk

Toxic Arrow.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, give it Poisonous.
Toxic Arrow.name: Toxic Arrow
Toxic Arrow.flavor: What doesn't kill you makes you toxic.

Reckless Rocketeer.name: Reckless Rocketeer
Reckless Rocketeer.flavor: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

Cleave.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to
two random enemy
minions.
Cleave.name: Cleave
Cleave.flavor: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

Lorewalker Cho.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other player’s hand.
Lorewalker Cho.name: Lorewalker Cho
Lorewalker Cho.flavor: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

Micro Machine.text: At the start of each turn, gain +1 Attack.
Micro Machine.name: Micro Machine
Micro Machine.flavor: This card is the real thing.

Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale.name: Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale
Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale.flavor: Pro tip: DO NOT BOGART THE BANANAS.

Hand of Protection.name: Hand of Protection
Hand of Protection.flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

Shattered Sun Cleric.name: Shattered Sun Cleric
Shattered Sun Cleric.flavor: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

Guild Recruiter.text: Battlecry: Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
Guild Recruiter.name: Guild Recruiter

Crystal Lion.text: [x]Divine Shield Costs (1) less for each Silver Hand Recruit you control.
Crystal Lion.name: Crystal Lion
Crystal Lion.flavor: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

Malygos.name: Malygos
Malygos.flavor: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

Reincarnate.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Reincarnate.text: Destroy a minion, then return it to life with full Health.
Reincarnate.name: Reincarnate
Reincarnate.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Reincarnate.flavor: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.

Skull of the Man'ari.text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
Skull of the Man'ari.name: Skull of the Man'ari

Shielded Minibot.name: Shielded Minibot
Shielded Minibot.flavor: He chooses to believe what he is programmed to believe!

Dragon Consort.text: Battlecry: The next Dragon you play costs (2) less.
Dragon Consort.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dragon Consort.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Dragon Consort.name: Dragon Consort
Dragon Consort.flavor: Everybody wants someone to snuggle with. Even giant armored scaly draconic beasts of destruction.

Blood Warriors.text: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.
Blood Warriors.name: Blood Warriors
Blood Warriors.flavor: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.

Naga Corsair.name: Naga Corsair
Naga Corsair.flavor: Hook-tails are nice and all but she keeps getting stuck on things.

Acherus Veteran.name: Acherus Veteran
Acherus Veteran.flavor: This is my Runeblade. There are many like it but this one is mine.

Clockwork Gnome.text: Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
Clockwork Gnome.name: Clockwork Gnome
Clockwork Gnome.flavor: Clockwork gnomes are always asking what time it is.

The Lich King.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, add a random Death Knight card to your hand.
The Lich King.name: The Lich King
The Lich King.flavor: "All that I am: anger, cruelty, vengeance, 8 attack - I bestow upon you, my chosen knight."

Heroic Strike.text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn.
Heroic Strike.name: Heroic Strike
Heroic Strike.flavor: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

Sorcerer's Apprentice.name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
Sorcerer's Apprentice.flavor: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

Golakka Crawler.name: Golakka Crawler
Golakka Crawler.flavor: Universally adored by both control decks and ninjas.

Confessor Paletress.name: Confessor Paletress
Confessor Paletress.flavor: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

Violet Illusionist.text: During your turn, your hero is Immune.
Violet Illusionist.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Violet Illusionist.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Violet Illusionist.name: Violet Illusionist
Violet Illusionist.flavor: She’s much more cheerful after losing the ‘n’ in her name.

Crazed Alchemist.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
Crazed Alchemist.name: Crazed Alchemist
Crazed Alchemist.targetingArrowText: Swap Attack and Health of a minion.
Crazed Alchemist.flavor: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

Lesser Emerald Spellstone.text: Summon two 3/3 Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
Lesser Emerald Spellstone.name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
Lesser Emerald Spellstone.flavor:
An emerald stone for Tauren hands
Who sought its strength to save their lands
Their tribes now lost, their rage released
Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

Netherspite Historian.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a Dragon.
Netherspite Historian.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Netherspite Historian.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Netherspite Historian.name: Netherspite Historian
Netherspite Historian.flavor: She can tell you all about the history of people not STANDING IN THE GREEN BEAM!

Smuggler's Run.text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
Smuggler's Run.name: Smuggler's Run
Smuggler's Run.flavor: One of the most famous busts in Gadgetzan’s history happened on Smuggler’s Run, where Sergeant Sally apprehended a cadre of Grimy Goons transporting a massive number of illegal fish heads.

Fallen Sun Cleric.name: Fallen Sun Cleric
Fallen Sun Cleric.flavor: It's hard to keep a Shattered Sun Cleric down.

Gahz'rilla.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, double its Attack.
Gahz'rilla.name: Gahz'rilla
Gahz'rilla.flavor: The Sen'jin High football team is The Gahz'rillas.

Terrorscale Stalker.name: Terrorscale Stalker
Terrorscale Stalker.flavor: Likes to scare his friends half to death.

Snowchugger.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
Snowchugger.name: Snowchugger
Snowchugger.flavor: Do the slow chant when he waddles by: "Chug! Chug! Chug!"

Bladed Gauntlet.text: Has Attack equal to your Armor. Can't attack heroes.
Bladed Gauntlet.name: Bladed Gauntlet

Renounce Darkness.text: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.
Renounce Darkness.name: Renounce Darkness

Murloc Knight.name: Murloc Knight
Murloc Knight.flavor: Hee hee!  Look at his cute little feet.

Awaken the Makers.text: Quest: Summon 7 Deathrattle minions. Reward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
Awaken the Makers.name: Awaken the Makers
Awaken the Makers.flavor: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

Streetwise Investigator.name: Streetwise Investigator
Streetwise Investigator.flavor: "Hmmmm…  Call it a hunch, but I'm starting to think that there may be some kind of criminal activity going on in Gadgetzan."

Blessing of Might.name: Blessing of Might
Blessing of Might.flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

Shadowbomber.name: Shadowbomber
Shadowbomber.flavor: Shadowbomber does her job, but she's kind of phoning it in at this point.

Mal'Ganis.text: Your other Demons have +2/+2. Your hero is Immune.
Mal'Ganis.name: Mal'Ganis
Mal'Ganis.flavor: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

Wicked Skeleton.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each minion that died this turn.
Wicked Skeleton.name: Wicked Skeleton
Wicked Skeleton.flavor: It's minions like these that give normal, law-abiding skeletons a bad rap.

Savage Roar.text: Give your characters +2 Attack this turn.
Savage Roar.name: Savage Roar
Savage Roar.flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

Murloc Raider.name: Murloc Raider
Murloc Raider.flavor: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

Prince Valanar.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, gain Lifesteal and Taunt.
Prince Valanar.name: Prince Valanar
Prince Valanar.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one devours one after another.

Psych-o-Tron.name: Psych-o-Tron
Psych-o-Tron.flavor: "Annoyinger-o-Tron" was just too unwieldy. And accurate.

Sacrificial Pact.text: Destroy a Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
Sacrificial Pact.name: Sacrificial Pact
Sacrificial Pact.flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

Angry Chicken.name: Angry Chicken
Angry Chicken.flavor: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

Biteweed.text: Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other card you've played this turn.
Biteweed.name: Biteweed

Elven Archer.name: Elven Archer
Elven Archer.flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

Ancient of Blossoms.name: Ancient of Blossoms
Ancient of Blossoms.flavor: His new shampoo is really working!

Lunar Visions.text: Draw 2 cards. Minions drawn cost (2) less.
Lunar Visions.name: Lunar Visions
Lunar Visions.flavor: The true mystery of lunar visions is how there is nothing to watch when there are so many channels.

Ysera.text: At the end of your turn, add a Dream Card to your hand.
Ysera.name: Ysera
Ysera.flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

Grimy Gadgeteer.text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
Grimy Gadgeteer.name: Grimy Gadgeteer
Grimy Gadgeteer.flavor: "You look like a Gadgetgun 3000-Mark IV man, am I right?"

Abyssal Enforcer.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other characters.
Abyssal Enforcer.name: Abyssal Enforcer
Abyssal Enforcer.flavor: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

Blackguard.text: Whenever your hero is healed, deal that much damage to a random enemy minion.
Blackguard.name: Blackguard
Blackguard.flavor: "Did I ever tell you the story of when I single-handedly took down a 29/29 C'thun?" - Reno Jackson

Sacred Trial.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Sacred Trial.text: Secret: After your opponent has at least 3 minions and plays another, destroy it.
Sacred Trial.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Sacred Trial.name: Sacred Trial

Lightwell.text: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
Lightwell.name: Lightwell
Lightwell.flavor: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

Lil' Exorcist.name: Lil' Exorcist
Lil' Exorcist.flavor: Warlocks have the town exorcist on speed dial in case they unleash the wrong demon.

Sindragosa.name: Sindragosa
Sindragosa.flavor: "I recognize your effort but I think your magic still has room for improvement." - Sindragosa after taking a class on giving constructive feedback.

Nourish.text: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
Nourish.name: Nourish
Nourish.flavor: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

Trogg Beastrager.text: Battlecry: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
Trogg Beastrager.name: Trogg Beastrager
Trogg Beastrager.flavor: Still angry that the Gadgetzan Rager Club wouldn't accept him as a member.

I Know a Guy.name: I Know a Guy
I Know a Guy.flavor: Well… a guy who knows a guy.

Volatile Elemental.text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
Volatile Elemental.name: Volatile Elemental
Volatile Elemental.flavor: Currently in an anger management class with Raging Worgen, Grommash Hellscream, and The Angry Chicken. It isn't helping.

Shimmering Tempest.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
Shimmering Tempest.name: Shimmering Tempest
Shimmering Tempest.flavor: HATES being summoned for Kirin Tor party lighting.

Mounted Raptor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Mounted Raptor.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Mounted Raptor.name: Mounted Raptor

Trade Prince Gallywix.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain a copy of it and give them a Coin.
Trade Prince Gallywix.name: Trade Prince Gallywix
Trade Prince Gallywix.flavor: Gallywix believes in supply and demand. He supplies the beatings and demands you pay up!

Priestess of Elune.name: Priestess of Elune
Priestess of Elune.flavor: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

Mountain Giant.text: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
Mountain Giant.name: Mountain Giant
Mountain Giant.flavor: His mother said that he was just big boned.

Master Oakheart.name: Master Oakheart
Master Oakheart.flavor: His adventuring party consists of Goldshire Footman, Frostwolf Grunt and Hadronox.

Toshley.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
Toshley.name: Toshley

Friendly Bartender.text: At the end of your turn, restore 1 Health to your hero.
Friendly Bartender.name: Friendly Bartender
Friendly Bartender.flavor: "What'll it be?  A Jade Brew?  A Grimy Goose?  A Kabal Manatini?"

Unite the Murlocs.name: Unite the Murlocs
Unite the Murlocs.flavor: Form feet and legs!  Form arms and body!  Oh.  Sorry.  I was thinking about Mechafin.

Mana Tide Totem.text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Mana Tide Totem.name: Mana Tide Totem
Mana Tide Totem.flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

Majordomo Executus.text: Deathrattle: Replace your hero with Ragnaros, the Firelord.
Majordomo Executus.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Majordomo Executus.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Majordomo Executus.name: Majordomo Executus
Majordomo Executus.flavor: You thought Executus turned you into Ragnaros, but really Ragnaros was in you the whole time.

Duskbreaker.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
Duskbreaker.name: Duskbreaker
Duskbreaker.flavor: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

Seadevil Stinger.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Murloc you play this turn costs  Health instead of Mana.
Seadevil Stinger.name: Seadevil Stinger
Seadevil Stinger.flavor: Pretty harmless unless you're a Seadevil.

Young Dragonhawk.name: Young Dragonhawk
Young Dragonhawk.flavor: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

Meanstreet Marshal.text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 2 or more Attack, draw a card.
Meanstreet Marshal.name: Meanstreet Marshal
Meanstreet Marshal.flavor: Remember, submit your bribes directly to the Marshal - it's the law!

Doomhammer.name: Doomhammer
Doomhammer.flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

Fire Plume's Heart.name: Fire Plume's Heart
Fire Plume's Heart.flavor: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

Gravelsnout Knight.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for your opponent.
Gravelsnout Knight.name: Gravelsnout Knight
Gravelsnout Knight.flavor: The mole of La Mancha rides again!

Lost in the Jungle.name: Lost in the Jungle
Lost in the Jungle.flavor: George and Karl were never heard from again.

Kirin Tor Mage.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
Kirin Tor Mage.name: Kirin Tor Mage
Kirin Tor Mage.flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

Avian Watcher.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1 and Taunt.
Avian Watcher.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Avian Watcher.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Avian Watcher.name: Avian Watcher
Avian Watcher.flavor: He mostly watches light romantic comedies.

Preparation.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less.
Preparation.name: Preparation

Totem Golem.name: Totem Golem
Totem Golem.flavor: What happens when you glue a buncha totems together.

Zoobot.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +1/+1.
Zoobot.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Zoobot.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Zoobot.name: Zoobot
Zoobot.flavor: The Murloc is taking the picture.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

Tainted Zealot.name: Tainted Zealot
Tainted Zealot.flavor: The love she shares seems to go nowhere. Now she's lost her Light, tosses and turns, she can't sleep at night...

Jungle Moonkin.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Jungle Moonkin.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
Jungle Moonkin.name: Jungle Moonkin

Tinker's Sharpsword Oil.text: Give your weapon +3 Attack. Combo: Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack.
Tinker's Sharpsword Oil.name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
Tinker's Sharpsword Oil.flavor: "Get ready to strike oil!" - Super-cheesy battle cry

Bolster.name: Bolster
Bolster.flavor: The best offense is a good defense.

Abominable Bowman.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random friendly Beast that died this game.
Abominable Bowman.name: Abominable Bowman
Abominable Bowman.flavor: Frosty the Bowman... was an angry hateful soul... with a fresh hewn bow and a missing nose...

Malfurion the Pestilent.text: [x]Choose One - Summon 2 Poisonous Spiders; or 2 Scarabs with Taunt.
Malfurion the Pestilent.name: Malfurion the Pestilent
Malfurion the Pestilent.flavor: "Cenarius once taught me about the precarious balance between life and death. I have come to understand: there IS no balance. Death always wins."

Dinomancy.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Give a Beast +2/+2.'
Dinomancy.name: Dinomancy
Dinomancy.flavor: Anyone can dinomance. Just put your lips together and RAAWWWAARGGGH.

Guardian of Kings.name: Guardian of Kings
Guardian of Kings.flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

Tidal Surge.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Restore #4 Health to your hero.
Tidal Surge.name: Tidal Surge
Tidal Surge.flavor: Also good for removing pesky stains.

Muster for Battle.text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
Muster for Battle.name: Muster for Battle
Muster for Battle.flavor: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

Upgrade!.text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
Upgrade!.name: Upgrade!

Feeding Time.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon three 1/1 Pterrordaxes.
Feeding Time.name: Feeding Time
Feeding Time.flavor: True, they're only 1/1s, but they eat as much as most 4/4s!

Kobold Apprentice.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Kobold Apprentice.name: Kobold Apprentice
Kobold Apprentice.flavor: Horrible secret: The Darkness is immune to Arcane Missiles.

Rummaging Kobold.text: Battlecry: Return one of your destroyed weapons to your hand.
Rummaging Kobold.name: Rummaging Kobold
Rummaging Kobold.flavor: "Broken longsword is brand new shortsword." - Kobold Proverb

Twilight Summoner.name: Twilight Summoner
Twilight Summoner.flavor: If you strike him down, he shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.

Shadow Madness.text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
Shadow Madness.name: Shadow Madness
Shadow Madness.flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

Coldarra Drake.text: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
Coldarra Drake.name: Coldarra Drake
Coldarra Drake.flavor: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

Houndmaster.name: Houndmaster
Houndmaster.flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

Usher of Souls.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Usher of Souls.name: Usher of Souls
Usher of Souls.flavor: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

Earthen Ring Farseer.name: Earthen Ring Farseer
Earthen Ring Farseer.flavor: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

Gnomish Experimenter.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. If it's a minion, transform it into a Chicken.
Gnomish Experimenter.name: Gnomish Experimenter
Gnomish Experimenter.flavor: He's legitimately surprised every time he turns himself into a chicken.

Xaril, Poisoned Mind.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Toxin card to your hand.
Xaril, Poisoned Mind.name: Xaril, Poisoned Mind
Xaril, Poisoned Mind.flavor: It's basically your own fault if you go around drinking weird green potions handed out by creepy mantid dudes.

Poison Seeds.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Poison Seeds.text: Destroy all minions and summon 2/2 Treants to replace them.
Poison Seeds.name: Poison Seeds
Poison Seeds.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Poison Seeds.flavor: "Poisonseed Bagel" is the least popular bagel at McTiggin's Druidic Bagel Emporium.

Voidwalker.name: Voidwalker
Voidwalker.flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

Humility.name: Humility
Humility.flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

Ultimate Infestation.text:
[x]Deal $5 damage. Draw
5 cards. Gain 5 Armor.
Summon a 5/5 Ghoul.
Ultimate Infestation.name: Ultimate Infestation
Ultimate Infestation.flavor: Ghouls in the pipe, five by five.

Red Mana Wyrm.text: Whenever  you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack.
Red Mana Wyrm.name: Red Mana Wyrm
Red Mana Wyrm.flavor: It has double the Attack.  "Go on."  And double the Health.  "Yes??"  And its trigger has twice the effect.  "WHAT???"  And it costs…  Five times more.

Venture Co. Mercenary.name: Venture Co. Mercenary
Venture Co. Mercenary.flavor: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

Ice Barrier.text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
Ice Barrier.name: Ice Barrier
Ice Barrier.flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

Savannah Highmane.name: Savannah Highmane
Savannah Highmane.flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

Brass Knuckles.text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
give a random minion in
your hand +1/+1.
Brass Knuckles.name: Brass Knuckles
Brass Knuckles.flavor: For the goon that wants to make a fashion statement.

Twilight Flamecaller.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
Twilight Flamecaller.name: Twilight Flamecaller
Twilight Flamecaller.flavor: Make sure you summon a Twilight Marshmallowcaller too! Mmmm Mmm Mmm!!

Ram Wrangler.text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, summon a random Beast.
Ram Wrangler.name: Ram Wrangler
Ram Wrangler.flavor: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.

Dr. Boom.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.
Dr. Boom.name: Dr. Boom

Scaled Nightmare.text: At the start of your turn, double this minion's Attack.
Scaled Nightmare.name: Scaled Nightmare
Scaled Nightmare.flavor: I like it because it scales.

Kabal Songstealer.name: Kabal Songstealer
Kabal Songstealer.flavor: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arakkoa has a golden frog in his hand!

Varian Wrynn.text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards. Put any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.
Varian Wrynn.name: Varian Wrynn
Varian Wrynn.flavor: Leader of the Alliance!  Father of Anduin!  Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.

Cone of Cold.text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.
Cone of Cold.name: Cone of Cold
Cone of Cold.flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

Corridor Creeper.text: Costs (1) less whenever a minion dies while this is in your hand.
Corridor Creeper.name: Corridor Creeper
Corridor Creeper.flavor: It likes the smell of dead things, which is curious, as it has no visible nose.

Raven Familiar.text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
Raven Familiar.name: Raven Familiar
Raven Familiar.flavor: Quoth the raven, 'Does yours cost more?'

Shade of Naxxramas.text: Stealth. At the start of your turn, gain +1/+1.
Shade of Naxxramas.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Shade of Naxxramas.howToEarn: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Shade of Naxxramas.name: Shade of Naxxramas
Shade of Naxxramas.flavor: The Shades of Naxxramas hate the living. They even have a slur they use to refer them: Livers.

Arcane Blast.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. This spell gets double bonus from Spell Damage.
Arcane Blast.name: Arcane Blast

Savagery.text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
Savagery.name: Savagery
Savagery.flavor: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

Mistress of Mixtures.name: Mistress of Mixtures
Mistress of Mixtures.flavor: Her favorite mixture is cola and lime.

Gadgetzan Ferryman.text: Combo: Return a friendly minion to your hand.
Gadgetzan Ferryman.name: Gadgetzan Ferryman
Gadgetzan Ferryman.flavor: Is it just me, or is there something fishy about that ferryman?

Claw.text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor.
Claw.name: Claw
Claw.flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

Dinosize.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 10.
Dinosize.name: Dinosize
Dinosize.flavor: Comes with fries and a drink.

Elder Longneck.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with 5 or more Attack, Adapt.
Elder Longneck.name: Elder Longneck
Elder Longneck.flavor: And so the bartender says, “Why the long neck?”

Blood Imp.text: [x] Stealth. At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
Blood Imp.name: Blood Imp
Blood Imp.flavor: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

Shimmering Courser.text:
Only you can target
this with spells and
Hero Powers.
Shimmering Courser.name: Shimmering Courser
Shimmering Courser.flavor: A courser is a courser of course, of course, she's more of a unicorn than a horse...

Lord Jaraxxus.text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
Lord Jaraxxus.name: Lord Jaraxxus
Lord Jaraxxus.flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

Ancient Mage.name: Ancient Mage
Ancient Mage.flavor: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

Mistress of Pain.name: Mistress of Pain
Mistress of Pain.flavor: Her sister is the Mistress of Pane who sells windows and shower doors.

Naturalize.text:
Destroy a minion.
Your opponent draws 2 cards.
Naturalize.name: Naturalize

Menagerie Warden.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Summon a copy of it.
Menagerie Warden.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Menagerie Warden.name: Menagerie Warden
Menagerie Warden.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Menagerie Warden.flavor: Please? Can I keep him? I promise to clean his cage every day.

Menagerie Magician.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +2/+2.
Menagerie Magician.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Menagerie Magician.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Menagerie Magician.name: Menagerie Magician
Menagerie Magician.flavor: Just between us, if things get tight the Menagerie Magician position will probably be the first to go.

Frost Elemental.name: Frost Elemental
Frost Elemental.flavor: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

Fatespinner.text: Choose a Deathrattle (Secretly) - Deal 3 damage to all minions; or Give them +2/+2.
Fatespinner.name: Fatespinner
Fatespinner.flavor: Her clothing? Pure silk, of course.

Vilefin Inquisitor.text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a 1/1 Murloc.'
Vilefin Inquisitor.name: Vilefin Inquisitor

Deathwing, Dragonlord.text: Deathrattle: Put all Dragons from your hand into the battlefield.
Deathwing, Dragonlord.name: Deathwing, Dragonlord
Deathwing, Dragonlord.flavor: To his credit, Deathwing really took to heart the feedback he was receiving that he needed to be "more of a team player".

Emerald Reaver.name: Emerald Reaver
Emerald Reaver.flavor: Not to be confused with clubbing enthusiast Emerald Raver.

Tol'vir Stoneshaper.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain  Taunt and Divine Shield.
Tol'vir Stoneshaper.name: Tol'vir Stoneshaper
Tol'vir Stoneshaper.flavor: He spends a lot of time keeping himself in stoneshape.

Goblin Blastmage.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Goblin Blastmage.name: Goblin Blastmage
Goblin Blastmage.flavor: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

Ice Lance.text: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal $4 damage instead.
Ice Lance.name: Ice Lance
Ice Lance.flavor: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

Druid of the Claw.name: Druid of the Claw
Druid of the Claw.flavor: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

Forge of Souls.name: Forge of Souls
Forge of Souls.flavor: Powerful weaponry forged by Bronjahm, the Godfather of Souls.

Shady Dealer.text: Battlecry: If you have a Pirate, gain +1/+1.
Shady Dealer.name: Shady Dealer
Shady Dealer.flavor: I have great deal for you... for 4 damage to your face!

Lord of the Arena.name: Lord of the Arena
Lord of the Arena.flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

Cenarius.text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
Cenarius.name: Cenarius
Cenarius.flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

Smuggler's Crate.text: Give a random Beast in your hand +2/+2.
Smuggler's Crate.name: Smuggler's Crate
Smuggler's Crate.flavor: Are you sure these are the crates that are supposed to go to the Gadgetzan petting zoo?

Goldshire Footman.name: Goldshire Footman
Goldshire Footman.flavor: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

Mindbreaker.name: Mindbreaker
Mindbreaker.flavor: He's a mind breaker, dream taker, ghoul trainer, don't you mess around with him.
